ek baar ki baat hai, ek mahila adheenasth ke roop mein kaam karne vaali naadin naamak vyavsaayo se pare kuchh alag tha jo uske liye niymit din the. She was an ambitious woman with her sights set on becoming one of those few women to climb up that corporate ladder all while balancing being both career-oriented as well as maintaining healthy relationships outside work. 28 saal pahle apni garmi ko yaad rakhte huye unka jeevan badlane laga jab ve sayukt arab emirates pulis seva (UAES) mein shaamil huyin aur turant vahaan uchchatar padonnati praapt kin. Being at this point now meant she had reached several milestones throughout her life journey from working for various organizations before finally landing herself into such esteemed position where it allowed her to take control over matters pertaining not only within police department but also other government agencies too. unhone paaya ki yooyesayeeyes ne sabhi chunautiyon par vijay dvaara pradaan ki gayi santushti laane ke tareeke pesh nahin diye lekin fir bhi ab tak safalataapoorvak nipunta se naukri poori karna jaari rakha! 

Generation 2: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is officer by profession.
---
‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§µ‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ She had always been fascinated with the idea of serving her country and making an impact on society as she climbed up through the ranks. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§® ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡•Å‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ ‡§°‡§æ‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ 

Sarah graduated from college at age twenty-five with honors, determined to become one of those officers that everyone looked up too. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡§æ ‡§™‡§¶ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§à ‡§™‡§¶‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≠‡§∞‡§æ, ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ Her first day was both exciting yet intimidating - but Sarah knew it would be worth every moment spent training for this career path. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§®‡§à ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§™‡§π‡§®‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§

As days turned into weeks, months and years passed quickly under Sarah's watchful eye. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§ï‡§†‡•ã‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§´‡§æ‡§Ø‡§¶‡•á‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∂‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∂‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§∏‡§ø‡§ï ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º‡§§‡§æ ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§ú‡§¨‡•Ç‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§•‡•á‡•§ Every morning when she arrived at work, there were new challenges waiting ahead; never knowing what kind of cases they might have received or how many suspects needed apprehending. ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§®‡§è ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§ö‡•Å‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡§º‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ù‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§®‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ It wasn't easy, but it all felt like something important was being accomplished each time she stepped out onto patrol duty.

‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§π‡§≤ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§® ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡•§ Despite long hours working overtime shifts, managing stress levels during high pressure situations while maintaining professionalism throughout remained top priorities. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§è‡§Å ‡§Ü‡§à ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç, ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡§†‡§ø‡§® ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Æ‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ñ‡§§‡§∞‡§®‡§æ‡§ï ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§™‡§ü‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã‡§ñ‡§ø‡§Æ ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç, ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ This helped keep her motivation strong even though some moments could feel discouraging or frustrating.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡•á ‡§ó‡§è, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ç‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≠‡•Ä‡§§‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ Seeing people get justice after enduring hardships made her realize just how much difference can come from small acts such as standing against bullies or helping someone find their way home 

Generation 3: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is officer by profession and lives alone.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§µ‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ï‡§æ‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ She had always been fascinated with the idea of serving her community while also helping to keep it safe from harm's way. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§æ‡§à ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§™‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§Ö‡§ï‡§æ‡§¶‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¶‡§æ‡§ñ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§ó ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç‡•§ 

After graduating top of his class, Sarah was quickly hired as an Officer at one of the city's busiest precincts. ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§®‡§à ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ò‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§á‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§°‡•Ç‡§¨‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ It wasn't just that she loved being on patrol or working alongside other officers but there were many benefits too like getting paid well for doing something meaningful and knowing how much difference each case made when they solved them. 

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•á‡§≤‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§¶‡§§‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ While living away from home, cooking meals every night became monotonous and boring, especially since most days ended late into the evening after long hours spent chasing criminals around town. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•á‡§≤‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§® ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö ‡§ñ‡•ã ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§π ‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ So, over time, she started reaching out more often to friends back home through video calls, sending care packages full of goodies to make up for not seeing them physically anymore, even though this meant taking extra effort during work shifts which could be exhausting sometimes. 

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§¶‡•á‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§ ‡§ó‡§∂‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶‡§ø‡§ó‡•ç‡§ß ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤ ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∂‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü‡•§ The situation escalated rapidly before finally coming down to gunfire exchanged between two parties involved. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ò‡§ü‡§®‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡§µ‡§æ‡§¨ ‡§¶‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ò‡§æ‡§Ø‡§≤ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§™‡§æ‡§§ ‡§® ‡§π‡•ã‡•§ Despite all odds against him, he managed to apprehend both suspects without further incident thanks largely due to quick thinking skills acquired throughout years of training coupled with intuition honed in real life situations encountered daily on duty . ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§™‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§ø‡§§ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡•§ However, despite having saved countless innocent people's lives, Sarah still felt lonely 

Generation 4: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is officer by profession and lives with her mother.
---
‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ From an early age, she had always been fascinated by the idea of serving others as part of law enforcement or public safety services. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Å ‡§®‡•á ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§§‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ì‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§µ‡§Ç‡§∂ ‡§â‡§® ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡§æ‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ó‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§∏‡•Å‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ As such, Lena felt it was only natural to follow their footsteps into this field that they both loved so much. 

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ-‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§æ‡§à ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤‡•á‡§ú ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ü‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ Her hard work paid off when she graduated at top of class and earned herself admission into one of the most prestigious police academies around. ‡§µ‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡•å‡§∞‡§æ‡§® ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡§†‡•ã‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡•á, ‡§ï‡§†‡§ø‡§® ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Æ‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§π‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§®‡§ø‡§™‡•Å‡§£ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§æ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ She even became captain before leaving for another city where there were more opportunities awaiting her career growth.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§®‡§à ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä, ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡§§‡§æ‡§è‡§Å ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§∏‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ The first few months involved learning new skills like interrogation techniques and handling firearms safely while on duty. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø, ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§≠‡§µ‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§ß‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§¨‡•Å‡§≤‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ö‡•ã‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§®‡§∂‡•Ä‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§µ‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡•å‡§¶‡•á ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ But then came a case which would change everything - a murder investigation involving multiple suspects.

‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡•Ä‡§°‡§º‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∂‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡§ø‡§§ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§µ‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∂‡§µ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ç‡§ï ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ It wasn't long until several people started getting arrested after being questioned by detectives from different departments across town. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•å‡§® ‡§∏‡§æ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§•‡§æ? Everyone seemed suspicious but no concrete evidence could be found against any particular individual yet.

‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡•Å‡§≤‡§ù‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡•§ They went over every detail possible including witness statements, phone records, social media accounts and surveillance videos among other things. ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, 

Generation 5: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is officer by profession.

ek baar ki baat hai jab saara naam ka ek vyakti tha jo apne peshe ke kaaran adhikaari ban gaya tha aur vah sabhi se upar raajdhaani mein seva karna chaahti thin taaki ve logon ko surakshit mahsoos kara sakein. Sarah had always been fascinated with law enforcement and wanted to be the one protecting her community from any kind of danger or harm that they might face on their daily lives. unka sapna tab poora hua jab unhone pulis bal dvaara prashikshu paathyakram shuru kiya aur antatah safal ho gayeeh uske varishth ne use bataane vaala nahin dekha! 

Soon enough, she was assigned as an undercover agent for several months whereby she got herself involved into dangerous situations but managed to keep it all together without getting caught. jaise-jaise samay badlana shuruaati dinon par nirbhar karta hai, sarapraayij inspektor janral ke roop mein padonnati sahit sakaaraatmak pragti hoti rahi; yahaan tak ki ab vibhaag mukhyamantri ko riport karte huye, na keval dofar ke bhojan yaatraayein lekin uchchatam star par netritva diya. However, this wasn't just another day at work - there were many challenges ahead which would test not only her physical strengths but also her mental fortitude while keeping people safe despite being constantly bombarded with threats both inside & outside office walls. 

Generation 6: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is officer by profession and she gets involved with the criminal gangs.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ She had always been fascinated by police shows on TV and admired officers for their bravery and dedication to justice. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§§‡•ã ‡§µ‡§π ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§®‡§è ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§®‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ 

As an experienced cop, Sarah was not new to dangerous situations or dealing with criminals. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Her father's body lay lifelessly at his desk while her mother's blood-stained clothes were found hanging from a ceiling fan. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§§‡§¨‡§æ‡§π ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§ß‡§¨‡•ã‡§ß ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≠‡§ø‡§≠‡•Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ It took time before she could come back into herself again but once that happened, it only made her more determined than ever to fight against crime as well as bring those responsible to justice.

‡§á‡§∏ ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶, ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§ß‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ñ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§´ ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ò‡•Ç‡§Æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ However, what started out innocently enough soon turned darker when one of them approached her offering help - they wanted revenge too! ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ‡§è‡§Å ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§ß‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§ø‡§∞‡•ã‡§π ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç, ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§¶‡•á‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•à‡§∏‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ The truth hit like lightning: these people weren't just robbers; they were murdering entire families without mercy because someone stole something important from them years ago.

‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ï‡§∞, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ó‡§π‡§∞‡§æ‡§à ‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§§‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§à‡•§ Every lead brought her closer towards solving this case until finally, after months of investigation, everything fell together perfectly. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§§‡•ã ‡§á‡§® ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡§®‡§æ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ With all evidence gathered, she filed charges against each member individually, making sure every last detail was accounted for so no stone would be left unturned.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§¶‡§æ‡§≤‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑ ‡§≠‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§ñ‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§≠‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§ï ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§≠‡§Ø‡§æ‡§®‡§ï ‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§µ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§â‡§ú‡§æ‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§ï‡§à ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•å‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ When the verdict came down, everyone held its breath waiting anxiously for how things might turn out. ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§ß‡•Ä‡§∂ ‡§ñ‡§°‡§º‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ò‡•ã‡§∑‡§£‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä "‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¶‡•ã‡§∑‡•Ä ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ 

Generation 7: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is officer by profession.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ She had worked hard to get where she was today and never took her job lightly. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ç‡§≠‡•Ä‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡•á‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§™‡§ï‡§∞‡§£ ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§ 

One day at work, Sarah received an anonymous tip that there were illegal activities going on somewhere in the city's underground marketplace. ‡§ü‡§ø‡§™ ‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§æ‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ The informant gave enough details for Sarah to start investigating without any further questions or doubts. ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è, ‡§∏‡§¨‡•Ç‡§§ ‡§á‡§ï‡§ü‡•ç‡§†‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§õ‡§§‡§æ‡§õ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ 

The investigation led them into one of the darkest corners of their jurisdiction - a hidden maze beneath some abandoned buildings deep within the heart of the urban jungle. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á, ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ö‡•å‡§Ç‡§ï‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ-‡§è‡§ï ‡§ó‡•Å‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§Ö‡§µ‡•à‡§ß ‡§¶‡§µ‡§æ‡§è‡§Å ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§à ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ This discovery made it clear why this place could not be ignored as just another part of town but rather became a top priority case with immediate action needed. 

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§µ‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§ñ‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Å‡§à, ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§¶‡•å‡§°‡§º ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§Å‡§ñ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ö‡•å‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§ú‡§ó‡§π ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§®‡§∂‡•Ä‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§µ‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡•å‡§¶‡•á ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ It was like nothing else she had ever seen before; every surface seemed to have been coated in chemical residue from years of illicit drug production. ‡§π‡§µ‡§æ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä, ‡§ú‡§π‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≠‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ç‡§∏ ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∂‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ But despite all these challenges, Sarah remained focused and determined, knowing what actions would need to take next to ensure justice will prevail over crime. 

‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ü‡§¶‡•á‡§∂ ‡§™‡§∞, ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§™‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§á‡§ï‡§æ‡§à ‡§ò‡§ü‡§®‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§≤ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö ‡§ó‡§à, ‡§ú‡§¨‡§ï‡§ø ‡§°‡•ç‡§∞‡§ó ‡§°‡•Ä‡§≤‡§∞ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•á‡•§ They chased after him through narrow alleyways until they finally cornered him near his hideout. ‡§Ü‡§ó‡§æ‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§ó‡•ã‡§≤‡•Ä‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§§‡•Ä‡§µ‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§à‡•§ All suspects involved are now behind bars while Sarah has become more respectful than ever due to her diligent efforts which helped bring down such dangerous criminal activity.

It wasn't just that it offered great pay for someone like Maria; what attracted her most were its cozy atmosphere and friendly staff members - they made everyone feel welcome there no matter how long or late their shift ended up being.

‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§è‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂ ‡§π‡•Å‡§à, ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§õ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º ‡§ó‡§à‡•§ One night as she closed up shop after another long day behind the counter, there were two men arguing outside. ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§¨‡§π‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á ‡§§‡•ã ‡§è‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§ß‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ Suddenly, both men turned towards Emma's direction and started shouting obscenities at each other until someone pulled out a gun. ‡§ó‡•ã‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§æ‡§ú ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§è‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§°‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¨ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§® ‡§ñ‡§§‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•à ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§ï‡§¶‡§Æ ‡§â‡§†‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ö‡§ø‡§≤‡•ç‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ The situation calmed down eventually but left emma feeling uneasy all throughout the following weekend.

‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§∏‡§™‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ, ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§è‡§Æ‡•á‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∂‡§∞‡§æ‡§¨ ‡§™‡•Ä‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§® ‡§ò‡§ü‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≠‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡•á‡§∂‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ But soon enough, those memories would come flooding back during quiet hours between shifts. ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§ ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§® ‡§Ü‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§π ‡§•‡§ï‡§æ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ö‡§ø‡§Ç‡§§‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Her boss noticed this pattern happening over several weeks so he decided to offer some help.

‡§Ü‡§Å‡§ñ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§ö‡•á‡§π‡§∞‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ö‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§â‡§†‡•Ä‡§Ç, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è-‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§â‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§∂‡§æ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ The man introduced himself as John but his name hardly mattered anymore since everything else seemed so surreal. ‡§ú‡•â‡§® ‡§â‡§® ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ó‡§æ‡§à ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ He had always been shy around people which made this whole thing even more embarrassing considering all these strangers were there watching them get engaged. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§á‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡§æ‡§• ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∂‡§∞‡§æ‡§¨ ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ And before they knew what hit 'em, both of them found themselves sipping tequila slammers together like old friends sharing secrets over cocktail hour. ‡§Ø‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§à‡•§ Her ability to connect instantly with any customer or potential client left no room for doubt when it came time to close deals and make money. 

Generation 5: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Bartender by profession and facing the challenges of her life.
---
‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§É ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§®‡•§ 
Sarah was always known as an independent woman with no fears or boundaries to restrict herself from achieving what she wanted for herself. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∂‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ However, when it came time to choose between work and family, Sarah realized that priorities change overtime, especially during tough times like this one. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¶‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¶‡•å‡§∞‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§ï ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Æ‡§ú‡§¨‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º ‡§¶‡•Ä‡•§ As fate would have it, however, things did not go exactly according to plan - leaving Sarah feeling lost without any direction in her newfound role at home full-time.

‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§®‡§è ‡§Ö‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡•á‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•á‡§¶‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§ø ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ó‡§è ‡§•‡•á‡•§ She had never been much of a cook but decided to start small by making breakfast every morning for their two kids while they were still young enough to appreciate such gestures. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§á‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§§ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•Ä‡•§ And then there were laundry duties which involved sorting through piles upon pile of clothes until all items found its way back into neatly folded drawers.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§®‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ Soon afterward, she started taking classes on how best to care for children aged zero to six years old, thus learning some basic skills necessary to help out around the house. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§•, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§á‡§® ‡§®‡§à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•á‡§¶‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§®‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡§π‡§ú ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§

As days turned weeks and months rolled past, Sarah began looking forward more than ever before towards building something meaningful again. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§â‡§® ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§ú‡•Å‡§°‡§º ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§®‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç; ‡§Ø‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§≤‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§§ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§™‡§¨ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§µ‡•á‡§¶‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ After several interviews and background checks, Sarah got hired as bartending staff member.

‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à! But Sarah knew better than most people do because being behind those bars meant dealing with drunks day and night. ‡§ï‡§à ‡§Æ‡•å‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§®‡§∂‡•á‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§π‡§ø‡§Ç‡§∏‡§ï ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•á 

Generation 6: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Bartender by profession.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡§ü‡•á‡§Ç‡§°‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Growing up as the only daughter to two parents with careers that required them to spend long hours away from home and her siblings meant she often felt neglected or ignored at times when they were present. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡§§ ‡§π‡•à-‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§®‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§∏‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§É ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•á‡§∞‡§´‡•á‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ‡•§ She was always friendly but never too close - it gave her an opportunity for observation without feeling like someone's voyeuristic stalker. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•å‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ê‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§è ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡•ã‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶‡§æ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ It wasn't until one day after college graduation where Sarah met John, owner of The Tap Room bar on Main Street downtown, which had recently gone out of business due to declining sales caused primarily because people preferred drinking cocktail bars instead of traditional pub style places. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ú‡•â‡§® ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ç‡§¶ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§®‡§à ‡§ú‡§ó‡§π ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ He hired her immediately based solely upon his first impression: "You have what it takes," he said before handing over some papers and telling her how much money needed to be invested into renovating the space so customers would feel comfortable enough to come back again. 

Generation 7: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Bartender by profession and lives alone. ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡§ü‡•á‡§Ç‡§°‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡•à‡§®‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ Use descriptive language to bring the setting of bar scene alive for readers.

‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ê‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§∞‡§ö‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§®‡•ã‡§∞‡§Ç‡§ú‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡•§ So when she landed her dream job as bartender at one of the trendiest bars on Main Street, Sarah couldn't have been happier. ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§®‡§è ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§ó‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶‡•Ä‡§¶‡§æ ‡§ï‡•â‡§ï‡§ü‡•á‡§≤ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•Ä-‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ß‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ The best part was that it gave her an excuse not only to talk with people but also learn more about their interests or hobbies through casual conversations over drinks.

‡§è‡§ï ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§ú ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§¨‡•à‡§†‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§•‡•Ä, ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§™‡•á‡§Ø ‡§ö‡§∂‡•ç‡§Æ‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä, ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§ó‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡•à‡§†‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§¶‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§¨‡•á‡§ö‡•à‡§® ‡§π‡•ã‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§á‡§ß‡§∞-‡§â‡§ß‡§∞ ‡§ò‡•Ç‡§Æ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ He had dark hair and piercing blue eyes which seemed almost lost behind his glasses frames. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ì‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§Ü‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡•á‡§§ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§Å‡§ñ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Å‡§ö‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§π‡§æ‡§• ‡§â‡§†‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è‡•§ She decided to start small and asked him what he liked to order from the menu before offering some friendly advice on how much alcohol would be too much based upon his body type. ‡§á‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§‡§ö‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§® ‡§∞‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Å ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ They chatted for hours until closing time came around where they exchanged numbers and promised each other to catch up soon again.

‡§Ö‡§ó‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§´‡•ã‡§® ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ "‡§¶ ‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡•à‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§á‡§ü‡§∞" ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Their conversations became deeper, filled with stories of traveling across different countries, trying new foods, meeting interesting locals - all while sipping cocktail after delicious cocktail made especially just for them both. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§®‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≤‡§Ç‡§¨‡•á ‡§∞‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§§‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ó ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ Instead, they agreed to keep things simple: no expectations, no commitments, nothing serious beyond having fun together whenever possible.

‡§á‡§∏ ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§∞‡§≤ ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ú‡•ã‡§°‡§º‡•á ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ù‡§æ 

Prompt: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is music teacher by profession

Generation 1: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is music teacher by profession.
---
chaarli ki kahaani-ek sangeet shikshak ka jeevan 

Charlie was born and raised on the outskirts of London where she spent most days playing her guitar or composing songs for hours at end with just herself as an audience. unke pita ek prasiddh piyaanovaadak aur arenjar ke roop mein jaane gaye jinki yaatra ne chaarleez ko apne sapnon se bhi door kar diya tha. However, his death left Charlie alone to pursue what he had always wanted - teaching people how to appreciate art through musical instruments. yah tab hua jab unhone landan vishvavidyaalay kolej of myoojikal ejukeshan (elaseeyemyyi) naamak sthaapit vidvaanon dvaara sanchaarit skoolon mein adhyayan karna seekha jo poore inglaind mein faila hua hai. She enrolled there after completing high school from Harrow School which has been known since its establishment over three centuries ago. elsiyemiye saaskritik mahatva rakhta haih "sangat" vaadyayantra pariyojanaaon sahit samaaveshit seekhne ka samarthan karta hai taaki sabse kamjor logon tak navaachaar laaya ja sake."The first year proved challenging because it involved learning new things every day but that's when I realized why my father taught so many students throughout their careers. mujhe ab ehsaas ho gaya tha ki main uska beta nahin balki use doosron ki madad karte huye dekhkar badlane laga tha! He would often say 'Music makes you happy,' and now I know exactly what he meant.'agle varsh mere liye behtari lekin fir bhi mushkil paida kar denge. My classes were all filled up except one: piano lessons. choonki meri praathmiki taiyaar thin, isliye main antatah padonnati arjit karne ke baare mein udaasi ke alaava kuchh nahin bataate huye imarsiv larning sentar gayi. saaraah ek utsaahi aur pratibhaashaali sangeet shikshak thin jo apne chhote se gaav mein kayi yuva peedhiyon ko padhaati hain. She had always loved to sing and play the piano since she was young but never considered it as her career choice until later on when life took an unexpected turn for better or worse. 18 saal ki umra tak unhone piyaano seekh liya tha lekin unhein bade hokar gitaar par jaana pada jahaan ve adbhut tareekon ka upyog karke vaadyayantron ke beech svich nahin hoti rahti thin ya vishesh roop se dabastep nritya nirdeshan ki avadhaarna pasand nahin karti thin (jo us samay lokapriy ho gayeeh)). Despite this setback Sarah continued with her studies at university where she specialized in classical vocal training which led eventually towards becoming one of India's most sought-after singing instructors .

kait‡§≤‡§ø‡§® hamesha se sangeet ke liye ek pratibaddh vyakti rahi hain aur vah kabhi nahin bhoolengi ki kaise unhein apne shuruaati varshon mein doosron ko pyaar karna tha jo ve the. She had always dreamed of becoming an educator but never imagined that her passion would lead to such fulfilling work as being a musical instructor. unhone maadhyamik vidyaalay poora kiya jahaan ve skool gaana samooh ki neta thin, lekin yah tab tak nahin tha jab tak ki uske dost ne use padhaane vaale sthal par naukri paaye jaane di gayi thi ki uski ruchiyon ko peshevar roop dene ka avsar mil gaya tha. The rest was history! chaar saptaah baad hi unka dridhtaapoorvak pareeksha lene vaala "pareeksha" satra safalataapoorvak ho gaya-unmein sabse kam umra ke logon sahit lagbhag bees svasth naamaanknon mein vriddhisheel sudhaaron ko dekhte huye badlaav aa gaya tha. Every year on October first they celebrated 'Music Day', with students taking part in various activities like songwriting competitions or concert performances while teachers were encouraged to bring instruments along so everyone could have fun together regardless if it meant playing guitar solos during recess time or singing duets after dinner. kailtan ne seezan teen episod das mein mistres smith ki mrityu ke turant baad sent roz naamak graameen ilaake mein ek anya praanteey upangar me 

Generation 4: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is music teacher by profession. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§õ‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§∏‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§
---
Sarah was an accomplished pianist with years of experience under her belt as both student and educator alike. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ï ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§ï‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ ‡§°‡§æ‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§â‡§™‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§™‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ When she graduated from college at the age of 25, Sarah had already set up several private lessons for young students to learn how to play piano or guitar like their favorite artists on television shows that were popular during those days. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§á‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡•Å‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä‡§§‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§∏‡§∞‡§£ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§®‡§ø‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§™‡§æ‡§† ‡§ï‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§π ‡§∞‡§π ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Despite being so busy teaching others, Sarah never lost sight of why it all started - because playing music brought joy into people's lives!

‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ She loved every moment spent behind closed doors helping aspiring musicians discover new heights through learning musical instruments. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä-‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§†‡§ø‡§® ‡§õ‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§ß‡•à‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§® ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§£ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§à ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Her kindness towards them always managed to bring out something special within each one of them which made everyone feel proud when they saw progress happening before their eyes.

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§®, ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§®‡•ã ‡§¨‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡§∞‡§µ‡§æ‡§ú‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§è‡§ï‡§æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§≠‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à‡•§ It turned out to be someone looking for help regarding some problems he faced while practicing his instrument. ‡§π‡•à‡§∞‡§æ‡§® ‡§π‡•ã‡§ï‡§∞, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§â‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§ö‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§µ‡§ï ‡§¨‡•à‡§†‡§æ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§°‡•à‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§≤ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ He told her everything but didn't know where else can look for answers other than asking him directly since no one seemed willing enough to listen without judging firstly.

‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡§Ø‡§æ‡§≤‡•Å ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ ‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§°‡•á‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ó‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§≠ ‡§â‡§†‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ As soon as Daniel finished speaking, Sarah took over explaining what could have been wrong based upon certain observations such as posture and finger placement along with correcting any mistakes done earlier on. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ß‡•Ä‡§∞‡•á-‡§ß‡•Ä‡§∞‡•á ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§§‡§ï‡§®‡•Ä‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è 

Generation 5: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is music teacher by profession and has to teach the students with disabilities.
---
ek yuva mahila ke roop mein jo apne peshe se ek sangeet shikshak thin aur unhein vibhaajit karte huye dekhna pasand karti haih 
The young woman was named Sarah Jane, she had always been passionate for teaching people how they could find their own voice through singing or playing instruments. saara jen ne hamesha chunautiyon ko pahchaana tha lekin unhone haar nahin ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ya sabhi baadhaaon ka aanand bhi liya ki ve use rok rahe honge. She believed that everyone should have an opportunity no matter what obstacles lay ahead of them as long it did not stop her from reaching out towards others' hearts and minds.

saat varsheey mukhar prashasa abhinay par duniya bhar ke deshon tak faile gaavon mein prachaar fail gaya tha-vishesh logon vaale sthaan. The village where these children lived were far away from any major city which meant there wasn't much hope when it came down to finding qualified teachers willing enough to help develop their musical skills. tab hi uski dost mairiyan naam ki ladki sahyog dene lagi taaki ye avsar jeevant ho sakein! Maryann being one such child herself knew well all too often how hard life can be if you don't get proper support at home - especially those living without parents due to illnesses like cancer etcetera‚Ä¶ So many times we forget our roots but this group of friends never lost sight on why they started doing so: because every single human deserves equal opportunities regardless whether he/she may seem different than anyone else around him /her .

lekin jaise hi hamne daura poora kiya (is samooh) mujhe ehsaas hua ki har din naye romaanch aa rahe the; main adbhut cheejon ko sunta tha jab mere paathkon ne meri madad lene ke alaava doosron ko protsaahit karke badlaav laane ke tareeke diye, "mukhyamantra" ban gayeh svacch geeton ke bol likhoong 

Generation 6: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is music teacher by profession.
---
‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡•Ä ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä‡§§‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She had been singing and playing the piano since she was four years old, but it wasn't until her teenage years that she realized how much of an impact music could have on people around you - especially young children. ‡§Ø‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§ú‡§¨‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ After graduating from college with honors for vocal performance, Sophie got hired as a kindergarten music teacher at one of the best schools nearby. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§®‡§µ‡•Ä‡§®‡•Ä‡§ï‡•É‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç-‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§§‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡•á‡§§‡§® ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡•ã‡§ó‡•Å‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡•Ä!

Sophie knew this would be tough to negotiate because they were already paying her more than any other teacher there. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã‡§∂‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§ø‡§Æ ‡§Æ‡•å‡§ï‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ The school board listened patiently while Sophie explained why she deserved such high wages. ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§®‡§Ç‡§¶‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ï‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ö‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§∏‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§à, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§∂‡•à‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£‡§ø‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡§® ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü‡•§ They also appreciated the fact that she always went above and beyond what was required of her job description, often working late into evenings or weekends just so students wouldn't miss out on learning new songs or techniques.

‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§®‡§à ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§è ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¨ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡•§ And though times may get hard sometimes when funds are tight, knowing that she can make a difference through teaching kids something they love has made all the sacrifices worthwhile. 

Generation 7: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is music teacher by profession.
---
‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ï ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§õ‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had been teaching for over 20 years and her passion never waned - no matter how many times she'd heard it from parents or students complaining that their child couldn't play the piano like other children did. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§ó ‡§π‡•à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Ç‡§†‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡§§ ‡§π‡•à-‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡•á ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡•§ And so every day after school ended at three o 'clock sharp, Lena would head to her studio where young minds came with varying levels of talent waiting patiently for her guidance towards mastery.

‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•á‡§∑ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§õ‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§õ‡§π ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ Lily was different than any student before as not only could she sing beautiful melodies but also played several instruments including guitar, violin, drums, flute, saxophone... ‡§Ü‡§™ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ? The list went on endlessly! ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•Ç‡§°‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡•á‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§≤‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§π‡§æ‡§• ‡§™‡§ï‡§°‡§º ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Å‡§∞‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ "Hi there!" ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡•§ "I know you must be nervous," said Lina kindly. "‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ö‡§ø‡§Ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ã", ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ", ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ç‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä"‡•§ With those words spoken out loud, Lila began playing some tunes which caught everyone off guard especially when they realized this little girl didn't even need sheet music because she knew everything just through listening alone.

‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§π‡§´‡•ç‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§è ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§≤‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§®‡•ã ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ñ‡•á‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§¨‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≤‡§ó‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Her mother often visited them during lessons but what amazed both women more were the stories told behind each song picked up by Lilie herself. ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ß‡•Å‡§®‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§® ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ï ‡§ó‡•Ä‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§¨‡§ï‡§ø ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∂‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä‡§§‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∞‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§∞‡§ö‡§®‡§æ‡§è‡§Å ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ñ‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ It seemed impossible for someone around seven years old to have such an extensive knowledge base yet here sat this brilliant prodigy whose mind worked faster than most adults'.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§≤‡§æ ‡§§‡•á‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•Ä‡§∞‡•á-‡§ß‡•Ä‡§∞‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ú‡§ü‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ü‡•Å‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à‡•§ One particular piece called "Amazing Grace" became

saara ek saahsi aur dridhanishchayi mahila thin jo hamesha apne sapnon ko poora karna chaahtin thiyon ne kabhi bhi unhein rok nahin paaya. She had always been fascinated with the idea of starting her own business and creating something that could make an impact on society while also providing for herself financially. 25 varsh ki umra mein unhone shaadi ke baad ghar par rakhe huye kaam se brekaap le liya jisse vitteey tanaav badh jaata hai . Generation 2: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is entrepreneur by profession and has successfully established her own business.
---
‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ From an early age, she had always been fascinated with the idea of owning her own company one day. ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞‡§£-‡§™‡•ã‡§∑‡§£ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§µ ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§§‡§ø‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§™‡•à‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§ After years of hard work, Lena finally achieved what many believed was impossible - She founded her very first startup called "Lena's Boutique." ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§™‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§∑ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç!

The journey to establishing this boutique wasn't easy for Leana but it was worth every bit of effort put into making it happen. ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§ó‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§π‡§∏ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ With no experience or knowledge on how to run such a large enterprise at that time, all she knew were clothes from designers around the world which inspired her unique style of fashion designs.

‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¶‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ï ‡§Ü‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§†‡§ø‡§® ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ However, through dedication, passion and perseverance, she managed to overcome these obstacles. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§à ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ó‡•Å‡§£‡§µ‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•Å‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ï‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡•Ä‡•§ People started coming back again and recommending friends as they loved their purchases so much.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ß‡•Ä‡§∞‡•á-‡§ß‡•Ä‡§∞‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ The store began selling more than just clothing items nowadays. ‡§á‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ó‡§π‡§®‡•á, ‡§∏‡§π‡§æ‡§Ø‡§ï ‡§â‡§™‡§ï‡§∞‡§£ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡§°‡§¨‡•à‡§ó, ‡§ß‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ö‡§∂‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§¶‡§ø ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§™‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§∞‡•ã‡§ú‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§Ç‡§¶‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ This helped increase profits further while also catering towards customers looking beyond mere apparel alone.

emili ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She had always been passionate about starting new ventures that would make an impact on people's lives. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§ß‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ As she grew up, Emily started exploring different fields of work but found herself drawn towards the world of finance. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§§ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡§® ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§¨‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§™‡§æ‡§†‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•á‡§∑‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§§‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ However, it wasn't until one day when everything fell into place for her. ‡§è‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§ö‡§§ ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∞‡§ñ‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§∂‡•Ä‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à-‡§è‡§ï ‡§ê‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§µ‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ‡§π ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ After weeks of researching, writing proposals, presentations, and pitches, Emma was finally able to secure funding from investors - enough money to launch their startup company! ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§®‡§à ‡§´‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ ‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§´‡§≤‡§®‡•á-‡§´‡•Ç‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§®‡§ó‡§ø‡§®‡§§ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡•á ‡§ó‡§è ‡§®‡§è ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ì‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ó‡§à‡•§ Her hard work paid off as more clients came pouring through with requests for financial advice or consultation services which helped them grow exponentially over time. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§Ü‡§§ ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§¨‡§® ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à, ‡§è‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•á ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Å‡§∞‡§æ‡§à ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ö ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ From being just another employee at a corporate office job to becoming a successful entrepreneur running multiple companies under her umbrella, all because of her love affair with numbers, data analysis, and innovative problem solving skills.

‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§â‡§ú‡•ç‡§ú‡•ç‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had always dreamed of starting something big - something that would make people take notice of the hard work she put into it every day. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ-‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ So when Sarah saw an opportunity to start up her very first boutique store with some help from family members, friends and investors, she knew this was what she needed to do. ‡§ê‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶‡•á‡§π ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§® ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™ ‡§Ö‡§ü‡•Ç‡§ü ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ‡•§ The journey ahead wasn't going to be easy but nothing worth having ever came easily either.

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§® ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§à‡•§ It took time for customers to find out where they could get their hands on unique clothing items at affordable prices. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§≤‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Å ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§™‡§°‡§º‡•á ‡§¢‡•Ç‡§Ç‡§¢ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§Ü‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ But despite all these obstacles, Sarah kept pushing forward because there were bigger things waiting beyond those doors. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ï‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à, ‡§µ‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§µ‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§®‡§ø‡§µ‡•á‡§∂ ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ Her staff grew larger and so did her profits!

‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§¨‡§ø‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ò‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ There are times when Sarah faced financial difficulties due to unexpected expenses or even natural disasters like floods which affected production lines causing delays in delivery schedules. ‡§á‡§® ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§™‡§ü‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡•å‡§∞‡§æ‡§® ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§§‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ß‡•à‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§ö‡•Ä‡§≤‡•á‡§™‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§®‡§ø‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ Whenever life threw curveballs at her, Sarah never gave up hope, instead choosing to see them as opportunities rather than setbacks.

‡§á‡§∏ ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§°‡§ø‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ With each passing year, more stores opened across different locations around town, expanding its reach further. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§¶‡§æ‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ö‡§æ‡§≤‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§® ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Å‡§ö ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ This helped build relationships within communities while also fostering goodwill towards her brand among potential clients.

‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡§à ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ç‡§° ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§â‡§™‡§≠‡•ã‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ As one might expect, success didn't come overnight; however, through per 

Generation 5: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is entrepreneur by profession and has set up her own business.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡•à‡§¶‡§æ ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had always been passionate about starting new things - be it setting up clubs at school or organizing events for the community during college days. ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤‡•á‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§à ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡§Æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ So Sarah quit her job as an accountant to start her first venture: "Sara's Craft Store".

‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§® ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡§æ‡§• ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§®‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•Å‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ü‡•ç‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§™‡§°‡§º‡•á ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§è ‡§ó‡§è ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§™‡§æ‡§¶‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§™‡§æ‡§∞‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡•á‡§ö‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ But she knew that this was not going to cut it financially so she started researching other ways of making money through craft stores online. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§≤‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§´‡•ç‡§ü ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•ã‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§¶‡•ã‡§∏‡•ç‡§§ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§¶‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∂‡§ø‡§≤‡•ç‡§™ ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§£ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§¨‡•á‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•à‡•§ They were surprised when they found out how many people wanted their products but didn't have enough time or resources to sell them themselves. ‡§Ø‡§π‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ó ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§¨‡•ã‡§è-‡§è‡§ï ‡§ë‡§®‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ú‡§º‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§á‡§® ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞!

Within weeks, Sara launched her website where anyone could list items made from handmade goods such as jewelry, clothing accessories, home decorations etc., on sale with no commission fees charged whatsoever. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ The site quickly became popular among artisans around town looking for exposure while also providing customers easy accessibility into purchasing unique pieces without having to leave their homes which saved both parties valuable time and energy .

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•á, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•á‡§¨‡§∏‡§æ‡§á‡§ü ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ó‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§ö ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§™‡§ï ‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ß‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡•á‡•§ Therefore, she decided to expand internationally after seeing success within its local market share by partnering with similar websites worldwide offering services like hers across different regions including Asia Pacific , Europe (specifically UK) & North America(USA/Canada).

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§∂‡•Ä‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§§‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§® ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§∂‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ 

Generation 6: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is entrepreneur by profession and has started her own business.
---
saara ne hamesha khud ko ek dridhanishchayi vyakti ke roop mein dekha tha jo apne sapnon aur lakshyon ka peechha karna chaahti hai. She had always been passionate about starting up new ventures that would not only help people but also make an impact on society as well. saath hi, vah jaanti thin ki unke paas safal udyam shuru karne se pahle buniyaadi baaton par acchi tarah se nirbhar rakhte huye sahanashakti honi chaahiye-ek peshevar banne vaali mahila ke liye yogdaan dene ke alag-alag tareeke the jab tak ki unhone antatah faisla nahin kiya ki ve kis prakaar ke udyami bankar sabse adhik badlane ya sudhaar kar sakte haih ekal staartaap! 

As soon as she graduated from college with high grades under her belt, Sarah decided to take charge of herself - financially stable enough for self employment yet determined towards fulfilling their dreams. uski ruchiyon mein madad milni thi lekin use abhi bhi samjhane lagta tha ki kin utpaadon/ sevaayein logon ki gatividhiyon ko suvidhaajnak banaati hain. It took time to identify what they were good at or even liked doing most which led them down different paths until one day while reading through various blog articles online; it hit home when someone mentioned how difficult being your own boss can be sometimes especially if you're just getting started out there. fir bhi sarlata aur prerna donon ke mool mein doosron ki jeet sunishchit karne ke iraade se, saara ne socha "theek hooh main svatantrata lena pasand karoongi." This was where things got interesting because once she made this decision, all other factors became secondary compared against its benefits: The freedom to choose my hours, work anywhere I want without any limitations imposed upon myself (this includes working remotely), no more office politics nor long commutes 

Generation 7: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is entrepreneur by profession and also has some sort of disability.
---
‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ üå±

Her name was Sarah, but everyone called her "Sarah the Dragonfly." ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§¶‡•ç‡§≠‡•Å‡§§ ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§µ‡§æ ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§∏-‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∂‡•å‡§ï ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ She had been born with Down syndrome - which meant that she might have trouble learning or communicating like others do. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§á‡§® ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§π‡§æ‡§¶‡•Å‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§§ ‡§á‡§ï‡§ü‡•ç‡§†‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§

Growing up, Sarah's parents taught her to embrace all things different from what society deemed normal. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Ç‡§†‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∂‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡§Æ‡§ú‡•ã‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ They encouraged her never give up on anything and always find ways around any obstacles they encountered along their journey through life.

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞‡§µ‡§∞‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§â‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ So when it came time for college, she chose one where people would not judge her because of her condition. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§µ‡§ø‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§≤‡§Ø ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•á‡§∑ ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§õ‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§® ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§Ü‡§™ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú‡§ø‡§ï ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§ó ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ It became clear very early into her studies at this university that Sarah thrives off challenges.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§µ‡§∏ ‡§®‡§ú‡§¶‡•Ä‡§ï ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ With years of experience working alongside other students as an internship while attending classes, she knew there were plenty of opportunities out there waiting just for someone like herself. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è, ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§°‡§ø‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡•ã‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§π‡§æ‡§• ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ú‡§¨‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§á‡§®‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ-‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§É ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§Ø‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§∂‡•Ä‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ü-‡§Ö‡§™ ‡§≤‡•â‡§®‡•ç‡§ö ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç!

With nothing more than passionate determination, perseverance, and supportive friends behind her, Sarah started her own business: The Inspired Mind Project . ‡§Ü‡§à‡§è‡§Æ‡§™‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ö‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§∏‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á, ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§ó‡§§ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§∏‡§ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Her goal? ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ, ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§°‡§∞‡§§‡•á 

Prompt: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is blogger by profession

Generation 1: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is blogger by profession and has an unusual hobby.
---
sofiya ek peshevar lekhika thin jo apne jeevan ke baare mein kahaaniyon ko saajha karna pasand karti thin aur unhein log padhte the. She was always on her toes for new ideas that would make people smile or think deeply as she did with every post. sofia ne har din vibhinn prakaar ki shailiyon ka pata lagaane vaali mool rachanaaon par dher se adhik likhi thi jab tak ki unhone yah nahin dekha-unke paas bina maang ya poochhtaachh ke chhod diye ja sakne vaale tukdon ko ikattha karne ka abhootapoorva svabhaav hai! 

One day while browsing through various websites during work hours at home, Sophie came across something peculiar - it seemed like someone had left their entire life behind them online without any intention of ever returning there again... uski ruchi badh gayi; use ehsaas ho gaya ki agle do ghanton ke liye samay avishvasneey roop se teji se beet raha tha. As soon as she finished typing up all these little snippets from different sources scattered around the internet worldwide into one coherent piece of writing (which turned out to be quite lengthy), Sof√≠a realized how much she enjoyed this activity: collecting bits & pieces together into stories based upon what they represented rather than just being random scraps thrown away because no one could figure why anyone might want such things anymore? 

us pal se hi sofeea nafrat failti cheezon ke peechhe uthal-puthal machaalu vyavastha chaalaaki pradaan karni band kar deti . The next few weeks saw more articles emerge under her name which were incredibly popular among readers due largely part thanks to its unique approach towards exploring humanity's hidden depths within each other despite our differences between ourselves but also sometimes even those same ones we hold dearest too often forgetting where true beauty lies when faced head-to-head against adversities alone time after another endless cycle repeats itself overwhelmingly until finally breaking free once everything seems lost forever 

Generation 2: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is blogger by profession and she likes to write on social issues.
---
sofi ‡§è‡§ï 25 varsheey mahila thi jo ek peshevar lekhika aur soshal meediya prabhaavak ke roop mein kaam karti thin. ek baar ki baat hai, naadiya naam ka ek yuva aur prerit vyakti tha jo apne peshe ke roop mein blogring kar raha tha. Nadia was born into an average family with parents working as teachers at different schools across town. unhone skool jaana band kar diya jab ve chauthi kaksha tak thin taaki parivaar dabaav daal sake-unki maan ne faisla sunaaya ki uska beta kolej gaye bina adhyayan poora nahin ho paaraoga. apni padhaayiyon ke saath sangharsh karte huye, nainsi ne anya logon ke jeevan ke liye likhit patraachaar taiyaar karna seekha. saara ek peshevar lekhika thin jo apne bade paimaane par anuyaayiyon ke liye kavita aur laghu-katha post karke saahityik duniya mein badlaav la rahi hain. But Sarah remained focused throughout all this chaos that surrounded her daily life because she knew what success meant when you were constantly working towards your goals every day without fail.

unki lokapriyta tab charamotkarsh ban gayi jab ve antim samay mein radd huye upanyaaskaaro ke beech "da buks" naamak sabse naveentam thrilar padhin! And thus began their quest for truth behind these books which would take them across continents while making headlines everywhere they went.
