Generation 7: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is social scientist by profession and she wants to help the people of her village.
---
‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú‡§ø‡§ï ‡§µ‡•à‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§æ‡§®‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§∂‡§® ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ She was particularly drawn towards rural areas as it allowed for more personal connections with those living there. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§è‡§ï ‡§®‡§è ‡§ó‡§æ‡§Å‡§µ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¶‡•å‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§£‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∂‡•ã‡§ß ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡•Å‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡•Ä‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ 

As soon as Sarah arrived at the small hamlet nestled deep within the mountains, all eyes were on this young woman from outside their community. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§â‡§™‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§µ‡§ß‡§æ‡§® ‡§•‡•á‡•§ However, after some time spent observing them, they started opening up to her presence too.

‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ ‡§™‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ There are also issues like lack of education among women which leads to low literacy rates and limited opportunities. ‡§á‡§® ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§™‡§ü‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™‡§ø‡§§, ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ‡§è‡§Å ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ-‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§®‡•á‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡§¶‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§ú‡•Å‡§°‡§º‡§®‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡•§

Slowly but surely, Sarah managed to gain trust amongst the villagers through her empathy and patience. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§≤‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¨‡•ã‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•á, ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡§à ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§™‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•Å‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ For instance, one issue that had been bothering many residents involved accessibility - getting water or other basic necessities often meant long walks across rough terrain. ‡§á‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§¶‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ò‡§æ‡§Ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§è ‡§•‡•á‡•§ Another problem revolved around healthcare services being unavailable during certain hours due to staff not having enough training or resources available.

‡§á‡§® ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§¶‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§π‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§£ ‡§Ü‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§∂‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§à‡•§ With each new day came fresh challenges though, such as convincing local authorities to invest money into infrastructure improvements without any guarantees of success. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶, ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§£ ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§Æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§¢‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ö‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•Å‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§≤ ‡§â‡§™‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§Ø‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§®‡§à ‡§∏‡•Å‡§µ‡§ø‡§ß‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§£ ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ This led to an improvement in hygiene conditions along with increased educational outcomes for children.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ó‡§æ‡§Ç‡§µ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§®‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á 

Prompt: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is health advisor by profession

Generation 1: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is health advisor by profession and has to deal with the consequences of her own illness.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ‡§π‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Growing up surrounded by doctors and nurses had given her an appreciation for medicine that others didn't have. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤‡•á‡§ú ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ö‡§ø‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Ø‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§°‡§ø‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§∏‡•ç‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§â‡§™‡§æ‡§ß‡§ø ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She worked as intern at several hospitals before landing her dream job working under Dr. Sharma - one of the most respected physicians in town. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ-‡§µ‡§π ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§∞‡•ã‡§ó‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ‡§π ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ But when she was diagnosed herself with cancer, everything changed...

‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§≤‡§§ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ The tumor seemed small enough not cause any major problems but after some tests were done it turned out there wasn't much time left. ‡§°‡•â‡§ï‡•ç‡§ü‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø ‡§ó‡§Ç‡§≠‡•Ä‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§•‡•á ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§†‡•Ä‡§ï ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∏‡§Æ ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§à‡•§ After all, being sick wouldn't stop Sarah from helping people like them feel better too! ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ö‡§≤ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ñ‡§¨‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡•á ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§§‡•Ä‡§® ‡§Æ‡§π‡•Ä‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡§ö‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ It hit hard on both her body and mind.

‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§ï‡§Æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§¨‡§ö‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•å‡§ï‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡•á‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ So, without telling anyone else what happened or how long they would be around, she decided to make the best use of every moment. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡•à‡§Ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§™‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ They knew exactly where their pain points are because of this experience. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è, ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§•, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§® ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¨‡•ã‡§ß‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•á ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡•á ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§®‡§ú‡§∞‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§¶‡§æ‡§ú ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á‡•§ For instance, if someone wanted more information regarding medicines then she could help provide details such as dosage amount, side effects etc., which helped many patients overcome anxiety while going through treatments.

‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä, ‡§µ‡§π ‡§•‡§æ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•ã‡§ó‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§®‡§æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡§æ‡•§ Many times during treatment sessions, patients felt scared, anxious, sad or angry due to various reasons related to their condition. ‡§á‡§® ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§™‡§ü‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡•å‡§∞‡§æ‡§®, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á 

Generation 2: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is health advisor by profession and has to visit her father's place due some personal issues.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ‡§π‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had been working for years helping people live their best lives through proper nutrition, exercise routines, stress management techniques, etc., but there was one thing she couldn't help: the emotional well-being of those around us. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ê‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞‡§µ‡§æ‡§π ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§ï ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã‡§∂‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§

As soon as Sarah arrived at his house, it became clear that something wasn't right with him. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Å‡§∞‡•ç‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§¨‡•à‡§†‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ, ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§Å‡§ñ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ì‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§¶‡•á ‡§§‡•ã ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡•á‡§∂‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ He didn't say anything when he saw her or even acknowledge what they were doing until later on during dinner where he started asking questions like "How are you?" ‡§Ø‡§æ "‡§Ü‡§™ ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç?", ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á‡•§ It felt awkward because usually these types of conversations would be natural between them ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§

Sarah decided not to bring up any specific topics since this could potentially make things worse if he already knew how much troubled life he lived. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§ú‡§æ‡§Ø, ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§‡§ö‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ They talked about work, family members, hobbies, sports teams - everything except for his mental state which made her feel uncomfortable. ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡§ï, ‡§≠‡•ã‡§ú‡§® ‡§ñ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ, ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§µ‡§π ‡§â‡§† ‡§ó‡§à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§´‡§æ‡§à ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ï‡•â‡§´‡•Ä ‡§™‡•Ä‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡•à‡§† ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Ü‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø‡§ï ‡§µ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§µ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§ As soon as they got back into conversation again, it seemed like he finally opened up more than usual.

‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ, "‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ù‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ‡§π ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§™‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Ø‡§ï ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Ç‡•§" Then followed an explanation why he always kept himself isolated from everyone else. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡•Ä‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¨‡§ö‡§™‡§® ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•á‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§Ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡•å‡§∞‡§æ‡§® ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ His parents died early leaving behind only memories instead of love and support. ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∂‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§∏‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø ‡§™‡•à‡§¶‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡§Æ ‡§Ü‡§ú ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ But now, after all these years, I know better."

Generation 3: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is health advisor by profession.

do. saara jonsan ek svaasthya visheshagya thin jo apne kaam ke baare mein bhaavuk aur junooni donon theh logon ko svasth rakhna. However, one day she realized that something wasn't quite right...

But when I start feeling tired or even sick at times..."

us drift avdhi ke antim charnon mein, saara ko mushkil sahanasheelataavaadi banne ka ahsaas hua. ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡•á‡§µ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•à‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§§‡•Å‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡•Å‡§ï ‡§∞‡§π‡•á‡•§ Her parents were proud of what she did, but there seemed to be something missing - some unexplained feeling deep inside herself that made everything else seem insignificant compared to being able to spend quality moments together at home every day after work hours. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Å ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§§‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§â‡§™‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§Ç‡§ó‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡•Ä ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Despite this, Samantha decided not to give up hope, instead opting out of taking any paid leaves until her mom recovered completely so no matter where life took her next, she would have peace knowing that all her efforts went into making sure everyone around her remained happy and healthy.

saara ek svaasthya visheshagya ke roop mein kaam karti thi aur apne desh ki seva karte huye varshon se uski naukri ne use santusht mahsoos nahin hone diya hai jaisa ki unhona chaahegi. Generation 1: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is goalkeeper by profession.
---
saara ek golakeepar thi aur vah hamesha se khel ke baare mein junooni rahi hai. She was born with the passion for football and would spend hours practicing her skills on any available ball she could find around town or at home. saath hi usne apni shaikshanik upalabdhiyon par dhyaan diya taaki use acche kolej ya yahaan tak ki peshevar futbol teem ka hissa ban sake jo bhavishya ko dekh sakti ho. 

As Sarah grew older, so did her love of playing as an attacking midfielder rather than just being a defensive player. unhone har din abhyaas karna jaari rakha jaisa unhein pasand tha-apratispardhi pratiyogitaayen jeetkar aur gend niptane vaali mahatvapoorn sthiti paate huye lekin fir bhi majboot difes chalaana seekhte huye. However, it wasn't until high school that Sarah decided to take things more seriously - joining local teams where possible before eventually making progress towards becoming part of one of South Africa's top women's clubs.

jald hi sabse badi ladaayeepoorvak ladkiyo ne pakad liya! The team had won many trophies over their time together but they were always looking forward to what next season might bring them. niraash nahin honge agar ve haar jaate hain, balki vijyi dal ke roop mein adbhut cheejon ko praapt karke aanandit hote hain. They worked hard every day both during training sessions and matches alike which helped build confidence within themselves and ultimately led to winning some impressive titles along the way.

‡§Æ‡•à‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ó‡•ã‡§≤‡§ï‡•Ä‡§™‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Ever since she was little and had to wear the oversized shirt that went all the way up her chest as part of soccer practice or games, Maggie knew deep down inside herself that it would be an important role for someone like her - strong-willed but gentle at heart with a love of sporting competition. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ñ‡•á‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•ã‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§Ç‡§∏‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§ó‡§æ, ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§® ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ ‡§°‡§æ‡§≤‡•á‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•á‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ The feeling made her feel alive every time when she put on those big gloves and ran onto the field wearing her number one jersey which said "Maggie" across its front; it gave her confidence knowing no matter what happened out there during playtime, whether they won or lost, she could always count on being able to make crucial saves if needed without ever letting go of hope itself because then nothing else really matters anyway...

‡§è‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§´‡•Å‡§ü‡§¨‡•â‡§≤ ‡§ñ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She had grown up playing the game with her brothers and friends on their makeshift pitches around town. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ó‡•ã‡§≤‡§ï‡•Ä‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ç‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§à ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Å‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ The feeling of being between two worlds - protecting your teammates while also keeping an eye out for any danger that might come at you from behind or below was exhilarating to Alice. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§§ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§¨‡•ç‡§ú‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•å‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡•§ So when she got offered scholarship to play collegiate soccer as a keeper, it felt like fate itself opening its doors to welcome her into this new chapter of her life. ‡§è‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§µ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡•Ä‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ-‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡•Å‡§≤‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ö‡§ï ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡§º ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ But little did she know what challenges would lay ahead...

Generation 7: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is goalkeeper by profession and has to face the consequences of her actions when she accidentally kicks out one player from an important game.

‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ó‡•ã‡§≤‡§ï‡•Ä‡§™‡§∞ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had been playing this position for years now with great skill and dedication that earned her many accolades within her team as well as outside it too. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∑‡•ç‡§† ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§≠‡•Ç‡§≤‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ñ‡•á‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§™‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§¶‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ But today was different. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§â‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ The match they were supposedly going win against their arch-rivals seemed like slipping away because Sarah's own mistake caused them all to lose focus on what really mattered - winning!

‡§Ø‡§π ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§ó‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§°‡§º ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡§µ‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã‡§∂‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ö‡•Ç‡§ï ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç‡•§ Suddenly, everything went into slow motion as everyone around saw something happen which would change not only how things looked but also turn the tide towards their opponents. ‡§á‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§à ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç, ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•á‡§∑ ‡§π‡§Ç‡§ó‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§Ü‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ This time though, there wasn't any hesitation or delay at least initially. ‡§ñ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§°‡§º‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ó‡•ã‡§≤‡§ï‡•Ä‡§™‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§¶‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≤‡§æ‡§§ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§∂‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á, ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§ß‡§ï‡•á‡§≤ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§§‡§ø ‡§ß‡•Ä‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§ú‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§® ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è ‡§•‡§æ ‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•á ‡§õ‡•ã‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞‡•§ It took some time before anyone realized anything amiss since no injuries occurred during his fall either due to him being wearing protective gear and having landed awkwardly enough so he couldn't even roll over onto his back until later after getting up again.

‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§µ‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§ñ‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∂‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∞ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Her heart began racing faster than ever before while adrenaline rushed through every part of her body causing her hands shake uncontrollably. ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§°‡§º‡§¨‡§°‡§º ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ñ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§Æ‡•à‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ï‡•å‡§® ‡§∏‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ? Wasn't he good enough to play anymore? ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§ó‡§≤‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§§‡•ã ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ù‡•á ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡•ã‡§∑ ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ? These questions filled her mind making it impossible for her to think straight without feeling guilty

Generation 1: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is bowler by profession and her journey to become the best woman cricketer of India.
---
‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§ê‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§ñ‡•á‡§≤ ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§•‡•á‡•§ She was always fascinated with watching sports on TV or playing outdoor games like football or badminton with friends during breaks at school. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø, ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•á‡§ü ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ú‡•Å‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§∏‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§π‡•à‡•§ At that time, she didn't know much about women's cricket but had seen some highlighted matches from television coverage and admired how determined these players were despite facing numerous challenges along their path towards success.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§π ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à, ‡§µ‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§µ‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∞‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à‡•§ Her parents noticed this passion for sport and encouraged Aishwarya to pursue it further. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ‡§π ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§≠‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡•á‡§µ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§ Initially, though reluctant due to lacking proper facilities around them, they supported her decision wholeheartedly and provided whatever resources necessary such as equipment, training sessions etc., so long as she remained dedicated and focused.

‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞, ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§ø‡§® ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ, ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•Å‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§®‡§è ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Æ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ì‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ With hard work and determination came recognition within her community - people started noticing her talent and began offering supportive words which motivated her even more than before.

‡§Ö‡§∏‡•ç‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡§∂‡§ï ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§Ü‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•á‡§ü‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§à ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§ö ‡§≤‡•à‡§Ç‡§ó‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ Despite being discouraged several times throughout her career because of gender stereotypes, Aishvarya kept pushing herself harder every day until finally breaking through those barriers when she got selected into national team representing Indian Women Cricket Team at an international level tournament against Pakistan.

‡§â‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∑‡•ç‡§† ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•á‡§ü‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§∂‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ Overcoming all obstacles placed upon her while also maintaining balance between personal life & professional commitments made her one of the most respectable figures among peers across globe. 

Generation 2: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is bowler by profession and becomes captain of the national team.
---
‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§®‡•á ‡§ó‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡§¨‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡§§ ‡§π‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Her skill was unmatched as she had been practicing it for years. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ï‡§™‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§® ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡•á‡§§‡•É‡§§‡•ç‡§µ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ She worked hard to improve her game day after day until finally getting that chance when an injury led one of their star players out of action. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•å‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§Ø‡§æ!

The girl took on this opportunity with both hands. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≠‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§®‡§ú‡§º‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§®‡§à ‡§≠‡•Ç‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§§‡•à‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ As soon as they stepped onto the field, people could feel something special happening. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•á‡§°‡§ø‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ò‡•á‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ And indeed it did - from then onwards every ball delivered felt like magic.

‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§≤‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Å ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Æ‡•à‡§ö ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§°‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ Every single moment spent training paid off during those crucial matches where everything hinged upon winning or losing just one match at any given time. ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ó‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§´‡•á‡§Ç‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡•ã ‡§≠‡•Ä‡§°‡§º ‡§ú‡§Ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∑‡•ç‡§† ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ The girls were determined not only to win but also to give everyone watching them play the best possible performance they could muster up under pressure.

‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™ ‡§Ö‡§°‡§ø‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§¶‡•á‡§∂ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§â‡§® ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§® ‡§¶‡•á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á‡•§ They knew what victory meant because it would mean so much more than merely being victorious over another country's cricket team. ‡§á‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§ó‡•å‡§∞‡§µ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ, ‡§â‡§™‡§≤‡§¨‡•ç‡§ß‡§ø ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§á‡§§‡§ø‡§π‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á‡•§ It wasn't going to be easy though; there are always challenges ahead no matter how well prepared you might have thought yourself ready beforehand. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§è‡§Å ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§Ü‡§à ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§™‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§∑ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§´‡§≤ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§ú‡§∞‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§¶‡§æ‡§ú ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§®‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ 

Generation 3: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is bowler by profession.
---
‡§è‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§ó‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡§¨‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡•ã‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ As soon as she was old enough to hold the ball and roll it down her driveway, Alice knew that this would be what she wanted for life - nothing else mattered quite so much. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ó‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ò‡•Å‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§ó ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à-‡§è‡§ï ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§ö‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§®‡•Ä‡§ö‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ú‡•Å‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ù‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§µ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§

Alice's parents were supportive of their daughter's dream from day one. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§®‡§ó‡§ø‡§®‡§§ ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§è ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡§ï‡§®‡•Ä‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§π‡•à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ They watched with pride every time she hit the perfect strike or even if there wasn't an obvious success because they could see how determined she had been throughout all those hours spent on practice fields.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§è‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§æ‡§à ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§ñ‡•á‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§∏‡§∞‡§£ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ She joined several teams at school, including both boys' and girls', but eventually settled into playing only women's league games during weekends when possible due to scheduling conflicts within other commitments outside work/school etcetera...

‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§≠‡§≤‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§ï‡§à ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡•á‡§µ‡§∞ ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ó‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡§¨‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§∏‡•á‡§ü ‡§•‡•á, ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§è‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§£ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§è‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ And so, after graduating high school with honors (and many awards underneath), Elise decided to take matters further than ever before: she applied herself to become part of Team USA Women's Bowling team!

‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§Ø‡•Ç‡§è‡§∏‡§è ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§†‡§ø‡§® ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§ï ‡§¶‡•á‡§∂ ‡§∂‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ñ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§°‡§º‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ß‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§§‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§¶‡•á‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ But despite knowing full well just how challenging these events can get, Ellie remained undefeatedly confident in herself and her abilities which helped propel them towards greatness year upon year without fail until finally achieving international recognition alongside fellow members such as Michelle Jansen , Diane Thompson , Cindy Brandon among others .

‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§è‡§≤‡•Ä‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ ‡§ö‡•à‡§Ç‡§™‡§ø‡§Ø‡§® ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ó‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡§¨‡§æ‡§ú ‡§ò‡•ã‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§®‡§Ç‡§¨‡§∞ 1 ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ Her journey may have 

Generation 4: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is bowler by profession and she plays for her country's national team.
---
‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§∏‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§ó‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡§¨‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She was born into an athletic family where sports were highly valued. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ-‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§è‡§•‡§≤‡•Ä‡§ü ‡§•‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§Æ ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ñ‡•á‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Lena took to the sport of cricket naturally and soon became one of its greatest players. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡•Ä‡§¢‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡•Ä ‡§ó‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡§¨‡§æ‡§ú ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ Her parents couldn't have been prouder than they already are!

‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞‡§£-‡§™‡•ã‡§∑‡§£ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Despite this sacrifice, however, nothing could deter her from pursuing what she loved most - playing with passion and dedication on every pitch that came before her. ‡§≤‡§ø‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•à‡§ö ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§∏‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡•å‡§∞‡§æ‡§® ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∑‡•ç‡§† ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡§® ‡§π‡•ã ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§æ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§£ ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ó‡§π ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ And it did go right because she made history when she led India to victory at their first international tournament as well as becoming the youngest player ever selected onto Team India.

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶, ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§ø‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§≠‡•Ç‡§≤‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She continued working hard towards achieving more goals while also being mindful not only of her own performance but those around them too. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§®‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§§‡§æ, ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§§‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ü‡•Ç‡§ü ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§¨‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∂‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§£ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ú ‡§§‡§ï ‡§π‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¨ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ 

Generation 5: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is bowler by profession and plays for her country.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ó‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡§¨‡§æ‡§ú ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had been playing cricket since she was six years old and loved every moment of it. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§ó‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§â‡§õ‡§æ‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§≤‡•á‡§¨‡§æ‡§ú‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ó ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§°‡§∞ ‡§™‡•à‡§¶‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ As soon as the ball left her hand with its perfect spin, Sarah knew that there would be no stopping them from scoring runs on this day. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§™‡§ø‡§ö ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§¶‡•Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ It wasn't just her skill or dedication - it was something more than that which made people watch out when they saw her take to the field. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∂‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§Æ‡§§‡§ø ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á‡§ó‡§æ ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ó‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡§¨‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡•á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä-‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡•á ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§® ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡•á‡•§ 

Generation 6: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is bowler by profession.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§ú‡§¨‡•Ç‡§§ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≠‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had always been passionate and determined to achieve her dreams of becoming one of the best bowlers on the cricket field. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§è‡§ï‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§ê‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•á‡§ü ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ At an early age, she started practicing with pencils instead of balls just as any other kid would do it for their favorite sports. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ó‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡§¨‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Every day after school or work, Sarah went out into the backyard where there was enough space to practice all kinds of shots without disturbing anyone else around.

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§¶‡•ã‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§ñ‡•á‡§≤ ‡§ñ‡•á‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡•á‡§ü ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ó‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡•ã‡§∏‡•ç‡§§ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ü‡§â‡§ü ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§§‡•ã ‡§≠‡•Ä‡§°‡§º ‡§ú‡§Ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ It wasn't until then that Sarah realized how much joy this game brought not only herself but everyone watching them play too! ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§Ü‡§§ ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Over time, Sarah became more confident when playing games against friends at home while also participating competitively during tournaments outside her hometown. ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ, ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ó‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§´‡•á‡§Ç‡§ï‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Her skills were now unmatched among others like hers.

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ó‡•É‡§π‡§®‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ü‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç‡§ü‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ß‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡•å‡§∞‡§æ‡§®, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã‡§∂‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ Even though they didn't win every single match, each victory felt sweet because it meant overcoming obstacles along the way towards achieving success. ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§•, ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§∂ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§à ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤‡•á‡§ú ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§æ‡§â‡§ü‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ó‡§è ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∞‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Ä‡•§ Despite being young still, Sarah knew what opportunities lay ahead - if you want something bad enough, anything can happen. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§§‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§§‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§á‡§∞‡§æ‡§¶‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•à‡§ö ‡§ñ‡•á‡§≤‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ‡•§ 

Generation 7: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is bowler by profession and becomes the first woman to take 10 wickets for her country.
---
‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ó‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡§¨‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ She would spend hours on end practicing at home or with friends, honing every technique she could think of until it was perfected. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ó‡§π ‡§¶‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§à ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•á ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ß‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ It wasn't long before they were noticed by scouts from all over the world - but none more so than those back home where cricket had become an obsession among young girls like themselves.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§π ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à, ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ó‡§Ç‡§≠‡•Ä‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§∂ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•á‡§ü ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§π‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡•á‡•§ Her parents supported this ambition wholeheartedly and encouraged their daughter to work hard towards achieving them. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡§ó‡§ø‡§®‡§§ ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§§‡§ï‡§®‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•Å‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Ä‡•§ And eventually, after years of dedication and perseverance, that dream came true when she made history as the first ever female player to pick up ten wickets during one match against another nation. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§∏‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§â‡§™‡§≤‡§¨‡•ç‡§ß‡§ø ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•á ‡§ñ‡•á‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≠‡•Ä‡§§‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Ä‡•§

The girl became something of a celebrity overnight, receiving congratulatory messages pouring into social media accounts and interviews being lined up left right center. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡§ø‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§ø ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à ‡§µ‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§µ‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§§‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ Everyone wanted a piece of what seemed like magic coming out of nowhere. ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§‡§ö‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ But despite everything happening around her, she remained grounded, humble and focused on making sure everyone knew how much effort went behind each success.

‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ö ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•à, ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§¨‡§ö‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ The road ahead will be tougher still because there are many obstacles standing between her and greatness. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø, ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§µ‡§æ ‡§ñ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§£ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§µ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§™‡§æ‡§¶‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡•§ With time, determination and talent combined with good mentorship, anything can happen. 

Prompt: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is batsman by profession

Generation 1: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is batsman by profession and she has to play against the strongest team of cricket world.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§•‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•á‡§ü ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ñ‡•á‡§≤ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ó‡§π‡§∞‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ From an early age, her parents had encouraged her passion for sports as they believed it was essential that young girls develop their physical strength through activities like athletics or sporting events. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§≤‡•á‡§¨‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§Ü‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ 

As Samantha grew older, so did her love for playing this game. ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ-‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§ó ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§à ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•á‡§ü‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡§≤‡§æ‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ She took up every opportunity with great enthusiasm and soon became one of those rare women whose name resonated throughout all corners of the globe when it came to cricket matches. 

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§∞‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡•à‡§ö ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§•‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡§É "‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∑‡•ç‡§† ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ñ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§´ ‡§ñ‡•á‡§≤‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Ç!" And now here I am! ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ù‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶‡•Ä‡§¶‡§æ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ, ‡§á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•ç‡§≤‡•à‡§Ç‡§° ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ñ‡•á‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•å‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ It's going to be tough but nothing worth having ever comes easy." ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Æ‡•à‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ñ‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä, ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§°‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ß‡§°‡§º‡§ï ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ The sound of fans cheering behind her could almost drown out everything else around them - except maybe the occasional whistle from another player. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§§‡§ï ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ There were still two overs left before any runs would count towards England's total scoreboard at Lord's Cricket Ground on Sunday afternoon. 

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ó‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§≤‡•á‡§¨‡§æ‡§ú ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§§‡•à‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§è ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§Ç‡§¶‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤ ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ Her heart races faster than usual because there are only three balls remaining until she can make history if she hits just right. ‡§≠‡•Ä‡§°‡§º ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ö‡§ø‡§≤‡•ç‡§≤‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§¨‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ó‡§π‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ç‡§∏ ‡§≤‡•á‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Finally, after what seemed like forever, the ball arrived back into view again. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§†‡•Ä ‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§§‡•à‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§¨‡•á‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ó‡§≤‡§§ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ö‡•Ç‡§ï ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡•§ So instead of thinking too much ahead, he swung his bat downwards without hesitation. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§ó‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§™‡§ø‡§ö ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§®‡§ø‡§ï‡§≤ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ But then something unexpected happened: the

Generation 3: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is batsman by profession.

‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•á‡§ü‡§∞ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had been playing the sport for as long she could remember and her love of cricket knew no bounds. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§ó‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã‡§∂‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§•‡§æ-‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ü‡§ï‡§∞‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§™‡§ø‡§ö ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§•, ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∞‡•ã‡§ß‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ ‡§°‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡§∞‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§•‡•á‡•§ 

Sarah was not just talented - but also ambitious when it came to women's sports. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ú‡•ã‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ñ‡•á‡§≤ ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§™‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ñ‡•á‡§≤‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ñ‡•á‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§æ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•á‡•§ Her passionate advocacy led other girls from their village to join local teams too!

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§™‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§® ‡§¨‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§ø‡§õ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§™‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à‡•§ It wasn't an easy task since there were many players with more experience than hers. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Æ‡•à‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ The team started performing better under Sarah's leadership, winning matches they once lost before. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•á‡§ü ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ó‡§Ç‡§≠‡•Ä‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§™‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§∑ ‡§ñ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§°‡§º‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§

Despite this success on field, offfield issues began cropping up. ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§® ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ñ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§´ ‡§Æ‡•à‡§ö ‡§ñ‡•á‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§á‡§®‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§ñ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ This discrimination made them lose out some important games which meant that now, instead of being celebrated, these victories seemed like nothing special at all because nobody took notice of those wins anymore. 

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§á‡§® ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ö ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡§æ ‡§§‡•ã ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è‡•§ So, after consulting fellow members of the team, she decided to take matters into her own hands. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•á‡§ü ‡§Æ‡•à‡§ö‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ó‡§Ç‡§≠‡•Ä‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§™‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ñ‡•á‡•§ They urged people across India to support such initiatives so everyone can enjoy watching high quality Women Cricket matches without any biases or prejudices towards gender.

‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞, ‡§Æ‡§π‡•Ä‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶, ‡§¶‡•á‡§∂ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§à ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡•á ‡§ó‡§è ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§∞‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ü‡•Ä20 ‡§ü‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç‡§ü ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü‡•§ Everyone wanted tickets to see top international stars play live while supporting Indian women athletes as well. ‡§≠‡•Ä‡§°‡§º ‡§â‡§Æ‡§°‡§º ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§ï ‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§®‡§ø‡§ß‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§µ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä

---
‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡•Å‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Sarah was not just any woman; she had an extraordinary talent for cricketing that made her stand out from the rest of them. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ñ‡•á‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•á‡§ü ‡§ñ‡•á‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Å‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§™‡•à‡§¶‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§ú‡§¨‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§õ‡•Ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ 

Sarah's parents were proud and supportive of their daughter's passion towards sports but they also knew how difficult it would be to make ends meet as professional players with no financial backing. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§∏‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡•á‡§µ‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ß‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§π ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ Nevertheless, this did nothing more than fuelled up her desire even stronger making her determined never give up on what makes her happy.

‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§â‡§™‡§≤‡§¨‡•ç‡§ß ‡§® ‡§π‡•ã ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§≤‡•á‡§¨‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§∂‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á‡•§ She trained every day after school under the tutelage of local coaches who recognized both her potential and dedication to become one among best batters worldwide. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§è‡•§

With hard work came success, and soon enough people started recognizing Sarah as someone special because of her amazingly consistent batting skills which earned her many awards at various tournaments across town. ‡§á‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü-‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡•á‡§µ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•á‡§ü‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ‡•§

Despite being successful, there are still some challenges ahead of her like maintaining consistency or injuries while playing matches all year round without breaks due to lack of proper facilities and fundings provided by teams. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§≠‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§â‡§ú‡•ç‡§ú‡•ç‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡•á ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§†‡§ø‡§® ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§® ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡•§ 

Generation 5: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is batsman by profession. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•á‡§ü ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ñ‡•á‡§≤ ‡§ñ‡•á‡§≤‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ She plays the game with full passion and love for it. ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡•ã‡§ö ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ‡§π ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§µ‡§π ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§®‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§§‡•ã ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ One day she gets injured while playing cricket because of which her coach advises to take rest but instead of listening what he says she decides to play next match without taking any proper training or practice. ‡§Æ‡•à‡§ö ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ó‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§® ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ò‡§¨‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ In that very first ball they bowled out their teammate so when they went on field again they were nervous as well due to lack of confidence . ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ó‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡§¨‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§ñ‡§∞‡§æ‡§¨ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∞‡§® ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§π‡•à‡§∞‡§æ‡§® ‡§∞‡§π ‡§ó‡§è‡•§ The whole crowd was booing at them after seeing such bad performance from one player.
---
‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§≤‡•á‡§¨‡§æ‡§ú ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§≤‡•á‡§¨‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§É ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä 1 

Generation 6: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is batsman by profession.
---
‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§µ‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§∂ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•á‡§ü ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§π‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ She was determined to make her dreams come true and worked hard every day towards that goal with the support of those around her. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§® ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§ü‡•Ç‡§ü ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§

One fine morning when she woke up early before sunrise, she could feel something stirring within herself. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§Å‡§ñ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§≤‡•Ä‡§Ç, ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§§‡•á‡§ú ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§® ‡§¶‡•å‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ-‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•à? What would be his first step on this journey he had embarked upon so long ago?

‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º‡§§‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡•Ä ‡§§‡•ã ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ As soon as it started getting light outside, she went out for practice sessions which were conducted regularly at different locations throughout town where other cricketers gathered together under one roof - all sharing their skills and knowledge while working tirelessly toward achieving greatness.

‡§π‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§¨‡§π ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ñ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§°‡§º‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§∏‡•Å‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡•Ä‡§ï‡§∞‡§£ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡•§ They encouraged each other's progress and provided valuable feedback during training sessions, helping them improve further along their way. ‡§á‡§® ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è, ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Æ‡§ú‡§¨‡•Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç, ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ó‡•Å‡§ú‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§™‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Ü‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§

She knew what needed to happen next: more hours spent practicing alone or playing against opponents in friendly matches until they became better acquaintances than strangers. ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§ö, ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•á‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•Å‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á, ‡§§‡§ï‡§®‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∞‡§£‡§®‡•Ä‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§≠‡§µ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§à ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡•É‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§ø ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§ Her dedication paid off eventually because finally after years worth of hard work and perseverance, she got selected into India national team squad!

‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ö ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ With tears streaming down her face, she looked back over everything that led her here today. ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ ‡§°‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ-‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§≤‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡•á ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§® ‡§≤‡§ó‡•á‡•§ Their unwavering love and belief gave 

Generation 7: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is batsman by profession and has to face many challenges due to her gender.
---
saara ek pratibhaashaali besbol khilaadi thin jo apne ling ke baavjood peshe se sammaanit hone ka sapna dekhti hain. She grew up playing with the boys on their team but was always discouraged from pursuing baseball as an adult because of society's belief that women were not capable enough for such tasks. 18 saal ki umra mein unhone faisla kar liya tha aur ab vah maidaani ilaakon par dher ho gayi ladkiyo ko chunautiyon dene ja rahi hain jinka ve aanand lete huye badi hoti hain-besbol teem mein shuruaati sthaanon tak pahunchti hain. Sarah had faced several obstacles throughout her career - including sexism at work and being overlooked or even ridiculed when she tried out for teams despite having better skills than some male players . unhein sabse adbhut cheejon ne nahin bataaya gaya tha; yahaan tak ki purush samarthkon ya anyatha imaandaari vaale logon se avishvaas praapt na honge. Despite all these setbacks, Sarah remained determined to prove herself worthy through hardwork and perseverance which ultimately led her towards success. uske paas sahayogiyon, doston aur darshakon donon ka poora samarthan tha taaki use tab tak protsaahit kiya ja sake jab tak ki antatah har vyaktigat prayaas safal nahin ho jaaye! 

Prompt: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is SocialWorker by profession

Generation 1: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is SocialWorker by profession and lives with her family.
---
saara ne kabhi bade hone ka sapna nahin dekha tha ki vah ek saamaajik shramak ke roop mein apne peshe ko chhodkar aur duniya par sakaaraatmak prabhaav daalte huye logon se milti hai. She had always been drawn to helping others from an early age - whether it was through volunteer work or simply being there for those around them when they needed someone most. 

unke maata-pita donon hi doktar the jo unhein acchi tarah jaante the lekin unhone jis udyog ya vyavastha mein pravesh karna chaaha usmein ve alag thin. Her parents were proud as well because she earned good marks while doing so much else on top of everything like cooking dinner every night, taking care of all their needs etcetera.

raayamand naamak sthaan lagbhag das laakh nivaasiyon vaala sayantron nagri banch samudaay hai. It has many schools, hospitals, malls, restaurants, banks, entertainment centers, office buildings, churches, mosques and other places where people can get help if need be. sabse badi baadhyakaari cheej gareebiyanko rokni hoti hai evan jeevan starko sudridhtaki prayojnakta tak seemit rakhlaani padti hai. The city government works hard towards this end, and its efforts have paid off over time.

shreemti smith naamak ek bujurg vidhuva maidma sarvottambhoot seva paaneka ummeedthokai atirikt madadaateevarkake liye aa rahin thi. Generation 3: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is SocialWorker by profession.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§è‡§Æ‡•ç‡§¨‡§∞ ‡§®‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∏‡§Æ ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§à‡•§ She was determined to help those less fortunate and make their lives better than before. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ó ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≠‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§¶‡§Ø‡§æ‡§≤‡•Å ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§π‡•Ä‡§® ‡§ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ê‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§≤‡•á ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Amber had always been passionate about helping people but it wasn't until she graduated with her degree that the reality of what social workers truly do became clear: they are advocates for change on behalf of individuals or groups whose voices may not be heard otherwise.

‡§è‡§Æ‡•ç‡§¨‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§™‡§ü‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à-‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§®‡•á ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Her first job as an intern at a local shelter provided some valuable experience which helped shape how she approached each case from then on out - empathizing with clients while also being realistic when needed.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ú‡§∂‡•ç‡§® ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§è‡§Æ‡•ç‡§¨‡§∞ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ó‡§π ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ So she set off towards further education where she learned more techniques like crisis intervention skills, cultural competence training, assessment tools & methods etc., all designed specifically tailored toward addressing individual needs within diverse communities across various settings (e.g hospitals/clinics). ‡§á‡§® ‡§®‡§à ‡§§‡§ï‡§®‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§® ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§ú‡•Å‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•Å‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ò‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§

As time passed, Amber found herself working tirelessly day after night because there were so many cases needing attention. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø, ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§™‡§≤‡§¨‡•ç‡§ß‡§ø ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§®‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ‡•§ One particular instance stands out vividly; a young girl came into contact with one of our shelters seeking refuge due to domestic violence issues. ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§Æ‡§ú‡•ã‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§Å‡§ñ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§°‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ However, through patience and perseverance over several weeks, we managed to build up trust between us allowing her to open up safely without fear. ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¨ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§µ‡§π ‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§à‡•§

cases of abuse and neglect that left her emotionally drained. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§® ‡§¨‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§≠‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•á‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ Amber was dedicated to helping those most at risk - children and families struggling through poverty or trauma. ‡§ê‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§à ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§™‡§≤‡§¨‡•ç‡§ß ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§ß‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä‡•§ She knew it wasn't just the job but also their passion for making positive change in people's lives. ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶, ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§Ü‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ The long hours, unpredictable schedules, and emotional strain were not easy on anyone. ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä, ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§¨‡§∞ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∑‡•ç‡§† ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ "‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡•á‡§µ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§†‡§ø‡§® ‡§π‡•à, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§π‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ"-‡§è‡§Æ‡•ç‡§¨‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Å ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡•á‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤‡•á‡§ú ‡§ó‡§à ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Despite these challenges, there are moments where social workers find fulfillment in what they do. ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡•á ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡§§‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡•Å‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§¨‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö‡•á ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¶‡•Å‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§ö‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç, ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ò‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§∞‡§§ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡•Å‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§Ø‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•Ä‡§õ‡•á ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã‡§ñ‡§ø‡§Æ ‡§≠‡§∞‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ For many individuals like Amber, being able to help others overcome obstacles gives them hope while knowing they have made an impact even if only one life has been changed as a result.
