‡§∏‡•ã‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï‡§∞‡§É ‡§ú‡•á‡§® ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She grew up with her mother and two younger siblings after their father abandoned the family when she was just five years old. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Å ‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•á ‡§¨‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§§‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§≠‡§æ‡§à-‡§¨‡§π‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ As Jane got older, they were all forced to work long hours at various jobs for little pay or no money at all. ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞, ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§≠‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶‡§æ ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ 

As an adult, Jen decided that it's time to make things right for herself as well as others like them. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§Ö‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Ø‡§® ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§â‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§à ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡•Ä‡•§ After graduation, she took on internships where she worked alongside seasoned social workers while learning valuable skills from experienced mentors. ‡§á‡§® ‡§á‡§Ç‡§ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§®‡§∂‡§ø‡§™‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≠‡•Ä‡§§‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§≠‡•Ç‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Å‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∞‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ú‡•Å‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§≤ ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ In addition, these experiences allowed Jennifer to develop strong communication skills, empathy towards people struggling with mental health issues, poverty, domestic violence, drug addiction, etc., among other challenges facing society today. 

‡§ú‡•á‡§®‡§ø‡§´‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§∏‡•á‡§Ç‡§∏ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡§ó‡§ø‡§®‡§§ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Her dedication has earned her recognition both within and outside of the field - including awards such as "Most Committed To Helping Others" award given out annually during National Volunteer Week (in May). ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§§‡•ã‡§∑‡§ú‡§®‡§ï ‡§π‡•à, ‡§ú‡•á‡§®‡§ø‡§´‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§â‡§® ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§Ç‡§∏‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Ü‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§π‡§æ‡§Ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Every day brings new opportunities for growth through helping those most vulnerable members of our community overcome obstacles so we can live happier lives together! 

Generation 6: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is SocialWorker by profession and lives alone.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§è‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç‡§ü ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ñ‡§ø‡§°‡§º‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ‡•§ It was her first day of work after returning from vacation with the hope that everything would be fine at home when she left for office again. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§Å‡§ñ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§â‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Her mother had passed away while Emily was on leave. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§§‡§¨‡§æ‡§π ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•Å‡§ñ‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§ñ‡§¨‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§ß‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡§æ-‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•á‡§≤‡•á ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ She couldn't even call anyone as all were busy preparing to welcome back their own loved ones. 

‡§è‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡§æ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§à ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•á‡§¶‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§à‡•§ There wasn't any family support or help available because they lived far apart so it felt like an uphill task trying to manage things herself. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ, ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§≤‡§Ç‡§¨‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§§‡§ï ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§•‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§á‡§Ç‡§§‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ The emotional turmoil combined with financial struggles made life difficult but Emily didn't give up easily - instead, she took charge of what little control over situations existed within reach. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ó‡•Å‡§ú‡§∞ ‡§ö‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§§‡•ã ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§†‡§ø‡§® ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ With no one else around to lean upon, Emmy decided not to let this situation bring down her spirits.

‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§™‡§∏ ‡§Ü‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡•Å‡§¨‡§π ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü‡•§ As usual, Emma got ready quickly before leaving early morning to avoid traffic jams which usually happened during peak hours due to heavy vehicular movement caused mainly owed to commuters heading towards offices. ‡§è‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§°‡§º‡§ï ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§¶‡•á‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∂‡§π‡§∞ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§Æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ However, once inside the building where she worked, Emmi found solace among colleagues whom she could count on. ‡§∏‡§π‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ü ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ó‡•Å‡§ú‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§® ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ They also offered practical solutions such as providing food items to cook meals without having to go out.

‡§è‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§≤‡§Ø ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§¶‡•ã‡§™‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≠‡•ã‡§ú‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡•å‡§∞‡§æ‡§® ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ñ‡•ã ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§‡§ö‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ù‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§≠‡§µ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ Sometimes she wondered why God chose 

Generation 7: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is SocialWorker by profession.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§Ø‡§æ‡§≤‡•Å ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡•Å‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ She had always been passionate about helping people and making the world around her better for everyone to enjoy. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Å‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§Ø ‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ ‡§°‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§ Sarah was determined that she could make a difference no matter how small or big it may be.

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡•Ä‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Å‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§π‡•à‡•§ As soon as she started working there, she found herself surrounded with like-minded individuals dedicated towards improving society through their work. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡§§‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§π‡§æ‡§Ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ‡§è‡§Å ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ From providing counseling services to assist those struggling emotionally, from offering guidance on career development programs to supporting victims of domestic violence - everything seemed worthwhile when done rightly.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ, ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∂‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§® ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ One day while attending an event at one of her clients' homes, where they were celebrating their successes, she realized just what kind of impact social workers can have if we use our skills wisely. ‡§µ‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§ñ‡§°‡§º‡•á ‡§π‡•ã‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂ ‡§•‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§∂‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§π‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§â‡§® ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§¨‡§ø‡§®‡§æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ It made her realize why being a part of this field meant so much more than just earning money - it gave meaningful value back into someone else's life.

‡§â‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§∏‡•á, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ü‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ç‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•à, ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡•á ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§® ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡•á‡•§ With each passing year, she continued learning new ways to improve lives, whether it involved teaching classes or organizing community events aimed toward promoting awareness among different groups within society. ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞, ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§®‡§è ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡§≤‡§æ‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ The best reward came not only from seeing others succeed but also knowing that you played your role well enough to help them achieve something great!

saara ek kushal lekha visheshagya thin jinhone apne poore jeevan mein sateekta aur dridhta ke saath kaam kiya tha. As Sarah sat down with clients from different companies during weekly meetings, it was clear that many businesses were struggling financially due to poor decision making or lacking proper planning strategies - something which they could have avoided if only someone like herself would be there earlier on board! 

isliye uski teem ne graafiks jaise drishyamaan upakran taiyaaron aur prastutiyon ko ikattha karne sahit alpakaalik lakshyon ya uddeshyon vaale abhinav samayseema rananeetiyon ko laagu karna shuru kar diya. They also encouraged their colleagues across departments such as sales/marketing etc., so everyone knew what needed improvement & how best we can achieve our targets within set timeframes effectively without compromising quality standards while ensuring profitability remains high throughout all operations .

Generation 4: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is account advisor by profession and has to save her client's company from being acquired.
---
jooliya ko kabhi bada hone ka mauka nahin mila tha. She grew up on the wrong side of town with parents that didn't know how much they loved their daughter until she was almost gone - too late for them to do anything but pray at Julia's bedside while waiting anxiously outside hospital rooms as doctors fought over whether or not it would be possible to bring her back. yah ek antheen lambaayi ki baat haih jald hi ve uske saath aspataal se chale gaye aur use apne niji jeevan mein vaapas laane ke liye jo sabse accha kar sakte the vah unhein pachhaad diya-aur unhone safar tikna shuru kar dekha. They had never been able to afford private schools or even proper healthcare so when Julie got sick, there wasn't anyone around willing to spend money trying to make things better than what they were already getting out of life anyway. lekin fir achaanak cheejon ne badlaav dikhna band na kar paaya. Her grandparents came through with some savings left behind after moving away years ago, which helped pay off medical debts long enough before another major illness struck again leaving nothing more than memories stuck inside her head like dust motes caught between two curtained windowsills during sunset hours...and then something else happened: one day someone walked into her office and told her he wanted help saving his family business from going bankrupt because no matter how hard we tried, everything seemed impossible until now.

be used to solve complex problems. ‡§π‡§æ‡§à ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§è ‡§™‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á different industries such as healthcare, retail businesses or real estate companies etc., helping them navigate their finances better. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ó‡§à‡•§ Her job required exceptional attention-to-detail skills combined with excellent communication abilities that allowed her to build strong relationships while maintaining transparency between herself & client's expectations/requirements. ‡§è‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡•á‡§µ‡§∞ ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§∏‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§´‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ó‡§è ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§®‡§§ ‡§™‡§¶‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•á‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§™‡§• ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ Overall she found great satisfaction knowing how much impact one can have on others through proper management of money which would make things run smoothly without any hiccups along its path. 

Generation 6: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is account advisor by profession. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§è‡§ï‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She has to manage her personal life and work responsibilities together without any support from anyone else. ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ê‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø‡§ï‡•ã‡§£ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§§‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ú‡§ø‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•á‡§¶‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã‡§∂‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡•§ The protagonist should face several challenges throughout the course of events that could be related but not limited only to financial problems or family issues.
---
‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§™‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§∏‡§ñ‡•ç‡§§ ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ As an Account Adviser for one of Australia's largest companies, she had always been good with numbers - they came naturally to her. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§ø ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§ï‡§†‡§ø‡§®‡§æ‡§á‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§≤‡§ü ‡§ó‡§à‡•§ Lena was suddenly responsible for providing everything financially for their two children while also trying to balance both home duties as well as working full-time at her job. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ There were days when it seemed like there wasn't enough hours left on Earth just to get through all the tasks before collapsing into bed exhausted. ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º‡§§‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä, ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ One day, during lunch break, someone asked if he would recommend his bank because "they have great interest rates." ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§ú‡§µ‡§æ‡§¨ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, "‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§¨‡•à‡§Ç‡§ï ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Å!" That simple act gave him such confidence in what I did best! ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ù‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Å‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§¨‡•à‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ Despite being overwhelmed most times, I kept pushing forward. ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡§æ ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§∞‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ‡•§ But then again, my heart told me differently. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ, '‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ù‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§¶‡§ø ‡§Ü‡§™ ‡§π‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§Æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§π‡§Æ ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§•‡§ï ‡§ó‡§è ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ It might help us save some money.' ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§π‡§Æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ With every passing weekend, we got closer to our goal: having more time off. ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡§Æ‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ We spent quality moments watching movies, cooking food and playing games together. ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§π‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§ú‡§¨‡•Ç‡§§ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡•á ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡•§ Throughout this journey, Lina realized how much love can drive people towards success despite facing obstacles along the way. ‡§â‡§® ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§à ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø

‡§®‡•á‡§ü‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•á‡§∑‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§§‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§≤ ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ becoming Head of Investments for Goldman Sachs Group Inc., one of America's most prestigious investment banks. ‡§ó‡•ã‡§≤‡•ç‡§°‡§Æ‡•à‡§® ‡§∏‡•à‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡•á Generation 1: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is beginner elementary by profession and has no experience with the subject.
---
‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§µ‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä-‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§®‡§è ‡§∂‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§•‡•Ä, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had always loved writing stories but never thought of it as something she could make her career out of until one day when an ad came up for a writer's assistant at a local publishing house. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Ü‡§µ‡•á‡§¶‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•å‡§ï‡§æ ‡§π‡•à! 

When Sarah arrived on the interview date, she was greeted warmly by the receptionist before being led into the office where they would be conducting interviews that morning. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∞‡§ø‡§∏‡•á‡§™‡•ç‡§∂‡§®‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§µ‡§ø‡§¶‡§æ ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ, ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞ ‡§ò‡§¨‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ü ‡§™‡•à‡§¶‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§≤‡§Æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡•á‡§∂ ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ö‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à‡•§ The first thing she noticed upon entering were two desks facing each other across from the doorway - both occupied by women dressed smartly in suits and ties.

‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§ö‡§Ø ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§á‡§Ç‡§§‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¨‡•à‡§† ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ "Hi," said Sarah nervously after introducing herself to them while taking note of their names which turned out to be Mary Ann and Lily respectively. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§≠‡§µ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ‡§® ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•Ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Æ‡•à‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§è‡§® ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§≠‡§µ‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§¨‡§ï‡§ø ‡§≤‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ö‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§ó‡•à‡§∞-‡§ï‡§•‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•á‡§∑‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§§‡§æ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ They also asked if Sarah knew anything specific or relevant regarding what kind of books this particular publisher published. ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§ø‡§Ç‡§¶‡•Å ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ò‡§¨‡§∞‡§æ‡§à ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ú‡§µ‡§æ‡§¨ ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§§‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•Å‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∂‡•à‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ñ‡•á ‡§ó‡§è ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§¶‡•á‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§™‡§æ‡§†‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ This seemed like enough information so they moved onto asking more personal questions such as why did she want to work here? ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶‡•Ä‡§¶‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ‡§ï ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ? And how much do you know about our company?"

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§™‡•Ç‡§õ‡§§‡§æ‡§õ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§®‡§∏‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶ ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ After answering all these questions satisfactorily, the three ladies shook hands goodbye and promised to get back within twenty four hours whether there was any news or not. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏ 

Generation 2: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is beginner elementary by profession and has an amazing talent for writing.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§•‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ It was her passion since she could remember anything else besides reading books. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§Ü‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∂‡•ã‡§∞‡§æ‡§µ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ñ‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§∂‡•å‡§ï ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ‡•§ She never thought that one day this hobby would become more than just something to do on the side of other responsibilities like school or work - it became Samantha's full-time job! ‡§ê‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§® ‡§≤‡•á‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∂‡§ø‡§§ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•á‡§ó‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ But as time went on, she realized how much effort goes into every single word written down and soon enough found herself with several publications under her belt.

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§•‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ, "‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§Ç‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ù‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Å‡•§" So she started submitting pieces here and there without any expectations but always hoping they might get published somewhere someday. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§§‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ‡§ï ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡§£‡§æ ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§ó ‡§≤‡§ó‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ From then on, Samantha poured all her energy and focus towards becoming better at what she loved doing most: writing stories that people will enjoy reading.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§∏‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§à, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ‡§® ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•Å‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∂‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ Her first book came out when she decided not to give up so easily anymore. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§à ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§™‡•Å‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§∂‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§ö‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ With each new publication, she learned even more from others around them which made her skills grow exponentially overnight. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§§‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ñ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ó‡•Å‡§ú‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ 

Generation 3: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is beginner elementary by profession and has to work for an agency that handles emergency cases.
---
emili ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§ú‡§¨‡•Ç‡§§ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§§‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ She had always worked hard towards her goals without any help from anyone else. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§•‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡§æ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ Emily was now working as the only agent at a small-scale crisis management company located on 2nd Avenue. ‡§è‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§§‡§ï ‡§è‡§ú‡•á‡§Ç‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§¨‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ The first few weeks were difficult but with patience she started learning how things really worked here. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§≠‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§â‡§ú‡•ç‡§ú‡•ç‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ One day while going through some old files of past clients' data, she came across one particular case which caught her attention immediately. ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡•á "‡§¶ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á‡§∏" ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡•§ It involved three young girls aged between seven years to twelve years whose parents reported them missing after they failed to return home from school during their usual time slot. ‡§è‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§≤‡§æ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§ö‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Her mother went out shopping when Emma left alone for playing outside near her house. ‡§¶‡•ã ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡•á ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§à ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•á‡§∂‡§® ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Å ‡§®‡•á ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§Ø‡§§ ‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§ú ‡§ï‡§∞‡§æ‡§à‡•§ After searching around nearby areas where people could have taken her away or kidnapped her, police decided it would be best if they kept looking until something new comes up. ‡§§‡•Ä‡§® ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§ö‡•Å‡§ï‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ø‡§™‡•ã‡§∞‡•ç‡§ü ‡§Ü‡§à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§§‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§á‡§∏‡§æ‡§¨‡•á‡§≤ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§∏‡§æ‡§§ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡•Ä‡§∏‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§æ‡§Ø‡§¨ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Isabelle too lived close enough so this seemed like another coincidence. ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä‡§¨ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§¢‡§º‡•á ‡§õ‡§π ‡§¨‡§ú‡•á ‡§ö‡•å‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§ø‡§Æ ‡§∞‡§ø‡§™‡•ã‡§∞‡•ç‡§ü ‡§Ü‡§à‡•§ This girl named Leila also disappeared just two blocks down from Isabelle's place. ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡§π ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§¨‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§Æ ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡•Å ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ó ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ All these reports led back into each other because all children belonged to same neighbourhood. ‡§á‡§® ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Æ‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§ö‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ As per protocol, investigators looked over everything again including interviews conducted earlier. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ö‡•Ç‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§ó-‡§Ö‡§≤‡§ó ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡•ã‡§∏‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∂‡§π‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á, ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ö ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§è‡§ú‡•á‡§Ç‡§∏‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§´‡§¨‡•Ä‡§Ü‡§à ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§Ü‡§à‡§ü‡•Ä‡§à‡§Ø‡•Ç (‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•â‡§™ ‡§á‡§Ç‡§ü‡§∞‡§®‡•á‡§∂‡§®‡§≤ ‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡•à‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§è‡§®‡•Å‡§Ö‡§≤) ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ‡•§ 

Generation 4: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is beginner elementary by profession and has to deal with the hardships of her job.
---
emili ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She had been writing stories since she was little but never thought it could be turned into something more than just an hobby for herself until one day when everything changed. ‡§è‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•ã‡§∏‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§ï‡•â‡§´‡•Ä ‡§∂‡•â‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡•à‡§†‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ So, Emily took some time off from work at Starbucks where she worked as barista and started on what would become "The Storyteller".

‡§è‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§∏‡•å‡§¶‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ú‡•ã‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ‡§® ‡§∂‡•à‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ï ‡§∂‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§ó ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è‡•§ Emma also helped give feedback that made sure each scene flowed naturally together so there were no awkward transitions or plot holes. ‡§è‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡§ø‡§ö‡§ï‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ñ‡§®‡§æ ‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§π‡§∏ ‡§ú‡•Å‡§ü‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ The first draft wasn't perfect but neither did anyone else notice which gave them both confidence enough to keep going.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§π ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡•á ‡§ó‡§è, ‡§è‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∂‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§ó‡§£‡§®‡§æ ‡§§‡•á‡§ú ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à‡•§ Her boss noticed this change too because he often asked if they wanted him to help review their latest chapter. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø, ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Å‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§§‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§µ‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§µ‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§§‡§®‡§æ‡§µ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§§‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ It became harder everyday not only due to all the hours spent working late nights at the coffee shop, balancing between two jobs while trying to write another book but most importantly being able to balance family life without neglecting either career path.

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§®, ‡§¶‡•á‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡§æ‡§∞‡§¨‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∂‡§ø‡§´‡•ç‡§ü ‡§Æ‡•à‡§®‡•á‡§ú‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§®‡§µ‡•Ä‡§®‡§§‡§Æ ‡§™‡•Å‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•Å‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∂‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§¨ ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ç‡§Ç‡•§ This was difficult considering how much I loved my manager and didn't want to disappoint him. ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§§‡•ã‡§°‡§º ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§π‡§Æ ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§ú‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§¶‡•ã‡§™‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≠‡•ã‡§ú‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ù‡•á ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ù‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•å‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡•§ He agreed and we met up later that week.

‡§π‡§Æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§ö‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§π‡§Æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Å 

Generation 5: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is beginner elementary by profession and wants to become an expert.
---
saara ek 25 varsheey mahila thi jo apne poore jeevan mein kisi bhi prakaar ki naukri karke paisa kamaane ke liye sangharsh nahin kar sakti thi jisse use nafrat ho aur usse door rahein. She had tried her hand at various jobs but nothing seemed right for long enough that she could feel fulfilled with what little money they offered her every week. vah hamesha se jaanti thin ki unki asli ruchiyon ko duniya ne najaraandaaj ya kamjor dekh diya hai-unmein logon par shikaar kaise banenge lekin unhone yahaan tak socha tha ki ve vaastav mein peshevar roop se safal vyaktitva the. It wasn't until one day when Sarah met someone who changed everything - Dr. Martin Johnson was not only kinder than any of them before him, he also believed it would be possible if people like herself put their minds into something more meaningful rather than just earning some quick cash on this planet earth. saamagreey upchaaro sahit prithvi grahon ke baare mein adhyaynon par doosron ke prayogshaala nishkarshon ke alpakaalik utsaah ne sarvavidit tathyaapoorvak "pradatt" vigyaanon ko badlane ke liye gurutvaakarshan bal paida kiya! Inspired by his passionate zeal towards science education, Sara decided then & thereafter never again take anything less seriously or settle down anywhere else where no matter how much effort you gave yourself - success wouldn't come easily anymore because now she knew better things awaited those willing to work hardest while still being able find joy from within themselves too... 

Generation 6: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is beginner elementary by profession.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§µ‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä-‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤‡•á‡§ú ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§â‡§™‡§æ‡§ß‡§ø ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ She had always been interested in art and design but never thought of pursuing it as her career path until she took an introductory course on graphic design during the summer break between high school and college. ‡§™‡§æ‡§†‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§µ‡•á‡§¶‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ 

Sarah was accepted into one of the top schools for Graphic Design in New York City and moved there to start fresh with new people and opportunities that would help shape her future. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§®‡§è ‡§µ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§µ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§´‡§ø‡§ï ‡§°‡§ø‡§ú‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡§ø‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Her passionate nature helped propel her forward despite any obstacles or challenges thrown at her along the way.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ì‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ‡•§ She also started taking part in competitions wherein participants were given briefs based around real life scenarios which required them to come up with innovative solutions using their creativity skills. ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§§‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§∞‡§ö‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§

One day while attending class Sarah met someone from another department whose work caught her attention instantly - he created some amazing animation videos. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§®‡•Ä‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§® ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡•á‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§≠‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§ö ‡§∏‡§π‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§ To everyone's surprise, Sarah agreed without hesitation because this gave her a chance not only to explore something different than what she knew best but also gain more experience working alongside other talented individuals within various departments.

‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§•, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡•á‡§µ‡§∞ ‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§æ‡§® ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§™‡§£‡§® ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§™‡§æ‡§¶‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡§® ‡§∏‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡§§ ‡§π‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•Ä‡•§ This allowed her to have better insights when collaborating with others, thus enhancing communication among team members resulting in higher quality output overall. 

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡•Ç‡§Ø‡•â‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§∂‡§π‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∂‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§´‡§ø‡§ï ‡§°‡§ø‡§ú‡§æ‡§á‡§®‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§ú‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Ä‡•§ As time passed, she became known across the industry due to her

---
‡§ú‡•á‡§® ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∂‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ She had always found it difficult to interact with people and often preferred the company of books over socializing. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ñ‡•ã ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§§‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§Ü‡§à, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•Ä‡§õ‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï ‡§•‡•á‡•§ It wasn't until she started her first job as an accountant that Jane realized how much more there was for her out there than just reading numbers on paper. 

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§ú‡•á‡§® ‡§ò‡§¨‡§∞‡§æ‡§à ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ The thought of meeting new colleagues filled her with dread because all too well-known were those times when they made fun or laughed at you for something trivial like not being able to answer their questions correctly or having trouble pronouncing words properly. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§π ‡§á‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡•á‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä, ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ç‡§∏‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§¶‡•å‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§®‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§¶‡•á‡•§ But once inside, everything changed. 

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•á‡§® ‡§®‡•á ‡§∞‡§ø‡§∏‡•á‡§™‡•ç‡§∂‡§®‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•á‡§∂‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§´‡•ç‡§ü ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§®‡§è ‡§∏‡§π‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§≠‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ú‡•ã‡§∂‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§ó‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ They introduced themselves one after another, asking if she needed any help getting around before offering suggestions regarding where best to sit during lunch breaks or which coffee machine would be most efficient while working long hours without taking a break. ‡§á‡§® ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§‡§ö‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§π‡§ú ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§ú‡•Å‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•á‡•§ Despite still feeling nervous from time to time, Jane began enjoying herself immensely throughout each day at work - talking with coworkers between tasks, learning new skills through training sessions, even participating in team building activities outside office hours! 

‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§®‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•å‡§Ç‡§™‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§π‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§π‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡§π‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§π ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•á ‡§§‡•ã ‡§ú‡•á‡§® ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§â‡§® ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•å‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§® ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä-‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§™‡•á‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Being part of such a tightly knit community helped build up both confidence and resilience within themself, making it easier nowadays to approach others confidently and make lasting friendships along the way. 

‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•å‡§ü‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è, ‡§ú‡•á‡§® ‡§•‡§ï‡§æ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂ ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä, ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ü‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§â‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§§‡§®‡§æ‡§µ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§¨ ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§

‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡§ï ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§§‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had been working for the same company since graduating from university and was known to be one of its most efficient employees. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§ï ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§ø‡§µ‡§∞‡§£‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ-‡§î‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä! 

One day at work, Sarah received an urgent call from her boss regarding their latest client's request - they wanted something new created that would set them apart from other companies within their industry. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§∞‡•ã‡§ß ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ The deadline wasn't too far away either so it needed immediate attention. ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ï ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•á‡§∑ ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§Ö‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§ø‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ß‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§§ ‡§π‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ With this challenge on hand, she knew what she must do.

‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á, ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∂‡•ã‡§ß ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ After analyzing all available options, she came up with three different ideas: option A involved creating a cutting edge software application; Option B consisted of developing customized hardware solutions; while Option C focused entirely around social media marketing strategies. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™ ‡§è ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§ï ‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§á‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§ß‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§ï ‡§§‡§ï‡§®‡•Ä‡§ï ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§•‡•Ä, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡•ã‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§°‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§™‡§£‡§® ‡§∞‡§£‡§®‡•Ä‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Å ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§µ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§® ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§™‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§

Sarah then meticulously planned out every detail before presenting these findings during weekly meetings with her team members. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§ï ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§´‡§æ‡§Ø‡§¶‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§®‡•Å‡§ï‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§ö‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§Ø ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§≤‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ï‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§æ‡•§ This allowed each member of the group to contribute unique insights towards finding the best solution possible. ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§π ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§∏‡•ã‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§°‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï‡•á‡§ü‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡•á‡§ü‡§´‡•â‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§∏‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§ø‡§Æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§™‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§≠ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ They were able to create personalised content which helped increase customer loyalty as well as attract potential clients through targeted advertising campaigns.

‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§•-‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§®‡§è ‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§®‡•ç‡§Æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ It also earned praise not only from management but customers alike. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ, ‡§á‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§à ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡§Ç‡§≠ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ As soon 

Generation 2: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is project Manager by profession.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡§ï ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She had the perfect balance of analytical skills and creativity that made her stand out among others. ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§à ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡•Å‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ 

Sarah's first big task as Project manager was to oversee an international construction site for a new skyscraper building. ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§â‡§™‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§™‡•Ä‡§õ‡•á ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡§ü‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ Her team worked tirelessly day after night, pushing themselves beyond their limits while she kept them motivated with uplifting speeches every morning before work began. 

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ß‡•Ä‡§∞‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§£ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§≤ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ó‡§§‡§ø ‡§π‡•Å‡§à, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§¶‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ó‡§è ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ The long hours were exhausting but Sarah loved it all - from seeing the final product come together underneath her leadership to hearing positive feedback on how well they did things. 

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§á‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•Å‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ ‡§´‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§à‡§Æ‡•á‡§≤ ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§π ‡§°‡§ø‡§ú‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ They wanted more details regarding certain aspects like lightning protection systems or fire safety measures which could potentially impact the overall design plan. ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ò‡§¨‡§∞‡§æ‡§ï‡§∞, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§ú‡§µ‡§æ‡§¨ ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§´ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ After some research and consultation, she presented the necessary changes needed based upon best practices recommended by industry experts. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§£ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§ø‡§Æ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§™‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§ß‡•ç‡§µ‡§®‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§ø‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§°‡§ø‡§ú‡§º‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§∏‡•å‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∂‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á‡•§

As time passed, Sarah became known not only within her company but also throughout other companies where projects required similar expertise. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§ö‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§â‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è‡•§ However, despite this recognition, Sarah remained humble and focused solely on delivering quality results at hand.

‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶, ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§ó‡§®‡§ö‡•Å‡§Ç‡§¨‡•Ä ‡§á‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§ò‡§æ‡§ü‡§® ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Å‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§® ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡•á‡§§‡•É‡§§‡•ç‡§µ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§â‡§®‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§ï ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§à ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Everyone involved has been given opportunities to grow through experience gained during these challenging times, including herself. ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§ó‡§§ ‡§¨‡§≤‡§ø‡§¶‡§æ‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§†‡§ø‡§®‡§æ‡§á‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Ø‡§ï 

Generation 3: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is project Manager by profession.
---
‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡•Ä ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡§ï ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ She had been working for years on various projects and was always eager to learn more every day. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§≤‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ö‡§≤ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Sophie's passion shined through her work ethic and she inspired those around her with the same drive as hers. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡§º‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§® ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ However, one particular project proved challenging even though it seemed like an easy task at first glance - developing new software that would revolutionize how people interacted online.

‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§®‡§à ‡§∏‡•â‡§´‡•ç‡§ü‡§µ‡•á‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ The team consisted of some very talented individuals from different backgrounds and disciplines. ‡§â‡§®‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§ø‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§¶‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø‡§ï‡•ã‡§£ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§è‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§™‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§µ‡•á ‡§®‡§è ‡§∏‡•â‡§´‡§º‡•ç‡§ü‡§µ‡•á‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡•ã‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§µ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§® ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á-‡§è‡§ï ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ö‡§ï ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ But things quickly started going downhill when they realized just what kind of challenge this might be.

‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§Æ‡§π‡•Ä‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ö‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ó‡§§‡§ø ‡§ß‡•Ä‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ They were facing numerous obstacles such as conflicting ideas between members or technical issues arising during development phases which made their progress seemingly impossible. ‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§π ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ So she took charge and set up weekly meetings where everyone could voice out any concerns or questions they may have regarding specific tasks assigned to them. ‡§á‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§™‡•à‡§¶‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§® ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§π‡§ö‡§æ‡§® ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¨‡•ã‡§ß‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡§º ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ ‡§°‡§æ‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§ö‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§

Sophia also went above and beyond her usual duties within the group. ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§¶‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§§‡§®‡§æ‡§µ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§ó‡§§‡§ø‡§µ‡§ø‡§ß‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§ï‡§Ü‡§â‡§ü ‡§∏‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡§ú‡•á‡§¶‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ñ‡•á‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡•å‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§µ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§è ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ‡•§ This helped build rapport amongst colleagues while keeping morale high throughout each phase of production. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ, ‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ù‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§ö‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§¶‡•á‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡•Å‡§∂‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡•Ä ‡§¢‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§ø‡§Æ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§™‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Her dedication towards 

Generation 4: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is project Manager by profession.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§Ø‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had always been passionate and dedicated to her work as Project Manager at the construction company she worked for. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ä‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ü‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•á‡§∂‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡§æ‡§≤‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§ú‡§ü ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§è‡•§ Sarah was also known among colleagues for being incredibly organized and detail-oriented when it came to planning out projects from start to finish.

‡§π‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§®‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§£ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§≤‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§®‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§¶‡•á‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ The new building would be an architectural marvel that stood tall against other buildings within its vicinity. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§®‡§è ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§π‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§á‡§Ç‡§§‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ However, this particular job proved more challenging than any previous ones they'd taken on before.

‡§®‡§è ‡§≠‡§µ‡§® ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§≤ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Å‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡§à ‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§≤ ‡§™‡•à‡§¶‡§≤ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§®‡§à ‡§á‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡§§ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§à ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ Despite the long commute times, Sarah refused to let anything stand between herself and completing each day with utmost dedication towards meeting deadlines. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§¨‡§π ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§â‡§†‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§µ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§§‡•ã ‡§´‡•ã‡§® ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§à‡§Æ‡•á‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Her attention to details helped ensure every aspect of their plan remained intact throughout all stages of development.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§â‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ They were faced with numerous obstacles along the way - including inclement weather conditions like heavy rain or snowfall which slowed down progress significantly. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ, ‡§†‡•á‡§ï‡•á‡§¶‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•á‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡•ã‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ Nevertheless, Sarah never gave up hope even during these trying moments. ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§†‡•Ä‡§ï ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•à‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ It wasn't easy but eventually things started falling into place again thanks largely due to her unwavering determination and hardworking attitude!

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§á‡§ü ‡§§‡•à‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ç‡§µ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä, ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∑‡•ç‡§† ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§¶‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§¶‡•á‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§§‡§ø‡§•‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Every morning saw them working tirelessly alongside contractors, engineers, planners, designers, etc., making sure everything went according to schedule 

Generation 5: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is project Manager by profession and she has to lead her team of 5 engineers for the construction of an underwater bridge.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡§ï ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ She loved being able to take on new challenges every day while also helping others achieve their goals as well. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§§‡§≤ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§™‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§®‡•Ä‡§ö‡•á ‡§™‡•Å‡§≤ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡•á‡§§‡•É‡§§‡•ç‡§µ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§§‡•ã ‡§µ‡§π ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç! Sarah was excited at first but soon realized that it would be one of the most difficult projects they had ever taken on together.

‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡§ï ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á‡•§ However, when they met with each other during training sessions, all five members seemed equally enthusiastic about taking up this challenge. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§ö‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ó‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§≤‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡•§ They agreed upon establishing clear lines of communication between them so everyone knew what needed attention before moving forward.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§ï ‡§∏‡§¶‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§§ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§Æ‡§ú‡•ã‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ù‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§® ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•Å‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï ‡§•‡•á‡•§ One member struggled with time management skills which caused delays throughout several phases of development. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø, ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§á‡§Ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§§‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§´‡§æ‡§Ø‡§¶‡•á‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á‡•§ Meanwhile, another engineer excelled in problem solving abilities yet lacked experience working within tight deadlines like those present here. ‡§á‡§® ‡§Æ‡§§‡§≠‡•á‡§¶‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§π‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§ó‡§§ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§ï ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§™‡§ü‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã‡§∂‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§ï‡•Ä‡•§ This helped build trust among themselves and allowed them to work more efficiently towards achieving common objectives.

‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ, ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§£ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡•á‡§ú ‡§ó‡§§‡§ø ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä, ‡§á‡§Ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡§à ‡§Ö‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∂‡§ø‡§§ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ó‡§§‡§ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ ‡§°‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä‡•§ For instance, strong currents were found beneath some sections where divers couldn't reach easily due to low visibility levels. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§§‡§ø‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§, ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§â‡§™‡§ï‡§∞‡§£‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ñ‡§∞‡§æ‡§¨‡•Ä ‡§Ü ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§™‡§æ‡§¶‡§® ‡§ß‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§á‡§Ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•á‡•§ Despite these setbacks though, Sarah remained committedly focused on completing the task ahead - not letting any obstacle deter from reaching success.

‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§π‡•Ä‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶, ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§°‡§∞‡§µ‡§æ‡§ü‡§∞ ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§ú ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§ï ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ Each individual member played a

---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡§ï ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She had always been good at managing her time and staying organized - traits that would be essential for the job she wanted to pursue. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§≤‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§∂‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•á‡§¶‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à-‡§è‡§ï ‡§®‡§à ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§™‡§π‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§ø‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•á‡§¶‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡§æ‡•§ 

Sarah was excited but also nervous as this new role came with its own set of challenges. ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§® ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç, ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§π‡§ø‡§§‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ü‡§ø‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ But Sarah's determination never wavered even when faced with obstacles or unexpected issues along the way.

‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§Ü‡§à ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ‡§è‡§Å ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§ú‡§ü ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§ß‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ They needed additional funding from their sponsors which meant they couldn't start work on some aspects until it arrived. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™ ‡§•‡•á ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§¶‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø‡§ï‡•ã‡§£ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§è ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ It gave them an opportunity to rethink how best to approach certain tasks while giving more attention towards others. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ß‡•à‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§ï ‡§°‡§ü‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§® ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•á ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ó‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ In doing so, they were able to create better outcomes overall than if things went according to plan initially.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•á ‡§®‡§è ‡§∏‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ö‡§≤‡•á ‡§ó‡§è, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§°‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ; ‡§ö‡§ø‡§Ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§ï‡§∞, ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç‡•§ Every day brought fresh opportunities and lessons learned through trial and error. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡•Ä‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡•á ‡§ó‡§è, ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§ï ‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡§§‡•ç‡§•‡§∞ ‡§π‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ì‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§Ö‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§µ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ The team worked together seamlessly despite any differences between members due mainly because each individual knew what part he/she played within the larger picture. ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§Æ‡§π‡•Ä‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§•‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§£ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á, ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§¶‡§≤ ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ò‡•ã‡§∑‡§£‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç!

uska dost lisa kuchh varshon se drag ovardoj ya durupayogakartaaon ke sampark mein aa chuki thin. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§™‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ One such challenge came when she received news from her boss - Mr. Johnson - informing her that he needed to reorganize his department due to budget cutbacks. ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•â‡§®‡§∏‡§® ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§§‡•Ä‡§® ‡§™‡§¶‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡•ã ‡§µ‡§∞‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§† ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á‡•§ However, there were only two applicants available: himself (the CEO) or Sarah herself! ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ñ‡§¨‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡§∞‡§æ‡§® ‡§∞‡§π ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ But it wasn't just any position; this would be her first opportunity to prove how much potential she possessed beyond being merely "a good employee."

emili ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡•á‡§µ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ‡§π‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She loved helping people navigate through difficult decisions and finding solutions that worked for everyone involved. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∂‡•å‡§ï ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§ó ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ-‡§´‡•ã‡§ü‡•ã‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§´‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Å‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ 

As she walked down the street one evening after work, Emily noticed something strange happening outside her building - there was a group of kids playing soccer on top of someone's car! ‡§è‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§ö‡§∞ ‡§¨‡•à‡§ó ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ú‡§®‡§¨‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ì‡§∞ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡§æ‡§à ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ç‡§¶ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡•á‡•§ "Hey guys," she said with authority as soon as they saw her approaching them from behind their goal line, "I think you should move your game over here." ‡§¨‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡•Å‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§µ‡§æ‡§¨ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•á‡§≤ ‡§â‡§™‡§ï‡§∞‡§£ ‡§á‡§ï‡§ü‡•ç‡§†‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Ü‡§è ‡§•‡•á‡•§ As Emily helped carry things to where they needed it most, she realized how much fun this new side hobby could be if done right.

‡§è‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§®‡§à ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§´‡•ã‡§ü‡•ã‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§´‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§®‡§è ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ Her company had recently acquired several photography studios around town which meant more opportunities than ever before to capture stunning images both inside and outdoors. ‡§è‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•á‡§∑ ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Å‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∂‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§‡§ø‡§ú ‡§∞‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡•ã‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•à‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§µ ‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ And so began her journey into becoming not only a successful consultant but also an accomplished amateur photographer all at once.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§à, ‡§è‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•ç‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ There were days when she would return home exhausted from working long hours during the day while still managing to find time each weekend or evenings to practice her craft. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø, ‡§á‡§® ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶, ‡§µ‡§π ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡•§ Every photo taken felt like another step towards fulfilling her dream career path.

‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§Æ‡§π‡•Ä‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§•‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶, ‡§è‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§á‡§Ç‡§§‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ It wasn't just any ordinary job offer either; rather, it came along with some amazing perks such as unlimited access to state-of-the art equipment and gear used specifically designed for capturing breathtaking shots no matter what season it might be. ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á 

Generation 7: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is professional advisor by profession.
---
saara ek peshevar salaahkaar thin jo apne kaam mein kadi parishram se pyaari aur aanandit mahsoos kar rahi thi. She had always been passionate and driven towards her career path from an early age. unhein logon ko vikaas ke liye prerak banne ki shuruaat pasand haih yahaan tak ki sabse kam umra ya dridhanishchayi vyavhaaro vaale bachche ko chunautiyon par vijyi hote dekhna. Sarah's dedication to helping others grow was evident through the countless hours she spent on researching new trends or best practices for personal growth development plans. 

ek din saara ne jooli naam ki ek sundrata se mulaakaat ki-jo abhinetaaon sahit film udyog mein naye praveshkon ke samooh ke beech sangharsh paida ho gaya tha. Julie wanted advice regarding how to handle difficult situations with colleagues while maintaining their own creative vision as well. uske baare mein jaanne ke turant hi use ehsaas nahin hua ki unhone kis taraf rukh badla hai; lekin fir ve donon safal naukriyo ke alag-thalag padne ke muddon ke peedit the. They both shared similar stories of being undervalued at work despite putting extra effort into tasks that were not appreciated enough.

apni jeevan sthitiyon ko sudhaarna chaahte huye, saara ne jaldabaaji mein faisle lene se rok diya aur javaab dene se pahle poori taiyaari ki. With all her expertise gathered over years of experience working within different fields, it took no time before they came up with a plan together - one which would help them tackle issues head-to-head without compromising any aspect of themselves. antim utpaad svacchta protokol, sanchaar chainlon ki spashteekran aur niymit roop se teem chekalist ke sayojan honge taaki har vivran sunishchit najar aa sake. It became clear that Julie needed someone like herself: A mentor

Generation 1: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Engineer by profession and has to work on the construction of an underwater city.
