‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡•Ä‡§™ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Sarah was different from other people because she had always been fascinated with engineering since childhood. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ-‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§®‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She wanted nothing more than being able to create something that would benefit humanity as well as herself. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§®‡•Ä‡§ö‡•á ‡§∂‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§á‡§Ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§µ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡•§ It sounded like it could be her dream come true!

‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§á‡§Ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡•á ‡§™‡•à‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ The project involved constructing a massive structure deep beneath sea level where humans can live without any natural resources or pollution problems. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•á‡§∑‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§°‡§ø‡§ú‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§≠‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§§‡§≤ ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§§‡•á ‡§§‡§æ‡§™‡§Æ‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§µ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ñ‡§§‡§∞‡§æ ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ They believed this underwater city will provide them shelter for years to come until they find another safe haven above water.

‡§Ø‡§π ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ö‡§ï ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∞‡§ö‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§£ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§§‡•à‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ To achieve such feat required extensive research and development which took months but eventually Sarah got through all these hurdles successfully. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§ó‡§≤‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§§‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§∞‡•ç‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§µ‡§ß‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§ï ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§¶‡§Æ ‡§â‡§†‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ö‡§≤ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡•§ Her team worked day after nights so they wouldn't miss anything crucial before submitting their final report.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∂‡§æ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ç‡§ü ‡§ó‡§à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§¶‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ ‡§≤‡•Ä‡•§ However, she never gave up hope even when things seemed impossible at times. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™ ‡§∂‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§π‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Å‡§ö ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ Eventually, despite some setbacks along the way, the engineers completed building the first phase of the underwater city.

‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§á‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡§§ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§à ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä, ‡§§‡•ã ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡§æ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ People were amazed seeing how far technology advances nowadays. ‡§á‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§â‡§® ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Æ‡§®‡•Å‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡§π 

Generation 2: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Engineer by profession and has to deal with the consequences of her actions.
---
ek baar ki baat hai jab saara ek yuva aur utsaahit mahila thi jo apne sapnon ko poora karna chaahti thin-vishesh roop se unke peshe ke liye. She had always been fascinated with engineering since she was young - it inspired creativity within herself while also allowing for practical applications that could be put into practice on everyday life situations. 15 varshon tak kadi mehnat ka fal milta dekha gaya; unhone sasthaan prashasa praapt kiya aur antatah us padonnati par pahunch gayin jiski ve hamesha iccha rakhte huye vahaan nahin jaani chaahengi. With this achievement came great responsibility as well: Sarah now found herself responsible not only towards those around them but toward society at large due to their newfound influence over others' lives through innovative ideas implemented during work hours or even afterward when interacting outside the office walls. lekin fir achaanak sabhi cheejein badal gayeehin. The company where Sarah worked faced financial difficulties which caused many layoffs throughout its departments including hers own team members too! nateejtan, use yaad dalaana mushkil ho gaya ki kis taraf mudkar jeena shuru karoon? Should they all just accept what fate brought upon themselves regardless if any other options were available beforehand ? isliye, sarlata se samjhein, "saroget" upanyaason ne abhiyojkon ke paathyapustakein likhni band kar di thin taaki naagrik adaalton mein rikord tod sakein aur vaastav mein doosron ki madad kar sakein, tab bhi jab anivaarya tareeka hi sahaj lage. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§á‡§Ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ As she grew up, she was fascinated with the world of machines and gadgets around us. ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤‡•á‡§ú ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§á‡§Ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§°‡§ø‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡•Ä‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§® ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ 

As soon as Sarah graduated from college, she started working for one of the biggest engineering companies out there. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§π‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ-‡§è‡§ï ‡§∂‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑ ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ, ‡§Ö‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§ß‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§®‡§µ‡•Ä‡§®‡§§‡§Æ ‡§§‡§ï‡§®‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§§‡§æ‡§≤‡§Æ‡•á‡§≤ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡§æ‡•§ However, something inside her began to stir - an itch that couldn't be ignored anymore. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§á‡§Ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§‡§ö‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§™‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ü‡§Ö‡§™ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ She realized then what had been missing all along: freedom. ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è‡§É ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§£, ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§§‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§æ‡•§ So when given the opportunity at work, she decided enough was enough, and quit to pursue entrepreneurship full time on her terms.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§Ö‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§µ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•à‡•§ It would take hard work, dedication, sacrifice, and most importantly faith in herself. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§à, ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ Her first step came easily; finding funding through investors willing to back someone so young but passionate about their dreams. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§™‡§£‡§® ‡§∞‡§£‡§®‡•Ä‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Å ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á, ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ç‡§° ‡§™‡§π‡§ö‡§æ‡§® ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§™‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Every day brought new challenges, each more difficult than before, yet every obstacle made them stronger.

‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§Ü‡§§‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§†‡§ø‡§® ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§∏‡•á‡§¶‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§π‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ But things finally took off after they released their flagship product which quickly became popular among its users. ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§§‡§ï, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§ú‡§ó‡§π ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Å‡§ö ‡§ö‡•Å‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ They were now employing over 10 employees, expanding into different countries across Europe & Asia while also making millions annually. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§§‡•Å‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§π‡•ã‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§´‡§≤ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ The journey wasn't easy, but worthwhile 

Generation 4: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Engineer by profession and has to work on construction site.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•Ä ‡§á‡§Ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§£ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had always been fascinated with the way structures were built from scratch, how each piece fit together like puzzle pieces until they formed something grand. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤‡•á‡§ú ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§á‡§Ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§à ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Ø‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§ 

After graduation, Sarah landed her first job at a local company that was working on constructing an office building near downtown. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶, ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡•Ä‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•á‡§∑‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä-‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∞‡§ö‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§°‡§ø‡§ú‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§á‡§Ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ Her heart raced as she stepped into the project's headquarters for orientation purposes - it would be one of the most challenging projects yet!

‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§≤ ‡§™‡§∞, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§¶‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç‡•§ They all welcomed her warmly, making sure not only did she feel comfortable but also included in their plans moving forward. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§®‡§à ‡§≠‡•Ç‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä, ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Å‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§®‡•Ä‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ù‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ This required rigorous training sessions which left him exhausted day after day. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§π‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§≠‡§∞‡•ã‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ It took some time before everyone started trusting me because I wasn't used to being around so many people or having such high expectations placed upon my shoulders. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§â‡§® ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø ‡§Ü‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ù‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Everyone respected what I brought to this team effort and appreciated the hardwork put forth every single day.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡•á ‡§ó‡§è, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§§‡•á‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡•Å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ The more experienced members began relying heavily on her expertise when planning out future phases of development due to her knowledge base regarding structural design elements. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§ï ‡§ñ‡§Ç‡§° ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§π‡•à, ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§®‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§ï ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§†‡•Ä‡§ï ‡§µ‡•à‡§∏‡§æ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§≤‡§ó‡•á ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è‡•§ As we worked through complex calculations and logistics needed during construction phase two, there came

‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡•Å‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ She was an engineer and worked for the best tech company of her time. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§á‡§Ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø‡•Ç‡§ü‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§æ‡§® ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ It all started when she got access to some old computers at home which were left behind after their parents passed away. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§á‡§® ‡§Æ‡§∂‡•Ä‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§° ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§Æ‡•ã‡§°‡§º ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§è‡•§ Sarah's love grew stronger as days turned into weeks and then months until it became impossible not to pursue engineering any longer. 18 ‡§∏‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§ö‡§Æ‡§ï‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§®‡•á ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ From there onwards, nothing could stop this young lady from achieving greatness with every passing day. 

Generation 6: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Engineer by profession and also interested to pursue her passion for writing.

‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§•‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§µ‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§á‡§Ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had always been fascinated with the complexities of machines and how they worked together seamlessly towards achieving their goals. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§æ‡§à ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤‡•á‡§ú ‡§§‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§à ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö‡§§‡§Æ ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§° ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ‡•§ Samantha was an excellent student throughout high school but she wasn't satisfied until college where she discovered that engineering truly meant more than just understanding equations.

---
Meet Sarah - she's an incredible nurse at the local hospital where her dedication and compassion are legendary among staff members and patients alike. ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§Ø‡§æ‡§≤‡•Å‡§§‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§à ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≤‡§æ‡§≠ ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Å‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç "‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§è‡§Ç‡§ú‡•á‡§≤" ‡§â‡§™‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§Ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§ú‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ 

Sarah was born into poverty but managed to excel academically with the help of scholarships from various organizations that supported underprivileged students like herself. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§°‡§ø‡§ï‡§≤ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§∏‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§π‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Å‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§™‡§®‡§™‡§æ‡•§ She knew early on what it meant for people when they were sick or injured-and wanted nothing more than helping them get better through her work as a nurse.

‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§â‡§†‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§¨‡§π ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§∂‡•ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§§‡•à‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ As soon as one patient left their room after receiving treatment, another would come rushing downstairs needing care immediately. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π ‡§ß‡•à‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§®, ‡§∏‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡•Å‡§≠‡•Ç‡§§‡§ø‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ù‡§¶‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§∞‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ü‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ç‡§ù ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Her soothing voice and gentle touch always made even those struggling feel comfortable enough to open up without fear of judgment.

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è, ‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§è‡§Ç‡§ú‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ Despite long hours and demanding shifts, she never let anything deter her spirit because every single day brought new challenges which kept her motivated towards making positive changes within each individual life she touched along the way. 

‡§è‡§ï ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•á‡§∑ ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§µ‡§æ ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§ó‡§Ç‡§≠‡•Ä‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§ò‡§æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Æ‡•É‡§§‡§ø ‡§ñ‡•ã ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ The boy had no family nearby and only spoke English sporadically, leaving him feeling isolated and alone during his recovery process. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø, ‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§∏‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§ï‡§∞, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§†‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ö‡§•‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è, ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ß‡•Ä‡§∞‡•á-‡§ß‡•Ä‡§∞‡•á ‡§†‡•Ä‡§ï ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§™‡§∏ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•å‡§ü‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ It wasn't until he saw how much love and support went into caring for him did he realize just how powerful human connection can be. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä 

Generation 3: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Nurse by profession.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ She had been working at the hospital for years and was passionate about her job. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ç‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§∞‡•ã‡§ó‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡§ï ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•à-‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§≠‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ 

One day, Sarah came across an elderly patient named Mr. Johnson who seemed to be struggling with his breathing. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§Å‡§ö ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ After running some tests on him, she found that he needed urgent medical attention as soon as possible.

‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡•Å‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è, ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•â‡§®‡§∏‡§® ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§á‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú ‡§ï‡§∞‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§Ö‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§§‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§ As they waited anxiously together, it became clear how much this man meant to them both - not just because of what he might have done or said but also due to their shared experiences over many decades.

‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ‡§è‡§Å ‡§Ü‡§à‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡§∞ ‡§ú‡•â‡§®‡§∏‡§® ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§™‡§æ‡§§‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§® ‡§ï‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡§æ‡§Ç‡§§‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§§‡§§‡•ç‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§â‡§™‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü‡•§ Thanks to quick thinking from everyone involved, including Sarah's dedication towards providing quality care no matter where patients were located within hospitals around town! 

Generation 4: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Nurse by profession.
---
liliyaana naam ki ek mahila vyakti thi jo apne poore jeevan mein nars rahi thin. Her passion for helping others led her to become one of the most dedicated and compassionate healthcare workers out there. vah hamesha kisi bhi tarah se madad karna chaahti hain aur unke kaam ne logon ke liye cheejon ko behtar tareeka dekhte huye prerit kiya. Lilian was not only skilled at what she did but also had an infectious positivity that radiated from every interaction with patients or colleagues alike. 

ek din lileena aspataal gaye jahaan ve varshon tak sevaayen dena jaari rakhenge-da childran hospital. She knew this place held special memories as it was where many children were treated during their darkest moments when they needed someone to look after them more than anyone else ever could. lekin uski yaadein adbhut nahin hotinki - They became even sweeter each time she saw those little faces again. yuvaavastha ke dauraan pahnane vaale roopkon par nazrein rakhkar unhone seekha ki svasth dimaag shareerheenta se pare ho sakte haih "bachche saboot dete hain." And so does life itself: Life's greatest gift lies within our hearts.

apni naukri saumpe jaane ke baavjood, doktaron sahit har anyatha naajuk sthitiyon mein sharan chaahne vaali kamjor ladakiyo ki dekhbhaal karne ka mauka milta hi nahin diya. The young ones would come into her care feeling lost, scared, and alone; however, through patient listening skills and gentle touches on shoulders, arms, and backsides, these tiny souls found comfort and hope once again. ye upchaar antim lakshya ban gayeh garmajoshi, prem aur samarpan ke ufaaro ke vitrak hon! As long as we are alive, love never dies...but it lives forevermore inside all those whose hearts have been touched before death takes its final breath away‚Ä¶and then some! 

Generation 5: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Nurse by profession.
---
emili ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ Growing up with an ill mother made her realize the importance of nurses and healthcare workers. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ö‡§ø‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§§‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ü‡§™‡§æ‡§§‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§® ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ó‡§à‡•§ It was here that she found true happiness - helping people through their darkest moments. 

‡§è‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶‡§ó‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§°‡•ç‡§Ø‡•Ç‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ A man had been brought into the hospital after being involved in a car accident. ‡§è‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§∞‡•Å‡§ï ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She immediately called for help but it seemed like time stood still as they waited anxiously together. ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§è‡§Æ‡•ç‡§¨‡•Å‡§≤‡•á‡§Ç‡§∏ ‡§Ü‡§à-‡§â‡§∏ ‡§Ü‡§¶‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Å‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§¶‡•å‡§°‡§º‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ Emily felt overwhelmed yet proud to have played such a crucial role in saving this life. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§≠‡•Ç‡§≤‡•á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ 

Aside from emergency situations, there were also days when patients would come back years later just wanting to say thank you or give updates on how much better things are now than before. ‡§á‡§® ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§≤‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§∞‡•ã‡§ó‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§è‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•Ä‡•§ Her work wasn't only fulfilling because of its practical benefits; rather, it allowed her to connect emotionally with others too. 

‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•Ä, ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ "‡§Ü‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ù‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ", ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§∏‡•ç‡§• ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Ç ", ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡§µ‡§æ‡§¨ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ" ‡§Ü‡§™ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç, ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Æ‡•á‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§§‡•ã ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§™‡§∏ ‡§Ü‡§â‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ I promise." ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à, ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶‡•á‡§Ç ‡§§‡§æ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§∞‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ù‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ß‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§π‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à, ‡§§‡•ã ‡§è‡§Æ‡•á‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ ‡§°‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ 

Generation 6: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Nurse by profession and lives alone.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ê‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had always been drawn to the medical field ever since she was young. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ-‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ñ‡•ã ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§æ‡§ö‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡•á ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡•Ä ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§¶ ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ Growing up with her Aunt meant that Sarah learned how important it was for people around you to have someone they could rely on during tough times. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§Ü‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§∏‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§ø‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Her passion grew even stronger when one of her family members fell ill and needed constant care which led her into pursuing nursing as an occupation.

‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§∏‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶, ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•á‡§≤‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§è‡§ï‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Å ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§æ‡•§ After graduating from college, she decided not to move back home but instead rent out an apartment near work where no other relatives lived so that she wouldn't be distracted or feel like there were too many eyes watching over what she did every day. ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∞‡•ã‡§ó‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ß‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§¨‡§ø‡§®‡§æ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§ However, this lifestyle also came at its own challenges such as missing social events due to long hours working and having less time available to spend quality moments outside of work. ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä, ‡§á‡§® ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§á‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§® ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Æ‡§ú‡§¨‡•Ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü‡•§ 

Generation 7: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Nurse by profession.
---
saara ek nars thi jisne apna jeevan doosron ki madad karte huye bitaaya hai aur use pata chalta hai ki vah kisi tarah se badlaav la rahi hain. She had always been drawn to the medical field and loved nothing more than working with people on their journey towards recovery from illness or injury. unhein yakeen nahin ho sakta lekin ve jaanti thin ki unhone logon ke liye jo maaynon mein parivartan dekha usmein koyi galti ya kamjor sthiti nahin hogeeh rogiyon ne saari umra ka anubhav paane vaale vyaktitva praapt karke adbhut sudhaar dikhaaye; har gujrate din ke dauraan behtar shaareerik fitnes tak pahunchein; pratibaddh samudaay ban gayeh anyatha akela-paagalpan aur algaav se peedit naidaanikon ka netritvashaalaapoorn dal. Sarah's work was fulfilling but she knew that there were many other ways for her to help others beyond being just another nurse at a hospital: volunteering as part of community health programs focused on preventative care practices like exercise classes & dietary counseling sessions could make all difference between life/death situations when it comes down to staying alive! 

Prompt: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Advocate by profession

Generation 1: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Advocate by profession.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§µ‡§ï‡•Ä‡§≤ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had been practicing law for over 20 years and was well-respected among her peers as an expert on criminal cases. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§® ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•Ä‡§°‡§º‡§ø‡§§ ‡§™‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ Sarah's passion for the job often consumed most of her time outside work hours but she never complained because it made her feel fulfilled knowing that what she did mattered to society at large.

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§≤‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•á‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§è ‡§•‡•á‡•§ Her father lived alone so he needed someone there with him all day long which meant that Sarah would have to take some days off from court appearances until his health improved. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§´‡•ã‡§® ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Å ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Ä, ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§Å‡§ñ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§¶‡•Å‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ‡•§ After hanging up, she went straight back into action planning out how best to handle this situation while still keeping up with clients' needs.

‡§Ø‡§π ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ, ‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§µ‡§π ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ And when she got home later that evening after dropping everything else off at their house, she found herself sitting next to her mother watching television together - something they don't do very much anymore since her dad passed away six months ago. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§õ‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ The memory came flooding through like rainwater during heavy storms: memories of playing hide-and-seek or tag games underneath trees; catching fireflies late at night just before bedtime; running around chasing each other wearing nothing more than old clothes cut down small enough not even reach our knees! ‡§á‡§® ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Å‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡§Ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡•á‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§∞‡•ã‡§è‡•§ It reminded them both why family matters so much.

‡§Ö‡§ó‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§†‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡•å‡§∞‡§æ‡§® ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ö‡§ï‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§§ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ They were always willing to help whenever possible whether it be taking care of things inside the house, cooking meals, driving her mom somewhere important, or simply being present physically without saying anything too loudly. ‡§Ø‡•á ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•á ‡§á‡§∂‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§®‡•á 

Generation 2: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Advocate by profession.
---
ek baar ki baat hai, ek sundar shahri kshetra mein rahne vaali amaanda naamak mahila ke roop mein jab vah kolej se snaatak huyin to unhone faisla kar liya tha ki unhein apni digri ka upyog logon ko adaalton aur nishpaksh sunvaayi dene jaise naagrik svashaasan pradaan karke behtari laane ke tareeke par duniya badlane ke saadhan ke roop mein karna chaahiye jo anyatha nahin ho paati agar ve us samudaay tak pahunchti thin ya anubhav hotin-to yahaan ham abhi the! üíö Amanda was determined and worked hard at her studies, graduating with honors from one of the best law schools in India before joining as junior counsel for The Legal Aid Society - an NGO that provided free legal aid services to people facing financial difficulties or those without access to justice due to other factors like language barriers etc.. As she started working there full time, she soon realized how much impact even small actions could have on someone's life when it came down to matters such as family disputes, property rights issues or custody battles between parents over their children‚Ä¶ ‚òïÔ∏è It wasn't easy work but every day brought new challenges that kept things interesting while also helping so many individuals overcome some really difficult situations they might otherwise not know what else would happen if left alone...and then suddenly everything changed because this woman named "Amanda" had found herself becoming more than just another lawyer fighting against systemic inequality - she discovered something within herself that made all these cases feel personal rather than simply professional duties done out of obligation towards society as whole . 

Generation 3: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Advocate by profession.
---
saara ek vakeel thin aur unhein apne peshe ke liye pyaar tha jo unhone kayi varshon se kiya hai. She had always been driven to help people and make the world better for them. saadhaaran kaaryaalay mein rahte huaye bhi uske paas yah dridhta thi jiski use har din aavashyakta hoti thi. Sarah was not just any lawyer - she specialized as an advocate of women's rights and gender equality issues. 1980 ke dashak tak maanavaadhikaar sankat badh gaya lekin fir bhi log nishkriy roop se dekh kar chale jaane lage-unka jeevan beetna shuru ho gaya. This made her even more determined that something needed to change. 25 agast ko vaivaahik hisa adhiniyam laagu hua aur tab se sabse preranaadaayak parivartanon ne abhootapoorva tareekon se ling antarsambandhon ko ujaagar kiya. With this new law came renewed hope among many victims whose lives were now being changed forever because they finally felt like someone cared enough to stand up against their oppressors. 

Generation 4: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Advocate by profession.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§µ‡§ï‡•Ä‡§≤ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had always been fascinated with the law and how it could be used to help people fight for their rights. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•á ‡§π‡§æ‡§à ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤‡•á‡§ú ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§¨‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡•Ä‡§Ç, ‡§Ö‡§¶‡§æ‡§≤‡§§‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Æ‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡•á ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§®‡§ï‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§•‡•á ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ When she graduated from college, Sarah knew that becoming an advocate was her calling - but there were still hurdles ahead of her before she would make this dream come true. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§Ü‡§à ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§≤‡•â ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡•á‡§∂ ‡§™‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡§à ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§™‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§à ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§™‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∂‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ But instead of giving up on pursuing her goal, Sarah decided to take matters into her own hands. ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•ã‡§ß ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§â‡§® ‡§ï‡§æ‡§®‡•Ç‡§®‡•Ä ‡§´‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¶‡•å‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§µ‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§§ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§â‡§™‡§≤‡§¨‡•ç‡§ß ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á‡•§ After months of networking and hard work, she finally got accepted at one such firm where they needed someone like her: bright, ambitious, and willing to put in long hours working towards justice. ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§à-‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§µ‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ‡•§ 

Generation 5: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Advocate by profession and fighting for women's rights.
---
ek baar ki baat hai jab saara naam ka ek vyakti tha jo peshe se vakeel the aur mahila adhikaaron ke liye lad rahi thin. Sarah was born to parents with high aspirations of their daughter becoming an advocate someday. unki yogyata ne apne pita ko khush kar diya lekin unhone nishchit roop se use chunautiyon par vijyi hote dekha nahin. She had always been passionate towards social issues especially those concerning gender inequality which led her into joining various organizations that worked on this cause. 1980 mein duniya abhi-abhi laingik samaanta samitiyon jaise sangthanon ya naareevaadi vidrohon tak hi seemit ho gayeeji thi. This made it even more difficult but she continued working hard day after night till one fine morning when things finally started looking up.

saadhu log uske ghar aa uthe. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She was passionate and determined to make her dreams come true even though the path wasn't always easy for women working as police officers back then. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ-‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§ï‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•Ä‡•§ 

After graduating from college with an honors degree in criminal justice studies, Sarah joined one of the largest metropolitan cities in America where she would work hard every day towards achieving success on both personal and professional levels. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§ß ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§æ‡§® ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§µ‡•á ‡§∂‡§π‡§∞ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§ß‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§®‡§ú‡§º‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§¶‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç‡•§ Her job involved investigations into crimes such as robbery, homicide cases, missing persons reports etc., which required extensive research skills along with excellent communication abilities that helped her build strong relationships within different communities across town.

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§à ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡§æ‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§® ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§ø‡§§ ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ However, it didn't stop there - she also became known among colleagues at other departments due to her exceptional problem solving capabilities when dealing with complex situations or conflicts between groups/individuals during their interactions while maintaining law enforcement standards all throughout. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ, ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§ó‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§†‡§ø‡§® ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§π‡§æ‡§Ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§® ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§π‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§∏‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡§•‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§¶‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø ‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§™‡§ü‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä‡•§

Sarah had many achievements over time but what stood out most were those moments when someone came forward seeking help because they trusted her instinctive ability not only to solve problems effectively but also understand human nature better than others might have been able too. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§≠‡§∞‡•ã‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç, ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§≠‡§µ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡•Å‡§£‡§æ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§≤‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¨‡•ã‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§æ‡§® ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§≤‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ This made people feel safe around her knowing that if something happened again later down the line, he could call upon this resourceful woman without fear of judgment or retribution being meted out against them.

---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Growing up as an only child with parents that worked long hours at their jobs had made it difficult for them to pay attention or be there when she needed help from home. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Å ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ú‡§ø‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•á‡§¶‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§•‡•á, ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•å‡§ï‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§§‡§æ‡§à‡•§ She enrolled into police school right after high-school graduation and never looked back since then. 10 ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ú‡•á‡§Ç‡§ü ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è, ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§à ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡§æ‡§à ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§´‡§æ‡§á‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Æ‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§π‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§æ, ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•á‡§∑‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§§‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§à‡•§ One particular night changed everything though - Sarah's life was now on edge waiting until they found out what happened to her lover...

‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§æ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§ö‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä‡•§ He was supposedly last seen leaving his house early morning before heading off work but he didn't show any signs of being kidnapped or missing anywhere else around town. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§µ‡§æ‡§π ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§µ‡•Ä‡§°‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã ‡§´‡•Å‡§ü‡•á‡§ú ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ö‡§•‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡•§ The next day Steven hadn't shown up either which caused concerns amongst all those close him including friends, family members and even colleagues working alongside her. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•Ä‡§õ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ They started looking over every possible lead imaginable such as following anyone suspicious near where Steven might have been going or checking phone records if someone called him recently and so forth. ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§¶ ‡§•‡•Ä; ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§™‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§≤ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§™‡§æ‡§à ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ This confirmed some people's fears that this could indeed be related to something bigger than just one man gone missing.

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡§® ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ö ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§ö‡•Å‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä, ‡§§‡•ã ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§ß ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§§‡§Ø ‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§´‡•ã‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡§∏‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§è‡§ï‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§™‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶‡§ø‡§ó‡•ç‡§ß ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§¨‡•Ç‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§£ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ However, things took a turn for the worse once again during the process because another body showed itself outside the car while it still lay untouched inside! ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶‡•á‡§π ‡§™‡•à‡§¶‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä‡§§ 

Generation 5: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Police officer by profession.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ She had always dreamt of becoming one and now she was living her childhood fantasy every day at the police station where she worked as an investigator for homicide cases. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§®-‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§® ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§ß‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§™‡§ü‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•á ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã‡§∂‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§¶‡•á‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ 

One night while on patrol duty, Sarah received news that there has been another murder case reported from downtown area which made it quite difficult to handle because this particular crime scene wasn't just any ordinary killing but something more sinister than what meets our eyes. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∂‡§π‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ ‡§°‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§ß ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§≤ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§°‡§º‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§∂‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ç‡§∏ ‡§∞‡•ã‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§ß‡•Ä ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡§®‡•á ‡§® ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§ The body lay lifeless with multiple stab wounds all over its torso indicating how brutal these killers could be if they were not caught soon enough. 

‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡•Ä‡§°‡§º‡§ø‡§§ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§ß‡•á‡§°‡§º ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§®‡§ø‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ú‡•á‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§π‡•à‡§∞‡§ø‡§∏‡§® ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ó‡§æ‡§Ø‡§¨ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§´‡•ã‡§® ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§¨‡§§‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ It didn't take long before detectives found out he might have met some foul play during his last moments alive since no trace or evidence pointed towards him being kidnapped or killed elsewhere either so everyone assumed James must have committed suicide until someone informed them otherwise. 

‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§ö, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ó‡§π‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§à ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§≤‡§ö‡§∏‡•ç‡§™ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§æ‡§à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•É‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•Å ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§µ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§¶‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§§‡•ã ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ? Sooner rather later after finding clues left behind like hair strands scattered around the room along with cigarette burns near furniture pieces suggesting smoking habits which led back into their investigation of Harrison himself. ‡§á‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á‡§É ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§∏‡§¨‡•Ç‡§§ ‡§ö‡•å‡§Ç‡§ï‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§´‡•ã‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡§∏‡§ø‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§™‡•Ä‡§°‡§º‡§ø‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∂‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§æ‡§è ‡§ó‡§è ‡§°‡•Ä‡§è‡§®‡§è ‡§®‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§§‡•ç‡§®‡•Ä ‡§è‡§≤‡§ø‡§ú‡§æ‡§¨‡•á‡§• ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡§∏‡§® ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§≤ ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§ø‡§õ‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ‡§µ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§§‡§≤‡§æ‡§ï ‡§¶‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ! This discovery shook up both Sarah and her partner Detective Johnson who immediately called Elizabeth right away asking whether everything was alright only then did they realize too late that

ek baar ki baat hai, ek chhote se shahar mein raajakumaari naam ka ek yuva pulis adheekshan tha jo apne kartavyon ke prati poori tarah jaagrook aur samarpit theeh janta ko suraksha dene vaali sadkein saaf-suthri hon.

The gang of criminals seemed invincible: they were armed with automatic weapons that made them look like gods among men. ve har doosre vyavsaayo ko loot dete the, sabhi prakaar ki vastuyen lene ke avsaron ka intjaar karte the aur fir gaadi se door ud jaate the. They left behind devastation - homes destroyed or burned down, business owners traumatized, and people dead.

‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She was fascinated with the idea of protecting people and making sure that justice prevailed no matter what obstacles stood between her and those she swore to serve. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤‡•á‡§ú ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§ø‡§Æ ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡§ï‡§∂ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡§ø‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡§ø‡§ö‡§ï‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ü ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡•ã‡§ö ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§Æ‡•å‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§≠ ‡§â‡§†‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ 

It wasn't easy being one among many other aspiring officers vying for their chance at joining law enforcement agencies across the country. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§®‡•Ä‡§ö‡•á ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡§ï ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º‡§§‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ Her hard work paid off when she finally got selected as an entry-level police officer based out of New York City. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§•‡§æ!

Sarah started her new job feeling excited but also nervous because it meant facing some tough situations on regular basis. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§†‡§ø‡§® ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§∏‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§®‡§à ‡§≠‡•Ç‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ Sarah found herself working long hours and often had little time left over after clocking out from office. ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§π ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§°‡§ø‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§¶‡•á‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡§É ‡§ï‡§æ‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§® ‡§è‡§ú‡•á‡§Ç‡§∏‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡•Å‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡•§

One day while patrolling around midnight, Sarah came upon two men arguing loudly outside a bar. ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∂‡§∞‡§æ‡§¨ ‡§™‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§π‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§ï ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§æ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂ ‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ As soon as they noticed her presence, both individuals became confrontational towards her. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ù‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§® ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§ö ‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä-‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§æ‡§à ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ After taking statements and checking video footage taken inside the premises, Sarah determined there were grounds enough for arrest warrants against each individual involved. ‡§á‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•Ä‡§õ‡•á ‡§°‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Å‡§¨‡§π ‡§Ö‡§¶‡§æ‡§≤‡§§ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ It felt good knowing that these guys would be held accountable for their actions even though this particular case didn't make headlines or receive much attention - such cases are very common yet essential components of any society where safety comes first.

‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡•ç‡§Ø‡•Ç‡§ü‡•Ä‡§∂‡§ø‡§Ø‡§® ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She had always been fascinated with the art of hair and makeup, admiring how it could transform someone's appearance for special occasions or just to feel better about themselves overall. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡•Å‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ So when she graduated from college with her degree in cosmetology, Sarah knew that this was what she wanted to do as long-term career choice.

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§Ü‡§§‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã‡§∂‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•à‡§≤‡•Ç‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§∂‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ Her bosses were impressed at first but soon realized they needed more experienced staff members. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§£ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ It wasn't easy - there were many obstacles along the way like finding clients, managing finances, marketing herself online, etc., but nothing compared to seeing people leave feeling confident and beautiful after receiving services only provided through her work.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§à ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ï ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡•á, ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§™‡§ü‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ù‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∂‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ This became an important aspect of her job because not every client walks into her salon looking solely on their physical appearance. ‡§Ø‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§™‡§∞‡•á‡§∂‡§æ‡§® ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§Ø‡§æ‡§≤‡•Å‡§§‡§æ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§ó ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ They trusted her enough to share stories, problems, fears...and most often found comfort knowing everything would be okay eventually.

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§®‡§è ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡§ï‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§Ø ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Ü‡§ú‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§§‡§ï ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§¢‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ó‡•Ç ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ A full body wax treatment which included both face and underarm areas. ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§â‡§™‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ò‡§¨‡§∞‡§æ‡§è ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§•‡•á, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ "‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ù‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•à! I never thought my skin would look so smooth!" ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§ï‡§§‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ñ‡§°‡§º‡•á ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•á, ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•á‡§∑ ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§® ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§ö ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§Ç‡§¨‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§∞‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§™‡•à‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§è ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Not only did these women see results physically, but also mentally since now they felt comfortable wearing skirts without worrying if anyone 

Generation 4: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is beautician by profession.
---
sushri shreya ke liye jeevan hamesha ek kathin raasta tha aur vah jaanti thin ki unhein apne sapnon ko poora karna hai. She had always been fascinated with makeup and the art of beauty since she was young but never thought it could be her career path as well. lekin sachchaayi yah thi ki unhone skool mein saundaryashaastra ka adhyayan nahin kiya ya peshevar prashikshuta praapt nahin ki taaki ve ghar se baahar nikal sakein-yahaan tak ki kolej bhi na chalaaye honge! But that didn't stop Shreyas from pursuing what made her happy - to become an expert at applying cosmetics on others while also learning how they can enhance their natural features without any alteration or distortion possible. 

unhone uchit rooprekha seekhte huye kam umra se hi maatukoori naamak sthaaneey safaayi dukaanon par svacchta utpaadon aur tvacheey dekhbhaal vastuon sahit gharelu upabhokta vastuon ko vitrit karke madadgaari paartiyon mein samudaay seva jaisi vyaktigat ruchiyaaon vaali naukreeyo mein duniya ki talaash ki. It wasn't until later when one day after work hours, someone offered them a job opportunity for free trial period where if satisfied then would offer permanent employment which led to better pay package than working part time jobs elsewhere. fir us din sabse badi santushti mili; maujood logon ne sujhaav diya ki agle star par pragti ho sakti hai jo unki iccha soochi mein sarvochch ban gayeeh "beautishiyan" padonnati pareeksha dena." 

Shreyasi took this chance immediately because now she knew there were more opportunities awaiting outside those small town limits hence decided not only to take care of herself but help other people too through sharing knowledge & skills learned during training sessions given regularly by company staff members along with practical tips provided directly via social media platforms like 

Generation 5: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is beautician by profession and loves to do hair styling.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§π‡•á‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡§æ‡§á‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She had grown up watching her mother's hands move with ease as she worked on their clients at home or when they visited the salon together. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§™‡§π‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§™‡§Ø‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ So it was no surprise that Sarah decided to pursue this passion of hers after finishing high school. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§∏‡•å‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§°‡§ø‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡•ã‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡•ç‡§Ø‡•Ç‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•à‡§≤‡•Ç‡§® ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂ ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡•Å‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞ ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ! 

Sarah loved every minute spent behind those doors - from creating intricate updos to transforming someone into an entirely different style altogether through color treatments. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ï ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø ‡§Ü‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§•‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§ï ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§ø‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§π‡•à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∂‡•à‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§ø‡§µ‡§ø‡§ß‡§§‡§æ-‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§ó‡§∞‡•Ç‡§ï ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§ Her work not only brought joy but also helped boost people's self esteem which made all worthwhile for her. 

‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§â‡§® ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ That led her to start participating more frequently than usual in beauty pageants where contestants were judged based upon various criteria like confidence, poise, overall appearance etcetera. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§è‡§Å ‡§§‡§®‡§æ‡§µ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§®‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§®‡§è ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡•á‡•§ And while winning wasn't everything (she did come second once), there would always be something new gained along each journey that kept her going forward even during times when things felt tougher due to external factors beyond control such as economic downturns or pandemics causing closures/reduced operations. 

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡•á ‡§ó‡§è, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§≠‡§µ‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•á‡§∑‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§∏‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•á‡§∑ ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§π ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§¶‡§ø ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§â‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§£‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä‡•§ It gave her satisfaction knowing how much effort went into making sure everyone looked perfect without any fuss. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ, ‡§á‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§à ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ú‡§®‡•ç‡§Æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø 

Generation 6: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is beautician by profession.
---
ek baar ki baat hai jab mahilaaon ke liye apne ghar se pare kariyar ka peechha karna ansuna tha aur ek sundar vyakti hona vishisht nahin lagta tha. But that was before the rise of beauty and wellness industries - where women like Maria could make their mark as experts in these fields while also earning decent money for themselves. 20 saal pahle unka janma lusero mein gareeb parivaar vaale shikshit varg mein hua tha-unke paas koyi anya avsar ya sasaadhan upalabdh na hon to ve jeevan chhod deti thin jo unhone anubhav kiya tha usse adhik ujjval ho jaati thin. As she grew older her passion towards helping others with skincare needs made it easier than ever to pursue this career path. yahaan tak ki kam umra mein hi maarija ne gharon mein sevaayein dene aur doston dvaara di gayi madad sahaj prateet hoti thi. By age fourteen, she had already started working part time at one such salons near home. nirdesh praapt karte huye, sookhi tvacha dekhbhaal utpaadon ke namooteekran se lekar graahkon ke chehre masheeneen raksha tantrika antargrahnon aur shareer vigyaanon donon taiyaar karni padengi taaki sabhyata svacch aur sampoorn roop la sake. She learned all there's to know from veterans in the field including how important customer service skills were essential not just when handling clients but even during marketing campaigns which helped build brand loyalty among customers over years. ab bees saal door use ehsaas hota hai ki ye logon ke peshevar banne ke moolyavaan gunavattaapoorn charan the. Overall, being able to help people feel confident through looking good on the outside has been extremely fulfilling for Marisa throughout life.

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§è‡§ï ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∂‡§π‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ There lived an ambitious young woman named Lily, whose passion was beauty care from the time she could remember anything at all. ‡§≤‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§®‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ö‡§•‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•Ä‡§õ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had always been drawn to make-up artistry as it allowed her creativity free rein while also helping others look their best for special occasions or even just everyday life. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ö‡§≤ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§¨‡•ç‡§Ø‡•Ç‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•à‡§≤‡•Ç‡§® ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ! ‡§≤‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂ ‡§•‡•á‡•§ However, not everything went smoothly because one day during peak season, two ladies walked right past without making any appointments despite being shown around earlier that same morning. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Å‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç, ‡§≤‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ù‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ They were impressed enough after seeing what other customers received that evening, but still felt like something wasn't quite right. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§æ‡§™‡§∏ ‡§Ü‡§à‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ This request sparked curiosity within herself since no one else ever asked such questions before - maybe these women wanted more than basic touch ups? decided it was best if she worked hard every day as a driver so they could make ends meet. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§ï‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§ó ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ Despite all this, there were still moments when emotion overwhelmed her. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§°‡§º‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§æ‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ‡§à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∂‡§π‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§ ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ, ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∂‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ-‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•á ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§£ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§¨‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§£ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ‡•§ It gave them hope and kept their spirits up during difficult times. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§≠‡§≤‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à, ‡§è‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡•Å‡§ï ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞‡§£-‡§™‡•ã‡§∑‡§£ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§® ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç reason. 

Generation 6: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Driver by profession.

emili ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ê‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§ï‡§¶‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§æ‡§•‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•å‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•á‡•§ As she grew up and began to explore her options for career paths, the idea of becoming an auto mechanic was always at the forefront of her mind - it seemed like such a perfect fit!

‡§è‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§æ‡§à ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ß‡•á ‡§Æ‡•à‡§ï‡•á‡§®‡§ø‡§ï‡§≤ ‡§á‡§Ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ-‡§µ‡§π ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§π‡§ø‡§∏‡§æ‡§¨ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡•á ‡§õ‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡§æ‡§ñ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Her classmates were all older men with decades worth of experience under their belts. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§è‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡•§ She studied hard every day, often staying late after classes just so that she could catch up on any material missed during lectures or labs. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§´‡•á‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§£ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§∂‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ‡•§

After graduating from college, Emily landed her first job as an apprentice mechanic at one of the most prestigious car dealerships in town. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∂‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§°‡•Ä‡§≤‡§∞‡§∂‡§ø‡§™ ‡§â‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡§® ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡•ã‡§∞‡•ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ‡§µ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•á‡§∑‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§§‡§æ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ But despite being overwhelmed at times, Emily thrived on this challenge and quickly became known among her colleagues not only for her technical prowess but also for her ability to work well under pressure.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§∏‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•á, ‡§è‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∞‡•à‡§Ç‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡•Ä, ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§¶‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡§ï ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§π‡§æ‡§• ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§π‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ It wasn't long before customers started coming back time and again simply because they knew no other shop would be able to handle repairs quite as efficiently as hers did. ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡§Ç‡§§‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡§æ‡§π ‡§®‡•á ‡§è‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•á‡§∑ ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∂‡•ã‡§ß‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ The business took off almost immediately, thanks largely due to word-of-mouth recommendations made both online and through personal connections within the automotive industry.

‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á, ‡§è‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§≤‡•á ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡§ó‡§ø‡§®‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•ã‡§ü‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡§® ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Ä‡•§ Customized cars are now a staple of many luxury brands, and clients come from around the world seeking

sheershakah ek draayivar ki yaatra 
Genre: Short Story/Fiction 
varshanoh vartamaan kaal (20XX) 
Setting: A busy city roadway with heavy traffic and honking cars around the clock 
mukhya paatron mein shaamil haih jenet-ek kushal aur anubhavheen mahila chaalkon ke liye traasaport esosiyeshan dvaara prashikshit peshevar gaadi chalaane vaali 
Premise : Jennet's journey as she learns to navigate through life while also navigating her way behind the wheel of various vehicles on different routes across town 
kaaryakaari saaraashaatahh yah laghu upanyaas jevet ko apne vyaktigat sangharshon se niptate huye dekhta hai jo use har din sadkon par le jaati rahi hain. She becomes confident that even when faced with obstacles or setbacks along the way, it will not stop her drive towards success and fulfillment .

Generation 1: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Farmer by profession and lives alone.
