jooliya ko hamesha se krishi ka shauk tha aur bachpan mein hi unhone kheton ki dekhbhaal karna seekh liya tha. She had grown up on her family's farmstead where she learned the ins-and-outs of farming from an early age. jab vah 20 saal ke ho gayin to unhein apne pita dvaara ek chhota faarm diya gaya jo sevaanivritt huye lekin fir bhi yuva mahila par garva haasil nahin kar sake. Julia took over his legacy with great pride as it was all that he ever wanted for their land - prosperous crops year after year. uski umra badhtane ke baavjood use ab tak har fasli paidaavaar milti rahegi; sabse acche beej lagaaye jaate the taaki ve uchchatam gunavatta vaale utpaad pradaan na karte hon ya adhoore fool na aa jaayen. The sun would always rise before dawn but so did Julianna because there were no days off when you owned your own business!

uske din subah teji laata tha, aur jaldabaaji hoti thi, aur agle do ghante seeding masheeneekrit roop se poora samarpit hote the. Every step involved precision timing which meant every second counted towards success or failure depending upon how much attention one paid during those critical moments. tanaavapoorn svaroop ne jeevan ke anyatha sundrata se pare rang daala, aur antim faldaari stant lagbhag safed chehre par chamak legaa. Yet despite this strenuous routine, Julie remained focused throughout each day without losing sight even once at what lay ahead.

din der tak chalti thin, aur nishkarshatoghon ke peechhe fasi rassiyon ko todta tha, jisse ped girte the aur patthron ke gucchedaar avrodho ko halka padta tha. It seemed like hours until finally, night fell again and darkness set back into motion. svargadoot mushkil se pravesh karte hain aur door

Once upon a time there was an adorable woman named Sarah Jane who lived on the outskirts of town. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§ñ‡•á‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ She loved to spend every day working hard alongside them as they grew crops that would feed their community for months at end. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§á‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§Ø‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§§‡•Å‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§´‡§∏‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Every year she made sure all vegetables were grown from seeds saved over years so it could be passed down generation after generations. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã‡§∂‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ú‡•à‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§ó‡§æ‡§è ‡§ó‡§è ‡§≠‡•ã‡§ú‡§® ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ñ‡§∞‡•Ä‡§¶‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§ But one thing remained constant: Sarah's love towards farming which kept growing stronger each passing moment.

‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§•‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She was born into an agricultural community where farming had been passed down from generation to generation for centuries. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§™‡•Ä‡§¢‡§º‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§ú‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Samantha grew up on the farm alongside other children of similar backgrounds. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø ‡§Ü‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä-‡§ñ‡•á‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§´‡§∏‡§≤‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§ó‡•á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•å‡§∏‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡§æ ‡§ñ‡§∞‡§æ‡§¨ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ At school she excelled at science subjects such as biology or botany because it came so naturally to her. ‡§ê‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§•‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶‡•á‡§π ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§® ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•á‡§∑ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§á‡§Ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§°‡•â‡§ï‡•ç‡§ü‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ However, every time that thought crossed her mind, something inside reminded herself why she loved this life - being surrounded by nature's beauty while tending crops made her feel fulfilled beyond words. ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§ñ‡•á‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§® ‡§ñ‡§∞‡•Ä‡§¶‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à‡•§ Her parents were proud of their daughter's accomplishments and they supported her decision wholeheartedly. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡•ç‡§•‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§ø ‡§ú‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§ñ‡•á‡§§ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ They worked side by side each day making sure everything went according to plan. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡•á‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Å ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Maya would help out whenever there needed be extra hands around. ‡§Æ‡§à ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•å‡§ü‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§´‡§∏‡§≤ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ The harvest festival celebrated all over India during October/November marks one year since Jay & Samantha got married. ‡§µ‡•á ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•ã‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡•ã‡§∏‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ‡§è ‡§ó‡§è ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§µ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§≤‡•á‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§≠‡•ã‡§ú‡§® ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç, ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§®‡•É‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ Everyone joins together in celebrating what makes them unique: their culture, traditions, food, music and dance!

saara ek kisaan thi jo apne parivaar ke saath graameen ilaakon mein rahti hai aur pyaar se bhojan ki faslon ka paalan-poshan karna pasand karti hai jismein vah mahaanta laati haih makyi, gehoon, chana aur sabjiyon sahit anya prakaaron ko ugaane vaale upaj utpaadkon ne unhein "prithvi" yaani prithveevaasi naam diya."

Generation 6: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Farmer by profession.
---
‡§è‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡•á‡§ü‡•Ä‡§É ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ò‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡•§ 

Sarah was born to farmers - her father and mother worked tirelessly on their farm all year round. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§§‡§æ‡§≤‡•ç‡§≤‡•Å‡§ï ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä-‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§ñ‡•á‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Sarah grew up with the love of nature around them - they were surrounded by green fields that stretched as far as she could see from where ever they stood. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§´‡§∏‡§≤‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§ó‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡•á ‡§¨‡•á‡§ö‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ñ‡•á‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ì‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ Her childhood memories are filled with images like this one; it's how life went for most people living there. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§ï‡§°‡§º ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ The pandemic hit hard, leaving everyone struggling financially. ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡§æ‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Æ‡•å‡§∏‡§Æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ And so began the struggle of everyday survival for Sarah and many others too. ‡§Æ‡§π‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡§ï ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡§§‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§™‡•à‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∂‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ But when things started getting worse, it became even harder. ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ-‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§ú ‡§ö‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤‡•á‡§ú ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§°‡•â‡§ï‡•ç‡§ü‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡•§ She knew what would happen if something happened to either or both parents because then everything will be lost. ‡§Ø‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ Every day at school felt more difficult than before. ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§≠‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ñ‡§§‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§°‡§º ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡•§ One morning after finishing college, she got an offer letter from another hospital which seemed better than hers but had less pay scale. ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Å ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•á ‡§§‡•ã ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ? What happens next? ‡§ï‡•å‡§® ‡§≠‡•Å‡§ó‡§§‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§ó‡§æ? Who will take care of us now? ‡§Ø‡•á ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§§ ‡§Ü ‡§ó‡§è‡•§ With no job prospects coming along soon enough, she decided not to accept any offers until she gets a good package. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø, ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§™‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§¶ ‡§® ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶, ‡§â‡§® ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡§ï‡§∂ ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§Æ ‡§µ‡•á‡§§‡§® ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ It made her feel depressed since she didn't know anyone else offering higher salaries yet. ‡§á‡§® ‡§∏‡§¨‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§ö ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ú‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§® ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§ú‡§¨‡•Ç‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§°‡§º‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§Æ‡§æ‡§è ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ‡•§ There came days when nothing looked promising anymore, and I thought my dream might never come true again. ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡§æ, "‡§Æ‡•Å 

Generation 7: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Farmer by profession and lives with her family. ‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ñ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§≠‡•ã‡§ú‡§® ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§™‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She decides to plant some vegetables on the farm land but she doesn't have any tools for that work so what will happen next?

‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§£ ‡§á‡§≤‡§æ‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ê‡§®‡•Ä ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞‡§£-‡§™‡•ã‡§∑‡§£ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ One day Anne found herself struggling as there was not enough food left at home to feed everyone. ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§ñ‡•á‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§§‡•ã ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§® ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ñ‡•á‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∂‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ But still Anne decided to give it a try. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ñ‡§∞‡•Ä‡§¶‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ü‡•ç‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡•ã‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§â‡§ó ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ As days passed by slowly, little plants started growing out of those seeds. ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∞‡§ú ‡§ö‡§Æ‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§è‡§®‡•Ä ‡§â‡§® ‡§™‡•å‡§ß‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ñ‡•á‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ò‡•Ç‡§Æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ The more time went into this task, the happier Anna became because seeing these tiny shoots grow made her feel like they were all hers - their own success.

numbers. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•á‡§∑ ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§†‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡§æ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§ß‡•Ä ‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡§§ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§ø‡§ñ‡§∞‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§Æ‡§π‡•Ä‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§•‡§ï ‡§ú‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ö ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á, ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§π ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§ß‡•ã‡§ñ‡§æ‡§ß‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§®‡•á‡§ü‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ó‡§π‡§∞‡§æ‡§à ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ò‡•Å‡§∏ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§ø‡§∞‡§´‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ She had always wanted to make something of herself and knew that the key was hard work coupled with dedication towards her goals. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡•à‡§Ç‡§ï ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§≠ ‡§â‡§†‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§µ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ As she worked tirelessly day after day, Lena began noticing how much money people were able to save if they made use of banking services properly. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ ‡§°‡§æ‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡•á ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Ø‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ 

One particular Saturday morning, as Lina walked into her office for another busy weekday ahead of them all, she noticed someone standing outside waiting for their turn at one of those teller windows where customers would come inside to deposit or withdraw cash from accounts. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§§‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à, ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§Ö‡§ß‡•Ä‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡§ï ‡§á‡§Ç‡§§‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ This caused frustration among many because it meant losing valuable time which could have been spent elsewhere doing other things. 

‡§á‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§¶‡•á ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§π‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡§§‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø, ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§É "‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∂‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à?" It's just an idea I came up with," so she decided to go out there on Monday afternoon when no one else seemed interested enough to do anything about this problem. ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ, "‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ú‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Å!" So off went Leana armed only with some paperwork and pen ready to try and implement what little ideas she thought might help solve these issues. 

‡§â‡§∏ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ö‡§ï‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡§π ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ñ‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§¨‡§§‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ß‡•à‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§§‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ The man said he couldn't believe his eyes when Lena showed him around the new queue management system implemented by the bank staff members working under her supervision. ‡§á‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§§‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡•Å‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§≠‡§µ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ‡§´‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ü‡§Ç‡§ï‡•á ‡§ó‡§è ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§ö‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§à‡•§ Everyone appreciated being treated like human beings instead of numbers lined up behind glass counters - especially since most banks didn't offer such courtesy before now!

---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She had always loved writing stories of her own creation, but it wasn't until she discovered that she could connect with ghosts on another level entirely that Sarah realized just how powerful words can be when used properly. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≠‡•Ç‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Å ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§æ‡§à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ It was then that she knew for sure - this power within herself would become an integral part not only of her career as author, but of her life itself.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ñ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ, ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§π ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ They were able to share their experiences from beyond our realm, offering insights into events long past or even future possibilities yet unrealized. ‡§á‡§® ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§‡§ö‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ù‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ó‡§è ‡§∞‡§π‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡•ç‡§ò‡§æ‡§ü‡§® ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ This led them both down new paths they never thought possible before: researching ancient texts written centuries ago, exploring historical sites where legends say supernatural entities still roam free today, all while learning more about themselves than ever imagined.

‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§•, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§Ö‡§∏‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ‡§® ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§∏‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§™‡§π‡§ö‡§æ‡§® ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à, ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§® ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡§Æ ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§π‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ü‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§π‡§Æ‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ù‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§§‡•ã ‡§π‡§Æ ‡§á‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§ö‡•Ç‡§ï ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•á‡•§ As much as there are those out there skeptical towards such claims, what remains certain is that these interactions have given Sarah immense joy and fulfillment throughout every day of her existence since discovering its true potentials so many years prior. 

Generation 6: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Author by profession and has written many books.

There was this woman named Sophia, she loved to read since childhood but never imagined that her passion would one day become the driving force behind becoming an author herself! sofiya ek lekhak banne ke apni yaatra mein sabse acche samay se gujri thi aur khud ko us pariyojna ka hissa dekha jo unhone hamesha sapnon mein padhi gayi pustakein likhin thin-uski rachanaaon ne use duniya tak uthaaya jahaan vah ja saki, anyatha nahin. Her journey had been filled with ups and downs as every writer knows - it wasn't easy for anyone to get their first book published or even recognized at times when they were just starting out on their path towards success. fir bhi unka maanna badal gaye bina chala gaya; ve abhi bhi prerit hoti hain taaza saamagreey nirmaata, har din seekhte huye aur jeevan shaili vaastavikta praapt karne lagti hai.

‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§µ‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ñ‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä, ‡§è‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü‡•§ She had worked tirelessly to perfect her craft and now she was finally ready for the world to see it. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§™‡•Å‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∂‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∂‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡•â‡§®‡•ç‡§ö ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç! 

As Emily made her way through New York City's busy streets towards the event venue where they were hosting their book launch party, she couldn't help but feel nervous. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§π‡•à-‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ñ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§â‡§§‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ When she arrived at the hotel ballroom that would be transformed into an intimate literary salon on this special night, there wasn't much time left before everyone started filing in. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§Æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ó‡•Å‡§ú‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ, ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§¨‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§†‡§æ‡§à‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡§°‡§º‡•á ‡§π‡•ã‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§≠‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ The energy of anticipation filled the air as people whispered excitedly among themselves while waiting anxiously outside the room.

‡§è‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•á‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§ö ‡§§‡•à‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§ó‡§π‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ç‡§∏ ‡§≤‡•Ä‡•§ As soon as the doors opened, cheers erupted from every corner - fans shouting out names or just expressing excitement over seeing such famous faces. ‡§è‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§á‡§≤‡•á ‡§®‡•á ‡§≠‡•Ä‡§°‡§º ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¨‡•ã‡§ß‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§è ‡§•‡•á‡•§ "It feels incredible," Emmaile said with tears welling up in her eyes." ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§™‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡•Ç‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä ", ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ", ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ù‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§Æ‡•á‡§∞‡•á ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ‡§® ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡§æ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§Æ‡•á‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á‡•§"

The audience listened rapturously as Emmaille read aloud excerpts from each chapter of her novel. ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§ï ‡§™‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§† ‡§™‡§æ‡§†‡§ï ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ú‡•ç‡§µ‡§≤‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•á ‡§ï‡§Æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Finally, when all pages turned back, the crowd burst forth in applause, giving Emilie one last chance to take center stage once again. 

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü, ‡§è‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§≤‡•á ‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§Ç‡§∏‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç, ‡§¶‡•ã‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§â‡§™‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§à ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡§æ‡§• ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ They congratulated her on being published so young, praised how powerful her writing skills are, and expressed gratitude toward her work. ‡§è‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂ ‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§•‡•ã‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡§∞‡§æ‡§® ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•á

Generation 1: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Sailor by profession.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø ‡§Ü‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ As far back as she could remember, the sound of waves crashing against shore had been music to her ears. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡§ö‡§™‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§®‡§ó‡§ø‡§®‡§§ ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§®‡§æ‡§µ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§è ‡§•‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§≠‡•Ç‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ò‡§ø‡§∞‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ It was only natural then that Sarah chose sailing when it came time for college and earned herself an internship with one of the world's largest shipping companies. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§π ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ó‡§π ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è-‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ì‡§∞ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ï‡§¶‡§Æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§π‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§® ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Over those years at sea, Sarah learned everything there was to know - from seamanship skills like knot tying or chart reading to more technical aspects such as navigational systems and maintenance procedures. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ß‡§ï‡•á‡§≤ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§µ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ü‡§™ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡§π‡§æ‡§¶‡•Å‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§ñ‡§§‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§°‡§º ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ñ‡•ã ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ And so, over many long days on board ships around the globe, Sarah became not just skilled but also resilient, resourceful, and courageous beyond measure. ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç "‡§®‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï" ‡§â‡§™‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§Ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§ú‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ; ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§π‡§∏ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§π‡§ø‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä? She faced each challenge headfirst, never giving up even under extreme circumstances. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§π‡§æ‡§¶‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§•‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§™‡§π‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ó‡§è ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§®‡•á‡§§‡•É‡§§‡•ç‡§µ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§§‡•à‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä‡•§ They saw how she rallied them during difficult times, keeping everyone focused and motivated towards their common goal: delivering cargo safely across oceans while maintaining high standards of safety and efficiency. ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞, ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§ú‡§∞‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§à ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ Many people looked upon her as someone they wanted working alongside them, especially since every ship needed somebody who knew what he/she was doing. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ñ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Her passion for this work continued to grow stronger than ever before. ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§®‡§à ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§®‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•å‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡•§ But most importantly, she found something inside which made all other challenges worthwhile. 

Generation 2: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Sailor by profession and lives alone.

‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§•‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§§‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ Growing up as the only child of two parents working long hours to make ends meet had made her realize early on that she needed to be self-reliant if ever they were not around or could no longer provide for them financially due to unforeseen circumstances. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§µ‡§π 18 ‡§∏‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤‡•á‡§ú ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡§ï ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞‡§£-‡§™‡•ã‡§∑‡§£ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§¶‡§ø ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§†‡§ø‡§® ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ-‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•à‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ñ‡§°‡§º‡•á ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ She was determined from an early age to become independent because it gave her freedom over her life choices without relying solely upon others' approvals or opinions.

‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï ‡§π‡•à, ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡•à‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§•‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ó ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§à ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ It wasn't until recently when Samantha realized how much sailors are undervalued compared with other professions since their work often goes unsung while still being essential to our society. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡•Ä‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§á‡§®‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è, ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ï‡§π‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ï‡§ø "‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§æ‡§Ø‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§∞‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à"‡•§ Despite all this hardship at sea, there have been moments where she has felt lost and homesick but always found herself coming back home safely after each trip.

‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≤‡§Ç‡§¨‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•á‡§≤‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§µ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§§‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•á‡§≤‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§è ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Her love for cooking allowed her to create delicious meals using fresh ingredients purchased locally which kept her healthy throughout those tough times away from family and friends. ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Å ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§∂‡•à‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡•ç‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§§‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§π ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Å‡§à‡•§

Samanta would also occasionally visit landlocked areas like cities during breaks between voyages, making new connections through travel experiences such as meeting fellow explorer groups along different routes, sharing stories of adventures faced while out at sea together, etceteras. ‡§á‡§® ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§†‡§≠‡•á‡§°‡§º‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§® ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§ö ‡§∏‡•å‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§£ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§ó‡§§ ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡•ã‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä

Generation 4: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Sailor by profession and has to face the challenges of being an only daughter.
---
‡§è‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ö ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§ú‡§¨‡•Ç‡§§ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§®‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ As she grew up on her family's small farm near the coastline, Alice spent most days exploring rocky shores or sailing out into open waters with her father. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§®‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ 

After years of training at sea school, Alice finally got her chance when one day, while searching for lost cargo offshore, Captain James hired her as his first mate aboard The Bluebird - a sleek yacht that sailed across oceans around the world. ‡§è‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à-‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä! 

But things didn't go exactly according to plan from thereonwards... ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§¨‡•ç‡§≤‡•Ç‡§¨‡§∞‡•ç‡§° ‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§è‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•á‡§≤‡•á ‡§è‡§ï‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§¨‡•á‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§™‡§æ‡§è‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ She missed home often but knew it was what had brought them all together here. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≤‡§ó‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç, ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§§‡•Ç‡§´‡§æ‡§® ‡§Ü‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§∞‡§™‡§æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ One time they were stranded without food or water after their ship crash landed onto uncharted territory during storm season, another time thieves broke into their cabin stealing everything valuable before setting fire to the boat causing chaos amongst passengers leaving everyone terrified. ‡§á‡§® ‡§∏‡§¨‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§ö ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§ú‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶‡•á‡§∂ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§∏‡•Å‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§¨‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ö‡§æ‡§≤‡§ï ‡§¶‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§¶‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§™‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§§‡§ü‡§∞‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§â‡§§‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ All this made life even more difficult for Alice alone as captain James always seemed far away whenever he needed help. ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•á‡§≤‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§®‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had been sailing for as long she could remember - ever since her father took her out on the water when she was just five years old and taught her how to steer his boat with ease. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§π ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§≠‡§µ‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à, ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ It wasn't until later that Sarah realized it might not be entirely healthy or safe. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§¶‡•á‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ö‡•Å‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§É ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•Ä‡§õ‡•á ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∂‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ 

Sarah grew up near an idyllic coastal town where fishermen would dock their boats at sunset each day, casting lines into the sea while children played tag along the beach. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§® ‡§Æ‡§õ‡•Å‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§®‡§ú‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ‡§µ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞‡§ó‡§æ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§® ‡§¨‡•á‡§ö‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ But even though they were only passing acquaintances, something always drew them together: the shared love of being close enough to nature so you can feel its rhythm beneath your feet but far away from civilization where people often forget what matters most. 

‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Å ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ù‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ï‡•å‡§® ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Whenever anyone made fun of her passion for boating because "girls don't do this kinda stuff," Mommy said things like, "'I know I raised my daughter differently than others,' 'but why should we let society dictate our lives?' ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§ï‡§∞, '‡§Ü‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ù‡•á ‡§∏‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§™ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞‡§µ‡§æ‡§π ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§§‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡•Å‡§ï ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è', ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡•Å‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§® ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡•§"

As time went on, however, Sarah found herself struggling more and more against societal norms surrounding women in maritime professions. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§™‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§¨‡§π‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§ï‡•É‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≤‡§ó‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡§æ (‡§î‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§â‡§†‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ)‡•§ And yet despite these challenges, there are moments throughout history where strong women have defied gender stereotypes within male dominated industries such as seafaring which makes me wonder if perhaps some men aren't intimidated by powerful females after all?

‡§ú‡•á‡§® ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§™‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ì‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ As soon as she was old enough to hold onto something steady while swimming or kayaking, Jane loved being outdoors with nature's majesty at hand. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∂‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Å‡§µ‡§ø‡§ß‡§æ‡§è‡§Å ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•Ä‡§Ç, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ú‡•á‡§® ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§∂‡•à‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§Ü‡§à-‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç ‡§§‡•ã ‡§µ‡•á ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§æ‡§Ø‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She started small - renting boats from local marinas for weekends away. ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ And so began Janes incredible journey into becoming one of the most respected women captains in all of New England!

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§Ü‡§§‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä, ‡§ú‡•á‡§® ‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§µ ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ At first people laughed when they heard what she wanted to do but over time, those same individuals grew jealousy because this young woman had found that perfect balance between work and play. ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ-‡§µ‡§π ‡§®‡§æ‡§µ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ‡§µ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä, ‡§ö‡§æ‡§≤‡§ï ‡§¶‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§¶‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§è ‡§∞‡§ñ‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§ú‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§†‡•Ä‡§ï ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ï ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§™‡•á‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Å‡§ö ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ But more than anything else, travel became part of her routine. ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§ö‡§≤ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§§‡•Ç‡§´‡§æ‡§® ‡§π‡•ã ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§ß‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•å‡§∏‡§Æ, ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§™‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ü‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§æ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ It gave her peace like nothing ever could have before.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡•á ‡§ó‡§è, ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Å‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ö ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡§æ ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ó‡§π‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§• ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ One day during a storm offshore, she realized just how much control we humans really have over our own lives. ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§Ö‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§ñ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§á‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§π‡§Æ ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•á ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§£‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§° ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ This realization led to many years of introspection wherein she sought answers within herself until finally finding them outside upon reaching land again after months spent adrift at sea.

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§ß‡§ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶, ‡§ú‡•á‡§® ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä 

Generation 7: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Sailor by profession.
---
naavik jaismeen ne apne jeevan ki shuruaat ek chhote se machhli pakdane vaale gaav mein bade hone ke saath ki thi jo samudra taton aur lahron ka ghar hai. She was always fascinated with the ocean and its vastness that she decided to become a sailor at an early age. unke maata-pita ko yah pasand nahin tha kyonki ve chaahte the ki vah adhyayan kar sake lekin unhone parivaar ya naukriyo jaise paaramprik drishtikonon par sandeh vyakt karte huye nausena prashikshu ban gayin. 
Jasmine had been working as captain for several years now when one day her ship encountered trouble off of Africa's coastline during their routine fishing trip. uska poora dal doob raha tha taaki use hi utrana pada aur fase huye logon tak suraksha balon ko sandesh dena padta tha. The rescue operation took days but Jasmine managed it all without any help from anyone else because she knew what needed to be done. durghatna ke baad jab sabhi ladkon ne bataaya ki kis taraf dekhkar nirnay lene honge to fir se hamla hoya tab jis din main behosh huyi thi. But this time I refused to give up on my crew members so easily. mujhe lagbhag tees minat intjaar karni padi, mera dil daudaate huye roomaal fenk diya aur mere liye praarthana ki."I know you are out there," said Jasmine while fighting back tears "We will find each other again soon!"

agle varshon mein, jasleen afreeki deshon ke bandargaaho sahit har sthaapit port kol par niymit sevaayein deti thin, antardesheey nadiyon aur chainlon ke sanchaalkon ke netritva mein safal abhiyaanon ke peechhe ek moti reedh hoti thi. Generation 1: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Spokesman by profession.

jen‡•Ä ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§µ‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had always been climate change policy held across Europe, Jenny met someone whose views resonated deeply inside her soul - Mr Smith. ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ø‡§• ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•á‡§≤‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç Generation 2: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Spokesman by profession.
---
saara ek kushal aur anubhvi vakta thin jinhein apne kaam ke liye bahut sammaan diya jaata tha. She had been working at the same company for over ten years and was well-known within her industry as one of their top spokesperson's. saath hi unhone unke braand ko badhaava dene mein madad ki thi jo duniya par haavi ho gaya tha. Her passionate speeches and relatable stories always left audiences captivated. 

unki sabse mahatvapoorn upasthitiyon ne logon se seedhe baat karte huye darshakon tak prabuddh hote dekha. Sarah knew how to connect with people on both personal levels while also sharing crucial information that would help them make informed decisions or stay updated on new trends. yahaan tak ki uchchatam star ya shiksha praapt vyavsaayi sahit graahkon ke sampark mein rakhna uska sarvochch lakshya ban gaya.

Despite all this success, however, there were times when she felt like nobody could understand what it meant being constantly under pressure from various stakeholders, managing multiple projects simultaneously, dealing with constant rejection, and even getting ridiculed online if something went wrong during presentations. fir bhi, saara lagaataar majboot hoti gayi taaki use behtari mil sake. Every time someone doubted whether they should trust her words because "she has never made any mistakes," she reminded herself why speaking out matters so much: To inform others of important facts and provide solutions where needed.

‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§â‡§ú‡•ç‡§ú‡•ç‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ She had always been interested and passionate about public speaking since she was young but never realized that it could be her career path until later on when life took an unexpected turn for the better. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§π‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§≤‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§ú‡§®‡§ø‡§ï ‡§≠‡§æ‡§∑‡§£ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§®‡•ç‡§µ‡§Ø‡§ï ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡§ï‡§∂ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à‡•§ At first hesitant to accept due to fear of failure or rejection from others, Sarah finally decided to take up this opportunity as it would allow her to pursue something she loved while also gaining valuable experience which can help further her future endeavors.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§®‡§à ‡§≠‡•Ç‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ò‡§ø‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ-‡§ú‡•ã ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¨‡•ã‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§§‡§ï‡§®‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•Å‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§§‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ But despite being overwhelmed at times with all these tasks ahead, Sarah remained focused, determined and dedicated towards making sure everyone got their chance to improve themselves through learning new skills together under one roof -the community college's Public Speaking Programme.

‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§õ‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡§ï ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§è‡•§ As such, they began receiving invitations to speak at various events around town, wherein Sarah often accompanied them to support and guide them throughout each presentation . ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§®‡§æ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π‡§ú‡§®‡§ï ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤‡•á‡§ú ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§á‡§® ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ú‡§æ‡§ó‡§∞‡•Ç‡§ï ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ‡•§

As time passed, more opportunities came along to assist people beyond just those attending classes within the program itself. ‡§â‡§¶‡§æ‡§π‡§∞‡§£ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§â‡§® ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Å‡§ö‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§®‡§è ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§™‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§≤‡•â‡§®‡•ç‡§ö ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§µ‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§¶‡§æ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§Ü‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ In response, she offered guidance & tips before helping facilitate contact between potential clients/employers seeking expertise in communication strategies versus individuals looking forward to sharing knowledge regarding different topics like marketing etcetera.

when Sarah felt like she had to choose between what seemed right for herself versus doing it out of obligation or duty towards others. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡•â‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡•ã‡§∞‡•á‡§ü ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§¢‡§º‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ó‡§è ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡•Å‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡•Ä, ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§® ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§‡§ö‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ It wasn't until then that she realized how much more fulfillment came from being able to connect with people on an emotional level rather than just as colleagues or business partners. ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§Ö‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•Å‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§â‡§™‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ù‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§• ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ From this point forward, Sarah made sure not only did she meet all professional expectations but also took time every day to check up on those around them, whether they be friends, family members, or even strangers. ‡§á‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§ó‡§§ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Æ‡§ú‡§¨‡•Ç‡§§ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≠‡•Ä‡§§‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§æ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ In conclusion, Sarah learned that success isn't always measured through tangible accomplishments alone. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§ú‡§æ‡§Ø, ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡§Ø‡§æ‡§≤‡•Å‡§§‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§®‡•á, ‡§∏‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡•Å‡§≠‡•Ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§≠‡§≤‡§æ‡§à ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§è ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ü‡§™ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ 

Generation 5: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Spokesman by profession. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä 150 ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∂‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è‡•§
---
As the spokesperson for one of the most prominent companies on earth, Sarah was used to being at center stage every day - but nothing could have prepared her for what happened next. ‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡•å‡§∞‡§æ‡§® ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•â‡§®‡•ç‡§´‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§•‡•Ä, ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§≤‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡§ï ‡§´‡•ã‡§® ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§à ‡§≤‡§æ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡§≤‡§æ‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§¶‡•á‡§∂ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ With no time left and little information available, she rushed home as fast as possible with only this vague knowledge that he might be somewhere near their childhood hometown. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ó‡§æ‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ‡§à, ‡§µ‡§π ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§®‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§• ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä-‡§è‡§ï ‡§°‡§∞ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•å‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶ ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§¨‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ As soon as she arrived back there, however, it all came flooding out: The fears, doubts, worries...the fact that they had been estranged from each other since his last visit years ago when things got too tough between them. ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§ö ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§¨‡§ö‡§æ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•à, ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ But now, against everything else going wrong around him, Sarah knew deep down inside herself that whatever happens next would not just affect her family or company's reputation - it would change both hers and her brother's lives forever. 

Generation 6: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Spokesman by profession.
---
‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡•Ä ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§µ‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She had grown up surrounded by politics and social justice issues that her parents were involved with as activists for many years before she was born. ‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡§º‡•Ä ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∂‡•á‡§ï‡§¶‡§Æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡§®‡•Ä‡§§‡§ø ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Ø‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡§®‡•Ä‡§§‡§ø‡§ï ‡§π‡§≤‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§ö ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡•ã‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§ø‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§•‡•Ä-‡§è‡§ï ‡§ê‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§æ‡§ú ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§∞‡§ñ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ Her passionate nature combined with the right amount of empathy made Sophie an excellent spokesperson to represent different organizations or causes which needed their voice heard loudly across society.

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§Ü‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø, ‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§®‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•á‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She would attend every rally, conference, seminar, meeting - anything where there might be someone worth speaking on behalf of. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§æ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§à ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ó‡§†‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ The first organization hired Sophie worked closely with international human rights groups advocating against discrimination based upon sexual orientation and gender identity. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶, ‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§µ‡§∞‡§£‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§≤‡§µ‡§æ‡§Ø‡•Å ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§® ‡§ú‡§æ‡§ó‡§∞‡•Ç‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§≠‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§µ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§ó‡§Æ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§∏‡§π‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§™‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ As time went on, more opportunities came knocking at Sophies doorstep and soon enough, she became one of those rare individuals whose words could move mountains when it comes down to making change happen.

‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡•å‡§∞‡§æ‡§®, ‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§≠‡•Ç‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Every speech, interview, press release, letter written always reminded herself why this work mattered so much. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§∑‡§£ ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§‡§ö‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡§æ; ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§® ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ And though some days proved harder than others due to personal challenges like burnout from too much traveling or fatigue after long hours spent writing countless emails and letters - Sofia never lost sight of what motivated her: people's lives being impacted positively because they knew somebody cared. ‡§Ø‡§π‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§†‡§ø‡§® ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Æ‡§ú‡§¨‡•Ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ 

Generation 7: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Spokesman by profession.
---
elis jonsan ek mahila vyakti thin jo apne poore jeevan mein bhaashnon ke prati junoon rakhti thi aur unhone unhein kariyar ka mukhya hissa banvaaya hai. As the spokesperson for one of Australia's most prominent companies, Alice had to deliver speeches at every opportunity she got - from annual conferences and meetings with investors, to product launch events or charity galas. vah sabhi prakaar ki saamagriyon se avgat hona pasand karte huye har shabd ko duniya par chhod deti-aur yahaan tak ki uske darshakon ya graahkon ko prabuddh karna chaahenge taaki ve use sun sakein. 

Alice was not only skilled as an excellent public speaker but also knew how to make her audience feel comfortable while listening to what they were saying. logon ne socha ki elis sirf bol sakte haih lekin vaastavikta alvida nahin jaanti! She could captivate any crowd without fail because it came naturally to her: speaking confidently, making eye contact when necessary, using body language effectively, adding humor where appropriate, and even singing along if needed be. 

unki naveentam abhinay upalabdhi nishchit roop se teem varksa naamak ek staartaap udyog farmon ke liye baajaar rananeetikeey paraamarsh farm thi. The company specialized on helping business owners develop new strategies that would boost their sales numbers significantly over time. elis svachaalit softaveyar prograaming sistams (edeepi) ke sampark mein aa gayeeh ekal bindu intarfes protokol kaaryakaari adhyaksh devid robinsan sahit sarvar aur netavarking ghatanaaon donon ke niymit sanchaalkon ko sandesh dene ke tareekon mein sudhaar karna. This innovation has helped many startups grow exponentially across various industries such as healthcare technology, finance software development services, etc., which led them all towards success within no time frame. 

fir bhi, 

Prompt: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is professor by profession

Generation 1: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is professor by profession.
---
‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§´‡•á‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡•â‡§®‡§∏‡§® ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§£‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç‡•§ She was an expert on environmental science and had dedicated her life to protecting the planet from harmful pollution. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§µ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§®‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Å‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Her dedication paid off as she became one of the most renowned professors at University College London . ‡§ê‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§•‡§ï ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§®‡•á ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ One day while walking home after work, Sarah noticed something strange happening around her. ‡§π‡§µ‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä, ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡§æ ‡§ò‡§®‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ç‡§∏ ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∂‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ It hit close to home for Sarah because it reminded her how much damage humanity has done over time with their recklessness towards nature's resources. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ì‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ, ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡§ú‡§æ‡§® ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§•‡§æ-‡§∂‡§π‡§∞ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§ñ‡•ã ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ The streets were filled with smoke that smelled like burning rubbish or plastic bags mixed together - everything looked grey and lifeless except for some trees here and there which managed to survive somehow through all this chaos. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§≠‡§Ø‡§æ‡§®‡§ï ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§§‡•á‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§¶‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§∞‡•ã‡§ï‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ So she rushed back into town to find out what could be causing such devastating air quality levels. 

Generation 2: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is professor by profession and lives alone.
---

She had always been passionate for her work but it was only recently that she realized the importance of finding balance between career achievements and personal life fulfillment - something which seemed to be missing from her own journey so far. 

saara hamesha bachpan se hi vibhinn romaanchit gatividhiyaan seekhne vaale vyaktigat junoon rakhti thin; yah sabse majedaar tareeke se samjhana chaahte huye unhone har taraf dekha tha. Generation 3: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is professor by profession and has to deal with the consequences of her own mistakes.
---
profesar jenet kayi varshon se shiksha ke maidaan mein thin aur unhein apne peshe ka bahut gyaan tha. She was well-respected among colleagues for her dedication towards teaching as she believed that education could change lives if given an opportunity. haalaaki yahaan tak ki sabse acche prashnon ko sambodhit karna chunauteepoorn ho jaata hai jo parinaamasvaroop galat nirnayaatmak hote dikhte hain.

Generation 4: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is professor by profession and also teaches at the university.
---
doosri manjil par apne kaaryaalay mein baithi profesar jenet ko unke chhaatron dvaara bulaaya gaya tha jo ek din pahle hi kaksha se gaaye jaane ke liye maaf karna chaahte hain aur abhi-abhi paathyapustakein praapt ki hongi. She had been teaching for over 20 years now but still found it hard to refuse their requests when they were genuine. vishvavidyaalay uska jeevan ban gaya tha lekin yahaan tak ki sabse badhkar shikshit logon ne use salaakhon ke peechhe dekha. It was time she made some changes if only because her health wasn't as good anymore. unhone samasyaagrast vyavsaayo ya prashaaskon ko padonnati dene vaale kolej adhyetaalyon ke saamne uth rahe muddon sahit anya cheejon ke alaava lagaataar anupasthiti darj karaana band nahin socha tha. The workload of being both student adviser and department head didn't help either - especially since there weren't enough people willing or able to take on those roles themselves. fir dofar teji se beetti gayeeh "profesar?" Generation 5: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is professor by profession.
---
profesar karen ki ek dilachasp jeevan shaili thi jo unhein apne kaam aur parivaar ke beech santulan banaaye rakhte huye dekha ja sakta hai. She was an accomplished scientist with over 20 years of experience and had made numerous breakthroughs that helped shape the future for generations to come. lekin vah yahaan tak pahuch gayin jab unhone mahsoos karna band nahin paaya ki vaastav mein uske liye sabse adhik saarthak baat ve thin jo use prerit ya utsaahit karti thin-vishesh roop se vigyaan padhti huyi chhotiy ladkiyo ko duniya ko badlane denge! Karen's passion grew from her own childhood curiosity as she spent hours exploring nature or reading books on science - it wasn't until later when becoming aware through personal experiences how much education could change lives. 

Generation 6: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is professor by profession.
---
do. jenet viliyams ne apna poora jeevan shiksha aur gyaan ke prati samarpit kar diya tha-ek profesar ki tarah jo unhein sabse adhik pasand hai. She had earned her doctorate degree from Harvard University and was now the head of history department at one of America's top universities - The New York Institute for Higher Learning . 35 saal se bhi kam umra mein, doktaret praapt ek yuva mahaavidyaalyi itihaas sankaay ka netritva kartavyon ko nibhaane vaali puraani peedhi ke logon par dabaav daala ja raha tha. Her dedication to teaching kept many students on their feet as they learned more than just facts but also how to think critically while exploring various historical events that influenced society today.

profesar viliyam hamesha charchaaon ya varg satron tak hi seemit nahin thin; unhone paathkon ke liye udaaseenta door karne aur vyaktigat ruchiyon ko protsaahit karte huye padhe gaye granthon ke baare mein likhit tippani dene ke avsaron ka laabh uthaaya. It wasn't long before she began receiving invitations not only from other departments within NIHL but also outside institutions where people wanted to learn what made Professor Williams so different compared with others. uske sahakarmi use "profa" upnaam dete the, lekin ve sirf majaakiya nautanki hongeeh har din vahaan pesil, kalmon aur anusmaarko se bharpoor tebal lagaatakarta dekhkar, anya profesariyal nauparivaarikon ne faisla kiya ki agle dashak ke antim hisson mein utpaadkata badhti gayeeh enavaayeeyechaooyel ech2019 mein sarvashreshth esosiyeshan puraskaar vijeta! This award recognized Dr Jane William's exceptional contributions towards student learning outcomes during our annual conference held last year."

unka naam ab desh bhar ke kolejon aur skool bord 

Generation 7: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is professor by profession and has to work with an arrogant male student.
---
‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§´‡•á‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡•Å‡§≤‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§ú ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§ó ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü‡•§ She had been teaching at the university for over 20 years now but today was different as she would be working closely with one of her students - Joshua Johnson. ‡§ú‡•ã‡§∂‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§π‡§Ç‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§µ‡§ï ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§∞‡§£ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤‡•á‡§ú ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡§ï ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ú‡§Ø ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ Sarah knew that he needed some guidance if his career aspirations were going to come true. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§á‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§ö ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§ï‡§Æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ However, this time around things might have changed since it's not just any class they are taking together ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§´‡•á‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§õ‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§§‡•à‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ó‡§è ‡§è‡§ï ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•á‡§∑ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ-‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§∞‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§™‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á‡§Æ‡§ø‡§®‡§æ‡§∞‡•§ The seminar required them both to travel abroad where they will learn from experts across various fields while also getting hands on experience through field trips and internships. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§Ö‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Ø‡§® ‡§™‡§æ‡§†‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§®‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§™‡§æ‡§è ‡§•‡•á! As soon as the group arrived at their destination city, which happened to be Paris, France, Professor Sara immediately set out to find Joshua so they could start preparing themselves accordingly. ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§Æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§§‡§ï ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•Ä‡§õ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ü‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§†‡§æ‡•§ "Hey there!" ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§¶‡§∞‡§µ‡§æ‡§ú‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡•ã ‡§µ‡§π ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ì‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Å‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ He didn't seem too pleased though when she told him what she wanted to discuss: "I need you to take responsibility for your behavior during our classes." "‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ù‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ù ‡§Ü ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ", ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡§µ‡§æ‡§¨ ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§æ‡§ú‡§º ‡§®‡•Ä‡§ö‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ‡•§ But before anything else can happen between them, another member interrupts saying something like 'Sarah, let me introduce myself.'" ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§ö‡§Ø ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§π ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ Everyone seemed excited except for Joshua who kept looking annoyed. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§‡§ö‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∞‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§∏‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§Ø‡§¶‡§ø ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§® ‡§Ü‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á‡•§ For instance, after learning more details regarding international trade regulations, Joshua asked questions related to how these laws affected small businesses or entrepreneurs. ‡§á‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡•á‡§§ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø
