‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§•‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§ó‡§π ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She had grown up with parents that taught them how important it was for everyone's voice be heard equally no matter their gender or social status. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§µ‡§æ‡§µ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡§®‡•Ä‡§§‡§ø ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú‡§ø‡§ï ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§®‡§ø‡§ß‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§µ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§®‡•á‡§§‡§æ ‡§¨‡§® ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ 

Samantha studied hard at university and graduated top marks on both undergraduate studies as well as law school before entering politics full-time. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú ‡§®‡•á ‡§≠‡•ç‡§∞‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§æ‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§Ç‡§ñ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡§®‡•Ä‡§§‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Ü‡§ï‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ It wasn't long until she realized there were many people within political circles who didn't want an honest leader like herself because they would have wanted someone more willing than Samantha to play along with bribes from big business owners so things could stay smooth sailing. 

‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§•‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§ú‡§¨‡•Ç‡§§ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§® ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡•§ Her determination paid off when she became elected into office where she started working towards creating policies aimed toward reducing poverty rates while also promoting equality among all genders regardless of race or ethnicity. ‡§ê‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§à ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä‡§è‡§Å ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§â‡§® ‡§®‡•Ä‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§è‡§ï‡§ú‡•Å‡§ü ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§™‡§æ‡§∞‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§≠‡•ç‡§∞‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§•‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§π‡§ö‡§æ‡§® ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ The citizens began feeling empowered knowing those issues will not go unnoticed anymore which made Samantha feel proud every day. 

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡•á ‡§ó‡§è, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§§‡•á‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç‡•§ People looked upon her leadership skills admiringly and respectfully. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§†‡§ø‡§® ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤ ‡§ö‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§Ü‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§§‡•ã ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Ø‡§ï ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ As time passed, Samantha saw progress being achieved through legislation changes that provided greater opportunities for women across different sectors including education, healthcare, workforce development etc., making sure girls are given equal access just as boys do. ‡§á‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§æ‡§ó‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§ö ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡§æ ‡§™‡•à‡§¶‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•Ä‡•§ And although some still tried to stop this change, but thanks to Samantha's strong stance, these efforts failed miserably, leading to positive 

Generation 5: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Leader by profession.
---
‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•á‡§≤ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Rachel was the leader of her community and worked tirelessly to improve their lives through various initiatives that she had started. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§•‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§à ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ ‡§°‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§á‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§ó‡•Å‡§ú‡§∞‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§

Rachel's early life wasn't easy as it involved poverty and lacked opportunities for education or healthcare. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø, ‡§µ‡§π ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§à ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§π‡•Å‡§à‡§Ç, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á‡§§‡•É‡§§‡•ç‡§µ ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§∏‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§™‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§µ‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Å‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ Her passionate nature led others towards betterment which made them believe they could achieve anything if they put effort into it. 

‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•á‡§≤ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡•Å‡§ï ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡§ø ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡§ø‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§¶‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¨‡•ã‡§ß‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡•ã ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§¶‡§§‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ She always thought beyond herself, understanding what people needed most at any given time. ‡§á‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§® ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡•Ä ‡§¢‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§Ü‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§Æ‡§§‡§ø ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§

One such project was building schools where there were none before. ‡§á‡§® ‡§µ‡§ø‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§≤‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§£ ‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ó‡•Å‡§£‡§µ‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§™‡•à‡§¶‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Another project was providing clean water sources so everyone would have access to safe drinking water without having to travel far distances every day just because there are no proper facilities nearby. ‡§Ø‡•á ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§â‡§¶‡§æ‡§π‡§∞‡§£ ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§∞‡§æ‡§ö‡•á‡§≤ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§® ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§¶‡•á‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§•‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡•Å‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§® ‡§≤‡§æ‡§è‡•§

The positive impact on these communities cannot be ignored. ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç, ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§∏‡•ç‡§• ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç, ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§™‡§æ‡§¶‡§ï ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§®‡•á‡§§‡§æ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡§º ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§≠‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ The respect earned from other members within society has helped boost confidence among themselves too, knowing someone like Rachael cares enough to make things right for those around her.

‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•á‡§≤ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡•á‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§¨‡§®‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§π‡•à, ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡•á ‡§π‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§™‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§≠‡•Ç‡§Æ‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡•§ They show us how we can work together with determination and positivity to create change 

Generation 6: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Leader by profession and has to lead her team of 20 people through the desert for survival.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§®‡•á‡§§‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ As an army officer, she had led troops on dangerous missions across war-torn countries with ease. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§∞‡•á‡§ó‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§´‡§Ç‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡•á‡§§‡•É‡§§‡•ç‡§µ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§≠‡§µ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ She was leading them all now - not just soldiers but also civilians from different walks of life.

‡§∏‡§™‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§π ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§ö‡•Å‡§ï‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§¶‡§Æ‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≠‡•ã‡§ú‡§® ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§Æ‡•Ä, ‡§™‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§§‡§ï ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§†‡•ã‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§ö‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ó‡§à ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ The situation seemed hopeless until one day when they stumbled upon some water sources hidden deep within caves that were carved into rock formations around their camp site. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§§ ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§ú‡§≤‡•Ä‡§ï‡§∞‡§£ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ñ‡§§‡§∞‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã‡§ñ‡§ø‡§Æ ‡§â‡§†‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á‡•§ However, as soon as Sarah realized this discovery, there arose another challenge: how would she get everyone back home safely?

‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§´ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•Å‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ó ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡§æ‡•§ They needed food too because without it, even if they found shelter or water, starvation could still be fatal. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§£‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§§‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ú‡§Ç‡§ó‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§µ‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§π‡•à ‡§Ø‡§¶‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡•§ But getting those animals proved difficult since hunting requires skill sets which most members lacked due to being untrained city dwellers. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§ù‡§æ‡§µ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§®‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§™‡§æ‡§¶‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§™‡§¶‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§á‡§ï‡§ü‡•ç‡§†‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡§æ, ‡§Æ‡§õ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§™‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§™‡•å‡§ß‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§°‡§º‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è‡•§ All these methods required careful planning beforehand so none got lost along the way.

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ‡§è‡§Å ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶, ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§π ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ Everyone worked together tirelessly towards reaching safety while constantly keeping watch over each other's health conditions. ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§à ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§æ, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡•á‡§§ ‡§§‡•Ç‡§´‡§æ‡§® ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§π‡§µ‡§æ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§§‡•á‡§ú‡§º ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ç‡§∏ ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∂‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ This made traveling slower than expected, putting more pressure onto their already limited resources such as fuel reserves. ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä, ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§†‡§ø‡§®‡§æ‡§á‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶, ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§®‡•á 

Generation 7: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Leader by profession.
---
maariya ek shaandaar neta thin jinhone apne poore kairiyar mein uchchatam star par kaaryabhaar sambhaala tha. Her dedication and hard work had earned her the respect of many people within society as she was always ready to help those around her with whatever they needed be it financial or emotional support. maariyon ke baare mein sabse ullekhaneey cheej yah hai ki vah hamesha un logon ko sunti aur samjhati rahti jo use bataate huye uski madad karte dikhte hain. She would listen patiently until every issue has been discussed thoroughly before offering any solution that will bring peace to both parties involved. 

ek din, mairi ne desh bhar se naagrik adhyaksh pad ke liye chunaav ladna jaan diya. It took months for Maria's campaign team to prepare all necessary documents such as manifestos and speeches which were delivered during rallies across different parts of town. antatah matdaat divas aa gaya aur pragatisheel paartiyon ke ummeedvaaro ne badhat leeh do pratinidhi-librals (demokretik) aur kanjarvetivsa (roodhivaadi). However, on election night when results started coming out, there seemed no clear winner yet due to close margins between them but after several hours later, one candidate emerged victorious - Maria! unhone lokatantra ki jeet dekheeh ab ve desh ki sarvochcha praathmik vyavasthaayen ban gayeehin .

‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§ú‡§¨‡•Ç‡§§ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had always been drawn to the world of business and management from an early age, driven by her desire for success and recognition. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§à ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§•‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§æ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ï‡•â‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡•ã‡§∞‡•á‡§ü ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§¢‡§º‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ö‡§¢‡§º ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Her hard work paid off when she was offered the position as Manager at one of the leading companies within their industry sector.

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§®‡§è ‡§™‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§Ü‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡•á‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ However, Sarah believed that with determination and perseverance anything could be achieved if you put your heart into it. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§≠‡•Ç‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ-‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä‡§°‡§º ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á, ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ 

One day while attending a meeting between herself and two other members on the team - Tom and Mary , they were discussing how best practices can improve productivity levels among employees which led them all towards different ideas but none seemed like what would bring out the best results possible. ‡§ü‡•â‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§ù‡§æ‡§µ ‡§¶‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§§‡§æ ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è ‡§ú‡§¨‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Æ‡•à‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ú‡•ã‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§è‡§ï ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡§æ‡§≤‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ Both sides made valid points however neither idea looked appealing enough to convince everyone else involved. ‡§¨‡•à‡§†‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§Ø ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§≤‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§ö‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§µ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü‡•§ It wasn't until later during lunch break where both parties shared stories or experiences related to leadership styles which helped give insightful feedbacks regarding this issue. 

‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§™‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§π ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§® ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§§‡•Ä‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑ ‡§∏‡§π‡§Æ‡§§ ‡§•‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§ï ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡•á‡§§‡•É‡§§‡•ç‡§µ ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§∏‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á‡•§ They decided upon setting up training sessions designed specifically around leadership skills such as communication techniques, problem solving strategies etc., so every employee has access to these resources regardless whether he/she works under any department . ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ, ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§â‡§® ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§§‡§ø‡§µ‡§ø‡§ß‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§â‡§ú‡§æ‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§¨‡•à‡§†‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•Å‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§™‡§æ‡§¶‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ó‡§†‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡•É‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§ø ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ The decision brought together people 

Generation 2: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is manager by profession and has to deal with the male dominated environment.
---
ek din jab maine apne kaaryaalay mein pravesh kiya, main turant karmachaariyon ke beech ek daraar dekh sakta tha jo unke ling se utpann hoti haih purush aur mahilaayein donon shaktishaali pad par thin lekin vibhaajit samooh ne doosre ko najaraandaaj kar diya. As I walked through my office space towards my desk, it was clear that there were certain expectations placed on both men and women - especially those of power within their respective departments. 

main prabandhan dal mein sabse kam umra vaala vyakti hoon-aur yah spasht roop se mere saathiyon tak fail gaya hoga ya nahin bhi. They seemed skeptical at first glance but as time went along they began to respect what i had accomplished so far without any help from them or anyone else for that matter. unhone mujhe mool baaton jaise taiblet upyog, softaveyar seting aur nirnay lene sahit adbhut cheejein seekhna pasand kiya! But still...there's always more work than we can possibly get done which made things challenging sometimes . 

jaane dene se na darein-mujhe lag raha tha ki ve meri taalamtol bolte huye sunenge, "agar ham abhibhoot hon", fir bhi us pal ko paani ki tarah badlane dete hain." And yet another day passed where all hell broke loose because someone didn't follow protocol when submitting an important report to upper management resulting not only damage control measures being taken but also causing embarrassment among other employees whose reputations could potentially suffer if this issue remained hidden forever. 

maano chunautiyon se darna hi jeet pakka hai? No way!! agle tees minat tak maine poori imaarat mein har gujar gayi pratirodhit ladkiyo ke liye utsukataapoorvak intzaar kiya, bas use bataate huye ki 'ham sirf sheersh star par sanghar 

Generation 3: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is manager by profession.
---
‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡•Ä ‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ú‡•Å‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ From the time she started her career as an accountant to becoming one of the most successful managers at ABC Corporation, Sophie had always been driven and dedicated towards achieving success for herself and those around her. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§ But when it came down to leading a team that was struggling with their work-life balance, things took a turn for the worse.

‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡§º‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§Ü‡§Ç‡§§‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ò‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§ó‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§¶‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§™‡§æ‡§¶‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ó‡§ø‡§∞‡§æ‡§µ‡§ü ‡§Ü‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ She noticed this change firsthand but didn't know what exactly caused them until they began having more frequent meetings where employees expressed concerns regarding burnout or lack of motivation due to balancing personal life outside of work. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§§‡§®‡§æ‡§µ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•á‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§≤‡§Ç‡§¨‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§≤‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§∏‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§

Sophie knew immediately something needed to be done if she wanted to keep up morale high while also maintaining productivity levels. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§à ‡§∞‡§£‡§®‡•Ä‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ó‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§¶‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¨‡•ã‡§ß‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à-‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡§ø‡•§ The company culture wasn't conducive enough to promote healthy habits like taking breaks during lunch hours which could lead to exhaustion overtime. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ, ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§â‡§™‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§â‡§™‡§ï‡§∞‡§£‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø‡•Ç‡§ü‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•â‡§®‡§ø‡§ü‡§∞ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§´‡•ã‡§® ‡§∏‡•á‡§ü‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§µ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§µ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•Å‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ü‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§è ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡•§

With these new strategies implemented into place, Sophie saw immediate results from day one. ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§® ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§ø‡§´‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§¨‡§∞‡•ç‡§®‡§Ü‡§â‡§ü ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§ñ‡§§‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ They were able to spend quality family time without feeling guilty because now there was no longer any need to constantly check emails after office hours - thanks to better communication tools being put in place so everyone felt connected even beyond working hours!

‡§∏‡•â‡§´‡•ç‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂ ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§®‡§à ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§∏‡•ç‡§• ‡§Ü‡§¶‡§§‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ 

Generation 4: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is manager by profession and faces many challenges at her workplace.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§Ø‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had always been passionate about business management since she was young but faced several obstacles on the way to achieving success as women were often discriminated against when it came to leadership roles. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§π‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•á‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ó ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•à‡•§ As such, Sarah went from being an intern to becoming one of the most successful managers working for a multinational corporation. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§à ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§µ‡•á ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ However, there are still some gender-based issues that persist today which makes things difficult even with all these achievements under her belt. ‡§Ø‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§§‡§æ‡§à ‡§ó‡§à ‡§π‡•à‡•§

Sarah started off small - she worked hard during college while completing her degree and then landed up getting hired right after graduating. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡•Å‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§≠‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π ‡§ö‡§∞‡§Æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ The job offer seemed perfect because not only did they get paid well but also got exposure into various departments within their company's operations. ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ó‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡§® ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ‡§è‡§Å ‡§â‡§™‡§≤‡§¨‡•ç‡§ß ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ This meant learning everything on my own through trial and error or asking others around me if I could pick something up along the way. ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ì‡§∞, ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡•Ä ‡§¢‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•à, ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ It wasn't easy at first, especially considering how men dominated this field back then but eventually became more comfortable expressing myself without fear of judgment due to having seen other people do so successfully before.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§≤‡•à‡§Ç‡§ó‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•å‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§™‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§∑ ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§â‡§® ‡§™‡§¶‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Å‡§ö‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ü‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§•‡•á‡•§ For instance, whenever someone asked what kind of projects would be assigned to them or where certain meetings took place, male colleagues tended to take precedence over females regardless whether or not we have equal experience levels. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ, ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§≤ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§™‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡•å‡§® ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§™‡•Ä‡§°‡§º‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ó‡§è ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä 

Generation 5: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is manager by profession.
---
ek baar ki baat hai, amaanda naamak ek mahila vyaktitva tha jo peshe se prabandhan mein kaam karti thin. She was always surrounded with people and loved to be the one behind it all - making sure everyone worked together as smoothly as possible while she stayed out of sight. yah unki naukri ke liye aur adbhut roop se acchi tarah samaayojan karne vaali teem donon ko pasandeeda ban gaya jise vah ikatthe rakhna jaanti thi-lekin uske saath hamesha sirf doosron par dabaav daalte huye apni chintaayein hoti thin.

However, when she arrived at office the following morning, there were five young faces waiting for them outside her door. har cheej ne sujhaav dena band kar diya! The first thing which came across his mind after seeing those fresh eyes looking up at him was "Oh no!"

vahaan tak ki varishth sahyogi use bataata agar ye intarn aa hi nahin detein. But then he remembered how much this company relied upon its employees' enthusiasm and creativity. fir emaanda niraashaajnak lagti thi taaki abhi din jeet lega. After introducing herself to these students, showing around what exactly does their job entail, giving some tips & tricks, etc., things started getting better slowly but surely.

unhein antim pareeksha deedablyoobi (da big projekt) mil gayi thi, jo poori farm ke utpaad lonching ivent ka mukhya fokas bindu tha. Everybody had been working towards it since last year because it required intense planning skills along with coordination among various departments like marketing, sales,

---
saara ek peshevar mahila thin jinke paas apne kariyar mein bahut saare anubhav the aur ve safal hone ke liye dridhanishchayi thi jo unhone pyaar kiya tha-prabandhit karna! She had worked her way up from being just another employee to becoming one of the top managers at her company - and she was proud every time someone mentioned it or looked towards her for guidance on something new they wanted help with. 

unki teem kaam par unka sabse accha dost ban gayeeh vahaan rakharkhaav dal se lekar prashaaskon tak har koyi shikshit vyaktiyon vaale samooh ne poore din milte huye charchaaon mein salagna rakhi taaki yah sunishchit ho sake ki cheejein suchaaru roop se sanchaalit hon. Sarah's team loved working under her because not only did she know what needed doing but also how best to get things done without micromanaging them which helped everyone feel more comfortable as well.

ek subah usko fon aa gaya tab use ehsaas nahin hua ki kis baat ne badla haih The phone call came unexpectedly when all seemed like business as usual; however, this day would be different than any other before it. jaise hi saara risepshanist ke booth se nikal rahi thi, use bata diya gaya ki mukhyapaalkarta padonnati praapt karne ke alaava sevaanivritt ho sakte hain ya fir naukri lene ke icchuk logon se niptane mein madad ke taur par doosron sahitaabaddh avashisht stok ke varg adlajaamaantran (esateeyeks) ki ghoshanaapatra de denge . ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§∂ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Her name was Shreya Chatterjee. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§® ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡§®‡•Ä‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡•Å‡§ï ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She always wanted her country's women to be treated equally as men so that they could also achieve great things like them. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡•É‡§≠‡•Ç‡§Æ‡§ø ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ 

One day while browsing through some books at the library she came across an article on how only male politicians were given chances for leadership positions even though there are many talented females out there too. ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§ú‡§¨‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ß‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§§‡•ã ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ? What if one fine morning we have our very own strong lady leader leading this beautiful land! ‡§Ø‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ú‡•ç‡§µ‡§≤‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ö ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§æ‡•§ 

She started working harder than ever before towards achieving what had been set upon her mind since childhood - becoming prime minister someday. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§á‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡§æ ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à, ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§Ö‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∂‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü-‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•Å‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§Ø ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§£‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ó‡•Å‡§∏‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ This made it difficult for him to continue with his job search but did not stop her from pursuing her dream. 

‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä, ‡§® ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§ø‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á‡•§ But nothing would deter her determination or break down her spirit because inside her heart lay the willpower to make sure every Indian girl gets equal opportunities just like any other boy. ‡§ê‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§à ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡§ï‡§∂ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§¶‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø, ‡§¶‡•ã‡§∏‡•ç‡§§ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡§®‡•á‡§§‡§æ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§£ ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§Ü ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ With their help, she decided to take up politics full time which became more challenging yet fulfilling.

Generation 6: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Librarian by profession and lives alone.
---
saara ke paas ek khushhaal-bhavishya tha jab tak ki uski duniya neeche nahin gir gayi aur use apne jeevit rahne par kaam karna pada. She was an avid reader of all genres but had always been too shy to tell anyone her passion for reading books until it became necessary as she found herself with no one else around except the pages within those very same volumes that helped keep her sane during this time. 

ek din vah ghar se baahar nikli aur sadak ko dekhi jo ab bhojan ya kapde jaise mahatvapoorn saamaan praapt karte samay utni hi chunauteepoorn lagti hai. Sarah knew what needed doing so she headed straight towards town where there were still some stores open despite everything going on outside its walls - people fighting over scarce resources or simply trying their best not to succumb to despair amidst chaos while others looked at them from afar wondering if they'd ever come out alive again after such devastation took place before our eyes. yahaan tak ki unke liye bhi sabse acchi cheejon mein se ek peshevar roop se padhein hoga lekin unhone tab tak intjaar kiya jab tak ve surakshit na ho sake taaki logon ko madad mil sake. 

Generation 7: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Librarian by profession.
---
saara ek buddhimaan aur mehnati mahila thi jisne apna poora jeevan pustakaalay ke andar bitaaya hai. She had always been fascinated with books since she was little - the smell of old pages, the feel of faded leather covers under her fingers as she turned them over to reveal hidden secrets within their depths... yah shaantipoorn duniya jo unhein saamagri se ghira hua lagta tha-yahaan tak ki kisi anya vyakti ko sunaaye jaane vaale sabse chillaate huye nirarthak vichaaron ne use tanaavagrast kar diya ya uske manodsha par pratikool kaaryapranaali laagu nahin ki! üòâ‚úçÔ∏è

As an adult, Sarah's love for literature grew even more profoundly. unhone har din adhyayansheel raaton mein padha, sammelnon mein baithkon mein pravesh liya aur abhootapoorva upanyaason sahit naveentam rileez ko turant udte dekha. Her knowledge on all things related to reading made her one of the most sought after individuals at bookstores across town where people would often come asking if they could find something specific or just get recommendations from someone that knows what good reads are out there waiting for readers like themselves.

unki naukri itni santoshajnak ho gayeeh ve logon ko uddeshyapoorn roop se seekhkar sundrata paida karengi, sangrah ki gunjaayish badha dengi taaki sarvottam kritiyon ko sulabh naashpaati mil sake aur antim utthaankaari muddon ke beech peedit honge jo sthitijanya sandesh faila dete haih "ek accha pathan cheejon ko halka banaata hai!" It wasn't until recently though when tragedy struck: The local library went bankrupt due to budget cutbacks causing its closure permanently leaving hundreds without accessibility to information resources needed daily living.

Generation 1: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is governer by profession and also has to take care of her family. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä 100 ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§Æ ‡§∂‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§≤‡§Ç‡§¨‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è‡•§
---
As the governor of this small town, it was my responsibility not only to oversee its development but also ensure that everyone within our borders were taken care off properly. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•ã ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§¨‡•á‡§ü‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä-‡§Ø‡§π ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§•‡§æ! Despite all these challenges, I always found ways around them with determination and hard work.

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§®, ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§∂‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ö‡•å‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ü‡§π‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡•ã ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ù‡•á ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§™‡§∞‡•á‡§∂‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ñ‡§¨‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä‡•§ The local farmer had lost his entire crop due to an unexpected flood caused from heavy rains which resulted in massive damage to crops across several acres. ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡§æ‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ó‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§Ü‡§µ‡§ú‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Æ‡•á‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞‡§£-‡§™‡•ã‡§∑‡§£ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ But as their leader pointed out how they'd been struggling for years without any significant improvement on agriculture production or income levels, I knew we needed immediate action.

‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡§ø ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§® ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡•á ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§¶‡•á ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§π‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§π‡§æ‡§Ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§ We worked together closely to provide relief funds through various schemes so every affected member could receive support until things got back into shape. ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Å‡§ö ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≠‡•ã‡§ú‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§Ö‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§Ø‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è‡•§ Throughout those trying times, I remained unwavering in providing help where possible - no matter what happened during such tough situations.

saara ek safal vyavsaayi mahila thin jinke paas apne kshetra mein sabse badi sarkaari ejesi ki gatividhiyon ko niyantrit karna tha-ek shaktishaali aur prabhaavi upakran jo unhein bahut saare dhan ke liye le jaata hai. However, she was not just any ordinary governor - Sarah had been elected into office after years of hard work and dedication towards public service that earned her respect from many people across different fields including politics, businesses as well as social organizations. 

apni naukri par raajya ka netritva karte huye unhone uchchatam star tak sangharsharat logon se milkar gareeb samudaayon ya graameen ilaakon sahit vibhinn prakaaron vaale deshon mein seva pradaan karne vaala ek utpaadak nikaay sthaapit karne ke baare mein socha. lekin ye har acche iraade ke alaava lagaaye gaye prayaason ke peechhe maujoori tatha doshasthiyon ki hi fikr hoti hai, tabtaki padti hai. Generation 3: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is governer by profession and has to deal with the consequences of being an unpopular governor.
---
saara ek peshevar raajyapaal thin aur unhone apne poore jeevan mein kayi padon par kaam kiya tha. She had always been passionate for public service but her job as Governor was not easy at all times. vah jald hi shikshit logon ke beech alokapriy ho gayeeh yuva matadaataaon ne use bhrasht bataaya lekin bujurg nivaasi uske prati sahaanubhooti nahin dikhte huye dekhkar dukhi hote hain. Her predecessor left office on bad terms leaving Sarah alone without any support from anyone. 

unki naukri naakhush karne vaali saabit hoti ja rahi thi-raat tak veediyo konfresing se prabhaavit maansik roop se tanaavagrast ho gaye. One night while working late she decided that enough's enough - it was time to quit. agle din subah uthna mushkil lagta tha; fir bhi, saath ghante baad, saara antim samay ko paar kar leti thi aur steshan chhod deti thi. As soon as people saw what happened they started blaming her even more than before: "She couldn't handle pressure," or "she didn't have leadership skills." 

Generation 4: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is governer by profession.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§à ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She was born into poverty and had to work tirelessly from an early age just so she could make ends meet for her family of six children. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º‡§æ, ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§á‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§≠‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•á‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ Sarah's hardships did not stop there - at the young age of 20 years old, she lost both parents due to illnesses which left her as their only caretaker. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§á‡§® ‡§Ö‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§§‡§¨‡§æ‡§π ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à ‡§•‡•Ä, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§á‡§®‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ-‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§§‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ö ‡§® ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡•§

Over time, Sarah developed skills that would become essential tools during her journey towards success: leadership qualities, strong communication abilities, problem solving capabilities, resilience against adversity, perseverance when faced with obstacles or setbacks, determination even under difficult circumstances, and selfless dedication to helping others achieve great things too. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡•á‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§µ‡•á ‡§¨‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ó‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä‡•§ Through this experience, she realized how much impact one individual can have on someone else's life, especially those less fortunate than herself. ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§Ö‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§≠‡•Ä‡§§‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§∏‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ‡•§

Sarah studied law after high school while working fulltime jobs simultaneously until graduating college. ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä, ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Å‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§∏‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡§∞ ‡§°‡§ø‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§π‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ After completing several internship programs within local government agencies, Sarah landed her first job as an assistant governor where she worked diligently every day, learning more each passing year. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡•á ‡§ó‡§è, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§≠‡§µ‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡§™‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç‡•§ Her tenacity paid off because today, she leads a prosperous community through effective policies, efficient management practices, and unwavering support systems.

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡•å‡§∞‡§æ‡§®, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§π ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§â‡§® ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Å‡§ö ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§º‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡§§‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§Æ ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç, ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡•á ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§†‡§ø‡§®‡§æ‡§à ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§™‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç

saara ek anubhvi aur kushal prashaasak thin jo apne poore jeevan mein peshe se raajyapaal ban gayi hain. She was always fascinated with the concept of governance and had been drawn to it since she first discovered her passion for politics at age 12 while watching news reports on local elections. unke maata-pita ne bhi pahle hi sanket de diya tha ki saara ke liye kaanoon ya naukarshaaho jaise uchit vyavhaar vaale sangthanon ko chalaane par dhyaan dena shuru karna samay aa gaya hoga jahaan log niymon aur viniyman ke adheen honge. Sarah's interest grew even more when she attended law school where she learned all there was to know regarding legal procedures and regulations that would be needed as part of being a governor or other high ranking official within any organization.

apni padonnati tak lete huye, unhone desh ke sabse badi nigmon mein se ek ke mukhya sanchaalan adhikaari sahit alag-alag staron par upri star ke netritva dal ke hisson mein seva ki thi. However, after years spent working hard towards achieving success through dedication & perseverance, Sarah finally received recognition and promotion into one of the most coveted positions - Governorship!

ek din baad, saara ab doosron ki tarah "ghar" naamak suvidha mein nahin rahti thi; balki use seedhe sarvochch praathmiko (raashtreey) surang mein dafnaaye jaane ke roop mein varnit kiya gaya tha, taaki har koyi sir ghuma sake aur sooraj najaraband ho. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had always been passionate and ambitious from an early age. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§∏‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§â‡§™‡§≤‡§¨‡•ç‡§ß‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡§à ‡§™‡•Å‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ Sarah was known for her impeccable work ethic, which she attributed to the fact that growing up with five siblings taught her how important it was not only to be hardworking but also kind-hearted. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§¶‡§Ø‡§æ‡§≤‡•Å‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ó‡•Å‡§£ ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§∞‡§ñ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ And so, when given the opportunity to become governor of their state, Sarah graciously accepted this responsibility as well.

‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡§®‡•Ä‡§§‡§ø ‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ As someone whose family background made them aware of social issues like poverty and inequality, they were determined to make sure every citizen's voice counted equally. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡§®‡•Ä‡§§‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ß‡•ç‡§∞‡•Å‡§µ‡•Ä‡§ï‡•É‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ But Sarah believed firmly in democracy, equality, justice - values that would guide all decisions taken during her tenure.

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§≤‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞, ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§æ‡§∏‡§® ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ï‡§†‡§ø‡§® ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ü‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡§Æ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§¢‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ö‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•Å‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ ‡§™‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö ‡§π‡•ã‡•§ This meant making tough choices on where funds should go or what programs needed funding most urgently. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§á‡§® ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§™‡§ü‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶, ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™ ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§æ‡§ó‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≤‡§æ‡§≠ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Her first priority was creating job opportunities through infrastructure development projects such as building new schools, hospitals, roads etc., thereby reducing unemployment rates significantly over time.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡§™‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§™‡§¶ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡•á ‡§™‡•à‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§®‡•Ä‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ó‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§â‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§ó‡§§ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ù‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§® ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§® ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Throughout her term, Sarah worked closely alongside other leaders at various levels within government to ensure everyone felt heard and represented fairly. ‡§Ø‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§à ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§£ ‡§¶‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§ö‡§æ‡•§ The pandemic highlighted just why having compassion towards others can have a positive impact on society 

Generation 7: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is governer by profession.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ó‡•å‡§∞‡§µ‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§µ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had always been the one to take charge and lead others when necessary. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡•§ Her life was full of ups and downs but she never let anyone or anything get her down. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡§™‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§¨‡§® ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç-‡§è‡§ï ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§™‡§¶ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•á‡§¶‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•å‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Sarah's work as governor involved managing different departments such as healthcare, education, infrastructure development, among other things that were vital for ensuring sustainable growth within communities.

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§™‡§ü‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§ú‡•Å‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§®‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡•§ It wasn't enough just being seen around town - it required genuine involvement with people from all walks of life. ‡§á‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§ï ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§á‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§® ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡§•‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§® ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§§‡§æ‡•§ One day while on patrol duty, Sarah noticed an elderly woman struggling through traffic during rush hour. ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ì‡§∞ ‡§∞‡•Å‡§ñ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§≤‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§•‡§æ? The lady explained how difficult it has become lately due to rising fuel prices which made transportation more expensive than ever before. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡§¨‡•ç‡§∏‡§ø‡§°‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§à‡§Ç‡§ß‡§® ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§° ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§ù‡§æ‡§µ ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§¨‡•Å‡§ú‡•Å‡§∞‡•ç‡§ó ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Ä‡•§ This initiative would help low income families access affordable gasoline without breaking their bank accounts. ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ú‡§®‡§§‡§æ ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§™‡•á‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§≤ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•á‡§∂‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡§æ‡§≤‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§

Sarah also took part in community events like festivals wherein they could showcase local talent and culture. ‡§á‡§® ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§è‡§ï‡§ú‡•Å‡§ü ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§™‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§≠‡•Ç‡§Æ‡§ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§¶‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§ö ‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§∂‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§è‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§≠‡•Ç‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§à‡•§ In addition, these activities helped improve tourism revenue too since visitors loved exploring new places, trying out various food items and enjoying cultural performances.

‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§•‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had been painting since childhood, capturing the beauty of nature through her brushstrokes on canvas. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Å ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§à ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§Æ‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ó‡§è ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ Samantha's passion for art was not just confined to creating stunning visual masterpieces but also extended beyond that into teaching others how they too could unlock their inner artist within them. 

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§≤‡§≤‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ï‡§æ‡§¶‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§¶‡•á‡§∂‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§°‡§≤ ‡§®‡•á ‡§∞‡§ö‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ñ ‡§™‡§¶ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ Her appointment as head meant that now she would be responsible for overseeing all aspects of the department including faculty recruitment, curriculum development, student advisement, exhibitions organization and much more. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ö ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ó‡§§ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≠‡•Ä‡§§‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§´‡•à‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ñ‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Ç‡§†‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§æ‡§ú ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§

Samantha knew it wouldn't come easy though - there were many challenges ahead. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§® ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§® ‡§õ‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Å‡§ö‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡•á‡§∂ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ But despite these obstacles, Samantha remained determined to make sure every single one of her students received an education with integrity while learning new skills under her guidance at this prestigious institution where she believed everyone should have equal opportunities regardless if you came from different background or social status.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§π ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡•á ‡§ó‡§è, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§â‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡§æ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ The pressure grew heavy upon her shoulders as each day brought its own setbacks: staff members leaving unexpectedly due to personal reasons; fundraising efforts falling flat because donors weren't interested enough; conflicts between administrators regarding budget allocation decisions. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§á‡§® ‡§∏‡§¨‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§ö, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§§‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∞‡§π‡•á, ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§§‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§≠‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ù‡•á‡§¶‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ú‡•Å‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á‡•§

‡§≤‡•å‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§ö‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She was the kind of woman whose ideas would never leave her mind until they were realized into reality. ‡§ê‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç "‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§è‡§ü‡§∞" ‡§â‡§™‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§¨‡§® ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Laura had always been interested in art but later on discovered herself to be more than just an artist - she became one with nature itself. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∂‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§™‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä-‡§î‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§£ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§

Laura began experimenting with different materials such as clay, sand, water, soil, rocks, leaves, twigs, bark, etc., all while keeping track of how each element worked together or apart from others depending upon their needs for survival. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§â‡§® ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§§‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§•‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§°‡§ø‡§ú‡§æ‡§á‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ü‡§ø‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§ Through this process, she learned not only what made up natural elements like plants and animals but also why certain things grew better when placed alongside other organisms. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ö‡§®‡§æ‡§è‡§Å ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ç‡§µ ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡§Æ ‡§Ü‡§ú ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§

As time passed, Laura continued refining these designs using various techniques including layered textures, patterns inspired by ancient cultures, geometric shapes & forms taken directly outdoors at sunrise/sunset moments. ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§® ‡§∞‡§ö‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§™‡§æ‡§¶‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ü‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø, ‡§ú‡§æ‡§¶‡•Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§∂‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§°‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ People started visiting her studio every day to see them unfold before their eyes. ‡§≤‡•å‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ But regardless of any doubts or criticism towards her work, she remained committed to creating new pieces because there wasn't anything else quite so fulfilling.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•å‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ, ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§≠‡§ø‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§≠‡§µ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ó‡§è ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§ø‡§§ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Her works spoke volumes without words being said aloud; instead, viewers could feel emotions 

Generation 4: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is creator by profession. ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ê‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ñ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡§æ‡§∏‡§® ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ the main character should be strong-willed and have an iron will to make her dreams come true. ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§™‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∂‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§∏‡§æ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è‡•§ use vivid descriptions of settings and characters as you write your story.
---
‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§è‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§µ‡§æ ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§â‡§® ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∂‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§£ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ She was tired of being told what she could or couldn't do based on societal norms that had been imposed upon her for years without questioning them. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§ó ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§µ‡§π ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡•§

As Alice grew into adulthood, she began studying various forms of magic with every spare moment she got. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§ó‡§∞‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ It wasn't long before people started taking notice of this young woman they called "the Creatrix," because it seemed like nothing was impossible when she put her mind towards something.

‡§è‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§°‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶‡•á‡§π ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§π‡§∞‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ Her power became more evident each day, but there were those out there whose hearts held resentment against someone daring enough to challenge their authority over others.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∂‡§π‡§∞ ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§Ü ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à, ‡§è‡§≤‡§ø‡§ú‡§º ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§Ø‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§Ü‡§™ ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§¨‡§®‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤‡§§‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡•á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á‡•§ As much as we may want control, sometimes our greatest strength lies within ourselves rather than trying to manipulate things outside us.

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§ø‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§è‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Å‡§∞‡§æ‡§à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ, '‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Å', ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§æ‡§Ø‡§¨ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à‡•§ And though some might say she died too soon, many knew better - that Alice simply returned home where everything always belonged...to herself. 

Generation 5: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is creator by profession and wants to create an artwork that represents her own self.
---
‡§≤‡§≤‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had always been fascinated with the beauty of nature around us - from the colors of sunset on mountains to the intricate patterns found within flowers. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§≠‡§ø‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡•Å‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•Ä‡§õ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡•ã‡§ö ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ However, Lalita faced many challenges along this journey as she struggled against societal expectations for women artists, but nothing could deter her determination towards creating something truly unique and meaningful. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§æ ‡§µ‡§π "‡§¶ ‡§∞‡§ø‡§´‡•ç‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡•ç‡§∂‡§®" ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡§ø ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä-‡§è‡§ï ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§≠‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ö‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§®‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ö‡§≤‡•Ä‡•§ The painting would depict herself through various elements representing different aspects of her identity: emotions, experiences, beliefs, aspirations... ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§¨‡§ø‡§Ç‡§¨ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¶‡•å‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ It was going to be one of those masterpieces which will remain etched forever in history books! ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§≤‡§≤‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Her dedication paid off when people started noticing how powerful it became over time. ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§π‡§Æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§¶ ‡§∞‡§ø‡§´‡§º‡•ç‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡•ç‡§∂‡§Ç‡§∏ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§ø‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§•‡•á; ‡§á‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡§æ ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§≠‡§µ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ And so began another chapter in Lilith's life where she continued exploring new ways to express what makes each individual special while also making sure every stroke or brushstroke spoke volumes beyond words alone. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡•á ‡§ó‡§è, ‡§≤‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä‡§• ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§à ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§™‡•á‡§Ç‡§ü‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§à, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§∞‡§£ ‡§™‡§ø‡§õ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡•Å‡§≤‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ But despite all these achievements, there were still moments during creation when she felt lost. ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§®‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She had been painting and drawing since she could hold a crayon or pencil - her passion for art was evident from the very beginning of life. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡•á ‡§ó‡§è ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡•Ä, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§®‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ Her parents were supportive but they also wanted their daughter to have an education that would provide them with financial security as well. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤‡•á‡§ú ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¶‡§æ‡§ñ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§§‡•ã ‡§µ‡•á ‡§∏‡§π‡§Æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§§‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§≤‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ü‡§µ‡•á‡§¶‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ö‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ 

Sarah's college years flew past quickly as she immersed herself into every aspect possible within this field: learning new techniques, experimenting with different mediums, attending lectures on various styles and movements throughout history. ‡§∏‡•ç‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡§ï ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞, ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§®‡§à ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡•Ä‡§É ‡§¶‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§ò‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç, ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§ú‡§®‡§ø‡§ï ‡§≠‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ö‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡§ï ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ‡•§ It seemed like there wasn't enough time left over each day to take it all in! 

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ A group of local artists approached her asking if she would be interested in creating something unique for one particular building located downtown. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§á‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡§§ ‡§∂‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§á‡§§‡§ø‡§π‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä‡§ï ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§à ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Ä‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä‡§® ‡§≠‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§ö‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ The project involved designing these murals based upon what was already present inside those walls while adding some personal touches along the way. 

‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü, ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•á‡§∑ ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§≠‡•Ä‡§§‡§∞ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ But Sarah loved challenges and dove headfirst into researching everything related to both the historical context behind its creation as well as current trends in contemporary street art. ‡§π‡§´‡•ç‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§•‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶, ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§ø‡§Æ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§™‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§Ü‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ú‡§®‡§ï ‡§®‡§ø‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ‡•§ Everyone praised how beautifully blended together traditional elements with modern ones resulting not only in stunning visual displays but also providing vital information regarding significant events which took place during certain periods . ‡§á‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ú‡•ã‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•á‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§è‡§ï‡§ú‡•Å‡§ü ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§ï ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§§‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§≠‡§µ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§¶‡•á ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Ç‡§†‡§æ ‡§¶‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø‡§ï‡•ã‡§£ ‡§¨‡§® ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ

As she sat behind her desk typing away on spreadsheets for hours every day, little did Lily know that one of those days would change everything - not just for herself but also for millions around India. 25 ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§≤‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§¨‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§ø‡§Æ‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§∏‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•å‡§ï‡§æ ‡§π‡•à-‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ She was proud to be part of such prestigious organization where people came from all over with dreams big or small. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§ö‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§¶‡•á‡§∂ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ó‡§è ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ñ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ö‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§®‡§ú‡§º‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ One fine morning, while going through some financial reports submitted recently by different departments, something caught her attention. ‡§µ‡§ø‡§µ‡§∞‡§£‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§≤‡§§ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç! The figures were way off compared to what had been reported earlier. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ï‡§æ‡§ó‡§ú‡§º‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä, ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü‡§É ‡§Ø‡•á ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•Å‡§ü‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Å ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§¨‡•Ç‡§ù‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ It took no time before Lilly realized it might have been done intentionally so someone could embezzle money meant for public welfare programs like healthcare, education etc. ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à-‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§∞‡•ã‡§ï‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§á‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§ö‡§≤‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§®‡§§‡§æ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡•§ Her heart raced faster than ever because this wasn't anything new to her; when there are large sums involved then corruption always creeps into picture. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§ò‡§ü‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§â‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ As soon as news broke out about these irregularities being found within the department, everyone started pointing fingers towards each other, making accusations against their colleagues without any proof. ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø ‡§¨‡§ø‡§ó‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§à ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡•Å‡§°‡§º‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ Luckily enough, they didn't suspect anyone yet since nothing concrete has come up until now which made them think twice. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø, ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•á‡§Ç ‡§§‡•á‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§°‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∞‡§ø‡§™‡•ã‡§∞‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§Ü‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§ This gave rise to speculation among political parties regarding how much damage can actually happen if funds worth crores go missing? ‡§Ø‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø 

Generation 3: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is government servant by profession and has been working for the last 25 years.
