‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§è‡§ï ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ó‡§æ‡§Å‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§∂‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§µ‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Asha was born into an impoverished family and had to work hard from a young age just to survive. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ-‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ñ‡•á‡§§‡§ø‡§π‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§ú‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§•‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ñ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ò‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡•á‡•§ Despite the challenges she faced growing up, Asha remained determined to create a better life for herself and her loved ones. 18 ‡§∏‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§§‡§ï, ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§à ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§π‡§æ‡§à ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ï ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§à ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She taught at a local school that provided education to underprivileged children of nearby villages. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§® ‡§¨‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ They reminded her why it's important to give back to society.

‡§Ü‡§∂‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§£ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§à ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§ø‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§†‡§ø‡§®‡§æ‡§à ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ After completing some courses related to healthcare, she applied as an Auxiliary Nurse Midwife . ‡§è‡§è‡§∏‡§è‡§ö ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ The job required long hours but also offered immense satisfaction knowing that every day they were making positive impact on people's lives.

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§®, ‡§Ü‡§∂‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§§‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö‡•á ‡§ú‡§®‡•ç‡§Æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä-‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡§µ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ These women came from all walks of village life - farmers with muddy feet or illiterate housewives without proper medical care. ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§ï‡§Æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§§‡•ã ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è‡•§ Others knew their way around births, having delivered many babies themselves over time. ‡§á‡§® ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§® ‡§â‡§™‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡•á ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§® ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡•§ This gave her hope because these mothers would be able to share knowledge which could help others too.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§Ü‡§∂‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§Ç‡§∂ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§µ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§ ‡§∂‡§ø‡§∂‡•Å‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§Æ‡§ú‡•ã‡§∞ ‡§∞‡•ã‡§ó‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ There wasn't enough staff available to look after them properly so most patients lay unattended while waiting for treatment. ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Æ‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡•á, ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡§æ‡§∂‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§®‡§ü ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ 

Generation 3: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is ASHA worker by profession.
---
‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡§§ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ó‡§æ‡§Å‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§∂‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Asha was an enthusiastic and dedicated individual with the aim of serving her community as much she could. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ 

Asha's journey began when she joined hands to work for one of India's government schemes - "Anganwadi Worker Scheme." ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§£ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§¨‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§£ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§∞‡•Ä‡§¨‡•Ä ‡§∞‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡•Ä‡§ö‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ As soon as she became part of this scheme, it gave new meaningfulness into her life. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§°‡•Å‡§¨‡•ã ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç-‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡•á‡§ü‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç, ‡§¨‡•á‡§ü‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ã‡§§‡•á-‡§™‡•ã‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§≠‡§≤‡§æ‡§à ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ She believed that every child deserves accessibility towards education regardless if they come from poor or rich families. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è, ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§® ‡§µ‡§Ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§•‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§ Her dedication led many people around their village to join forces behind her cause.

‡§Ö‡§∂‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§§‡•á‡§ú ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§à ‡§¨‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§Ø ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§≠‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§â‡§ú‡•ç‡§ú‡•ç‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ This made him realize how powerful his efforts were making changes not only within himself but also affecting others positively too. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§ö ‡§ú‡§æ‡§ó‡§∞‡•Ç‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§™‡•à‡§¶‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡•Ä, ‡§Ü‡§∂‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ó‡§æ‡§Ç‡§µ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§á‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ó‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ó‡§†‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ The more villages she reached out to educate children through these programs, the happier she felt knowing each day there are more lives being impacted positally.

‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§•, ‡§Ü‡§∂‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§® ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ Therefore, she decided to take matters on hand and started raising funds to establish schools where underprivileged kids can study without any discrimination. ‡§ß‡§® ‡§ú‡•Å‡§ü‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≠‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á, ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§ï ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§ó‡§∞‡•Ä‡§¨ ‡§™‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§≠‡•Ç‡§Æ‡§ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§õ‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ó‡•Å‡§£‡§µ‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ By doing so, he realized what true happiness meant: helping those less fortunate than you become better versions themselves!

‡§Ü‡§∂‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§â‡§® ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§§‡•Å‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ó‡•Å‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ä 

Generation 4: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is ASHA worker by profession and lives with her family.
---
‡§∂‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§ï‡§É ‡§Ü‡§∂‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä

Aasha was born into an average middle-class household where both parents worked to provide for their three children - two girls and one boy. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∂‡§π‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§°‡§ï‡•ç‡§ü‡§∞ ‡§•‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Å ‡§ï‡§™‡§°‡§º‡•á ‡§ß‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ They lived on the outskirts of town near fields that were used primarily as pastureland during summer months but turned green again come winter when crops would be planted there. 

‡§Ü‡§∂‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§® ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ She wanted to go beyond what she had been taught at home or school; she aspired more than just being content with surviving from day to day. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§∏‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ At first it started off small like reading books or writing stories which eventually led Aasha towards pursuing higher education after completing high school . 

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤‡•á‡§ú ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ-‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§ï‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§â‡§†‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§∂‡§æ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§Æ ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§¢‡•Ç‡§Ç‡§¢ ‡§≤‡•á ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞‡§£-‡§™‡•ã‡§∑‡§£ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡•§ However, Aasha refused to listen to them because they did not understand how important this journey meant to her future prospects. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§ú‡§æ‡§Ø, ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§Ö‡§•‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§® ‡§Ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§ú‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ 

After graduating college with honours degree , Aasha landed herself a job working within healthcare sector as an Asha Worker . ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§≠‡•Ç‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§≤‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§® ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§≠‡§µ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡§§‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§æ‡•§ As time passed, Aasha's dedication grew stronger along with her passion for serving others through various projects initiated under government schemes such as immunisation drives against diseases like polio & measles vaccination programs etc. 

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡•å‡§∞‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§à ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶, ‡§Ü‡§∂‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ó‡•Å‡§ú‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§Æ‡§ú‡§¨‡•Ç‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à‡•§ Her hard work paid dividends when people around appreciated all efforts put forth towards betterment of society while some even sought help themselves due to guidance provided by her presence. ‡§á‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§≤‡§Ø ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§¨ 

Generation 5: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is ASHA worker by profession.
---
‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡§§ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ó‡§æ‡§Å‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§∂‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§µ‡§æ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Asha was an enthusiastic and dedicated woman with big dreams of making her village better for the people living there. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•ã‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ She had always been fascinated to work towards empowering women as she believed that they are often overlooked or undervalued which makes it difficult for them to achieve their goals. 

‡§Ü‡§∂‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§∂‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø ‡§≠‡•Ç‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ One day, while working at one such initiative, she met Shanti Devi - a middle-aged lady whose husband passed away some years ago leaving behind his wife along with two children. ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§¶‡•á‡§µ‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§∞‡•Ä‡§¨‡•Ä ‡§∞‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡•Ä‡§ö‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ó‡•Å‡§£‡§µ‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§≠‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§§‡•ã ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡•§ 

Asha knew how important education could be for these kids so without hesitation offered help from herself if needed. ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä‡§¨ ‡§Ü‡§à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§¶‡•á‡§µ‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ò‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ó‡§è ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§¶‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡§æ ‡§¨‡•Å‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ This led to both women coming together and starting a small NGO called "Samarthan" where other villagers also joined hands to make this project successful. 

‡§ß‡•Ä‡§∞‡•á-‡§ß‡•Ä‡§∞‡•á ‡§è‡§®‡§ú‡•Ä‡§ì ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§£ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§à ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§á‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ They started providing free educational resources like books, uniforms, shoes etc., apart from basic healthcare services through local doctors on regular basis. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ, ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ó‡§†‡§® ‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§¢‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ö‡§æ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∂‡•å‡§ö‡§æ‡§≤‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•Å‡§µ‡§ø‡§ß‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç, ‡§™‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§¶‡§ø ‡§â‡§™‡§≤‡§¨‡•ç‡§ß ‡§ï‡§∞‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ The school authorities were very impressed seeing all the efforts put into place by Samarthan and decided not only to provide scholarships but also assist students financially until graduation level. ‡§á‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§£‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§¶ ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö ‡§ó‡•Å‡§£‡§µ‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§∂‡•à‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§ö‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§õ‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§§‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á‡•§ 

With time, more than just girls came forward to join the organization's programs because now every family wanted its girl child educated too. ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä

Once upon a time there was an Asha Worker named Anjali. ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§ú‡§≤‡§ø ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§µ‡§æ‡§µ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ‡§∂‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ She always wanted to make the lives of women better and help them achieve their dreams. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§∂‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§

Anjli's village had many challenges that needed attention from someone like her. ‡§â‡§®‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ó‡§∞‡•Ä‡§¨‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§à ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ò‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Æ‡§ú‡§¨‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§≠‡•ã‡§ú‡§® ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ Others were illiteracy which made it hard for people to read or write effectively. ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§ï‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§µ‡§ø‡§ß‡§æ‡§è‡§Å ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§≠‡§≤‡§æ‡§à ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§à‡•§

With all these problems at hand, Anjalis aimed on working towards changing things one step at a time with education as its main focus. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§æ‡§≠‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§µ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§ So she started teaching basic literacy skills such as reading, writing, counting numbers, etc., to groups of local villagers - mostly mothers, grandmothers, daughters-in-law, wives, sisters...etc.

‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§ú‡§≤‡§ø ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§à ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§¨‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§¶‡•á‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•á ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§Ü‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§ö ‡§ú‡§æ‡§ó‡§∞‡•Ç‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§™‡•à‡§¶‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡§§‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§π‡•à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§è ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡•§ Her efforts also helped teach how they could save money through proper budgeting methods and investment strategies so they can become more financially stable overtime.

‡§Ö‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§™‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ, ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§ú‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§£‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ò‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§¶‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ò‡§∞‡•á‡§≤‡•Ç ‡§π‡§ø‡§Ç‡§∏‡§æ, ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§π ‡§Ü‡§¶‡§ø‡•§ With each visit, she would try to find ways whereby the community members themselves could solve some of those issues without needing external support. ‡§á‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡•á‡§ó‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ó‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§Ü‡§§‡•Ä ‡§§‡•ã ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§≤‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¨‡•ã‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á‡•§

The impact of this approach became clear when after several months, many families no longer required any outside assistance because what little they did require, they managed to do themselves using knowledge gained during classes taught by Anjalie. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§§‡§ø‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§, ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§∏‡•ç‡§• ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§®

emili ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She had been scribbling stories since she was young but it wasn't until her career as a doctor that she realized how much the two passions could be combined to create something truly unique. ‡§è‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§ø‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§°‡§ø‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ñ‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§¨‡§® ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ 

She worked long hours at hospital shifts, studying new medical cases every day while still finding time for creative pursuits like reading books or attending literary events with fellow writers. ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Å ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ñ‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§§‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡•á‡§µ‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡•á‡§∂‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§®-‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§≠‡§µ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Emily found inspiration everywhere from conversations overheard on elevators to patient records kept meticulously organized throughout each shift.

‡§è‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ‡§® ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•ã‡§π‡§ï ‡§™‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§†‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ‡•§ Her first novel hit bestseller lists within weeks after its release due largely because readers were able to identify so strongly with characters they felt knew personally through their own experiences working alongside doctors and nurses daily.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ, ‡§è‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§ú‡•Å‡§°‡§º‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ö‡§æ‡§≤‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She attended workshops and seminars where experts shared tips on everything from crafting compelling dialogue to building strong supporting cast members into your narratives. ‡§á‡§® ‡§∏‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ‡§ï ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§®‡§à ‡§∞‡§£‡§®‡•Ä‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Å ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§®‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ó‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§

Despite all this success though, there are moments when Emma feels torn between being both a writer and physician simultaneously - juggling deadlines can sometimes feel impossible! ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ In fact, many times during those late night sessions spent tapping away at keyboards, she finds herself thinking back fondly upon patients she treated and grateful for having learned valuable lessons along the way.

‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ‡§π‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§Ü‡§§ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§µ‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤‡•á‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§à ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ She had always been passionate and driven to help others succeed through her work as an expert on various topics ranging from healthcare management to environmental conservation efforts. ‡§ê‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡•Ä‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ Her dedication was unwavering, fueled only by the desire for making positive changes that would benefit society at large.

‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§â‡§™‡§≤‡§¨‡•ç‡§ß‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ö‡§ø‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§µ‡•á ‡§∞‡•ã‡§ó‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§Ö‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§ß‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§ï ‡§§‡§ï‡§®‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§™‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ß‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§Ü‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§®‡§µ‡§æ‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ As she worked with doctors and nurses alike, Sarah's insights helped them find new ways of treating patients while also improving their overall well-being. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§£ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á, ‡§ï‡§à ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ï ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡§•‡§æ ‡§â‡§™‡§≤‡§¨‡•ç‡§ß ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§® ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ‡•§

Aside from her professional endeavors, Sarah dedicated herself towards advocacy causes such as climate change awareness or animal rights activism wherein she used her platform both online and offline to spread knowledge and encourage people around the world to take action against these issues. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡§≤‡§æ‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§∂‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡•Å‡§ï ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ ‡§™‡§°‡§º ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ In this way, even when faced with challenges like political obstruction or industry competition, Sarah remained resolute in pursuing what she believed were important goals worth fighting for.

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§® ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§™‡•Å‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§ú‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§ó‡§§ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§π‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Despite being humble and downplayed many times throughout it all, there could be no doubt how much impact she has made over time - whether it came outwardly via awards or more quietly but still profoundly within those whose lives have changed thanks largely due to her guidance and leadership.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Å‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§®‡§è ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•á ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú‡•á ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•á‡§∑‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§§‡§æ ‡§´‡§æ‡§Ø‡§¶‡•á‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ And so,

‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ç‡§∏‡§ø‡§™‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§≤ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡•å‡§® ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§™‡•Ä‡§°‡§º‡§® ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ It started when one student came up close during lunchtime, trying his best to flirt with Sarah while she was on break from teaching classes that day. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§§‡§≤‡§¨ ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§ß‡§ï‡•á‡§≤ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§è ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§õ‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§π‡§™‡§æ‡§†‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§ ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∞‡§ï‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§®‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§≤‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ 

The next few days were worse than ever as more students tried their luck under cover of laughter or sneaky glances. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ She confronted some of these boys individually but they refused to take responsibility for what happened between them and others like themselves because it wasn't just "their" fault. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ù‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§ú‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§®‡§ú‡§∞‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§¶‡§æ‡§ú ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è‡•§ This only made matters even worse since other girls witnessing this behavior would feel unsafe around men too. 

‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø ‡§¨‡§ø‡§ó‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è ‡§§‡•ã ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ó‡§Ç‡§≠‡•Ä‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§æ‡§∏‡§® ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§¶‡•á ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§â‡§†‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§ó‡§Ç‡§≠‡•Ä‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ They promised to investigate every allegation thoroughly and punish those found guilty without hesitation. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§Ü‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ, ‡§ï‡§à ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§õ‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§∞‡•á‡§∂‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§¨‡§ø‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§π‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§™ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§¶ ‡§ú‡§§‡§æ‡§à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§á‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•Å‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ 

Generation 2: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is school principal by profession and lives with her family.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had always been passionate to become an educator since she was young and now that the time has come for it, Sarah's hard work paid off when she became Principal of one of the most prestigious schools in town. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§ö‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§ø ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§´‡•ã‡§® ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§¶‡•á‡§∂ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•à‡•§ He informed her that their son died during his deployment at war which left Sarah devastated as he used to be everything important to them both. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§§‡•Å‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§§‡•ç‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•å‡§ü‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§Ü ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Æ‡§ú‡§¨‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä‡•§ One day while going through some old papers from before her husband went on tour, she found out something shocking - her daughter-in-law cheating him behind their backs. ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è? Should she tell this news to everyone or should they all just pretend like nothing happened? ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§π ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§™‡§∏ ‡§ö‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§Ç‡§∂ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ On reaching home, she called up Tom (her best friend) and told him what she discovered but didn't reveal anything more than that until tomorrow morning. ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Å‡§¨‡§π ‡§ü‡•â‡§Æ ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡§≤ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Then she revealed how much hurtful information she came across regarding her late Son-In-Law. ‡§á‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ü‡•â‡§Æ ‡§ú‡§µ‡§æ‡§¨ ‡§¶‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§§‡§æ, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∞‡•ã ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∞‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§¶‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§∞‡§æ‡§® ‡§∞‡§π ‡§ó‡§è‡•§ They hugged each other tightly and cried together till there were tears streaming down their faces. 

Generation 3: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is school principal by profession.
---
jooliya ek kushal shikshika thin jo hamesha apne chune huye peshe mein utkrishtata praapt karna pasand karti haih skool ki prisipal ke roop mein kaam par rahte the aur bachchon ko unki poori sambhaavanaaon tak pahunch pradaan karke badlane vaale ban jaate the. She had always been passionate and dedicated to her work, which was why she felt so fulfilled when students excelled under her guidance. 20 saal se adhik samay baad jab unhone padbhaar grahan kiya tabhi vah niraash mahsoos nahin kin; lekin yuvaavastha ne use abhibhoot kar diya.

Julia's love for teaching began at an early age as one of those lucky few whose parents were both teachers themselves. uska jeevansaathi usse milta-julta ho gaya kyonki ve donon hi utsuk vyakti honge jo duniya ko behtari laane ke liye har din prayogshaala setings ya staindard kampoozeshnas room mein lage rahenge. Over time, Julia became more than just another teacher - she embraced every student with open arms like they belonged there too!

apni naukri se pare, juliya paarksa end rilijan faaundeshan naamak sangthan mein shaamil hoti thin, jo gareeb ladkon aur ladkiyo sahit sabhi umra ke logon ke seekhne ke avsaron mein sudhaar ke mishnon ke peechhe majboot icchaayein leti thin. Her dedication towards making education accessible led her into becoming Principal of this esteemed institution where she worked tirelessly day after night until it all seemed worthwhile.

ek din, julliya sadme ki chapet mein aa gayeeh agle varsh ke antim semestar ke dauraan skool band ho jaayega taaki imaarat ka naveeneekran aur punarnirmaan kiya ja sake. As much as that thought broke Julie's heart, knowing how

maariya ko hamesha se shikshan mein dilachaspi rahi hai aur unhone apna poora jeevan skoolon ke beech bitaaya tha. She had always been passionate about helping students reach their full potential while instilling values of hard work, perseverance, and integrity into them. ek peshevar drishtikon saath laane vaali unki kadi kaaryabal neetiyon ki pratishtha badhne lagi jisse maadhyamik vidyaalyon par vichaar karte samay chuninda logon tak hi seemit nahin balki sabhi prakaar ke ummeedvaaro ko mil gaye jo sahaara chaahenge. 

One day she got an offer to become the new headmistress at one such institution - The Stella High School for Girls located on the outskirts of town. yadyapi uske liye niveshit stok ya adhoori baatcheet maujood na hon, lekin use pata tha-usne sahmat ho gayeeh "main ladkon ki tarah acchi tareeke se padhaana pasand karti." And so began her journey as Principal Maria. 

Generation 5: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is school principal by profession and has to face the challenges of running an educational institution.
---
mahila vyakti ka naam kairol tha aur vah ek peshevar skool ki pradhaanaachaaryi thin jo apne chune huye shikshan ke liye bina ruke samarpit rahin. She was well-respected for her leadership qualities but faced many difficulties as she had taken on this role amidst several unforeseen circumstances that tested not only her skills but also her resilience and determination. 

kairal ne pichhle varshon mein mahatvapoorn padonnati haasil karte huye uchchatam star par utkrishtata praapt kiya tha. Her dedication towards education and teaching left no stone unturned when it came down to improving academic standards at schools across different cities where she worked before taking up her current position. lekin ab jab unhone mukhyapaalkartavya sambhaala hua, tab se ve naye baajaar ko neviget nahin paayin. The world around them changed rapidly with new technologies emerging every day which made things even more complicated than they already were. yahaan tak ki sabse acchi tarjani vaale log bhi seekhna jaari rakhne lage taaki naagrik jeevan yaapan ke saath pakki ho sakein. This led Carole into some tough situations like financial constraints or dealing with parents' demands while trying hard enough so their children could excel academically too without any compromise whatsoever!

unhein har din badlate dimaagon aur lacheelepan ke beech sahi santulan sthaapit karne ke prayaason mein deerghakaalik rananeetiyon ko milaate huye sangharsharat roop se ladni padi. Generation 6: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is school principal by profession.
---
saara jonsan ek shaandaar vidyaalay ki pradhaanaachaarya thin jo apne chune huye peshe mein kushlata se kaam kar rahi thin aur unke paas bahut saari safaltaaye hain! She had been teaching for almost 20 years now and was always looking to improve her skills as an educator. vishesh roop se, unhone mahsoos kiya tha ki ve skool ke liye adyatan takneeko ko laagu nahin kar sakti hain taaki yuva peedhi par prabhaav daala ja sake-ve praudyogiki ke baare mein utsuk the lekin abhibhoot hokar seekhte hi pakde gaye. It wasn't that she didn't want more information but rather felt like there were so many options available it would be overwhelming if not done properly - Sarah wanted someone with experience to guide them through this process of change.

isliye us din, sarra ne googi yaahu duniya ke har upaboksda link vaale vyaktitvon se sampark kiya, doston aur sahapaathiyon donon ko dekhein aur onalaayin padhenge. Eventually, after much researching, she found Mr. David Rodriguez from San Francisco City School District which seemed perfect fit since he worked at schools similar sizes than hers. mrit antim nirnayaatmak charnon mein, devid rodrikz sanchaalkon (vibhinn staron) ke netavark ke hisse ke roop mein "netivs" naamak sangthan ke tahat poore deshon mein svadeshi logon ki madad karna pasandeeda ban gayeh The Natives program consisted mainly of volunteers working remotely or locally while being mentored by experienced members within their communities across borders around the world.

Generation 7: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is school principal by profession.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§Ø‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had always dreamed of becoming the headmaster or principal at her local highschool and now she was finally living that dream every day as Headmistress Sarah! ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§õ‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã‡§∂‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§™‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡§º ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ 

One morning before classes began, Sarah noticed something unusual outside on one of their playgrounds - it looked like someone had thrown rocks onto some benches there, damaging them badly enough to make students unable to use those seats for sitting during class time. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ó‡•å‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§¨‡§¶‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∂‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ó‡§è ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§ß ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§™‡§∞‡•á‡§∂‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡•à‡§¶‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§¨‡§∏ ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§∞‡•á‡§∂‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ The damage done would be costly not only financially but also emotionally because these kids were supposed to have fun while playing with each other. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§¶‡•á ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§π‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡§æ‡§à ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§ú‡§∞‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§¶‡§æ‡§ú ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§§‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§¨‡§¶‡§§‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§

Sarah decided immediately after seeing this crime scene to call out all members from both staff and student body alike so they could discuss what actions should take place next. ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á, ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§ö‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§≤‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§π‡§ö‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡•§ Once everyone understood why such an act happened, then came up with solutions together on how best to handle any future incidents which might arise due to bullying behavior among certain groups within our community.

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ù ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ‡§è‡§Å ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä, ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§™‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§® ‡§∞‡§£‡§®‡•Ä‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ó‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•É‡§§ ‡§ï‡§¶‡§Æ ‡§â‡§†‡§æ‡§è ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§π ‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡•à‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ For example: if anyone witnesses similar crimes happening again in front of him/her, he/she must report directly to either teachers' office or administration board without delaying things further than necessary. ‡§á‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π, ‡§Ø‡§¶‡§ø ‡§õ‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§®‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Å‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä, ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•á ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡•á ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡§¨‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Å‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§¶ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ These strategies helped create more awareness amongst people regarding social issues related to violence towards others especially when committed through group activities involving children where safety becomes paramount importance instead

‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡•Ä ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§ï‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ As she grew up, her passion for the art of food only intensified with each passing day. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§≠‡•ã‡§ú‡§® ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§™‡•ã‡§∑‡§£ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§Ü‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§ú‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§ö ‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡§® ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Sophie's love and dedication to cooking were evident from every dish that left their kitchen smelling like heaven itself. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§è‡§ï ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Ç‡§ú‡§® ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§æ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§æ‡§∞‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï ‡§á‡§§‡§æ‡§≤‡§µ‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•ã‡§ü‡§æ ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡§º ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§∞‡•á‡§∏‡§ø‡§™‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ It was always one of her favorite meals as it reminded her fondly of home and family gatherings around warm plates filled with comforting pasta sauce and melt-in-your mouth ricotta cheese.

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§∏‡•ã‡§à ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§æ‡§´ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§§‡•à‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶, ‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡§º‡•Ä ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶‡•Ä‡§¶‡§æ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Ç‡§ú‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§™‡•Ä‡§¢‡§º‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ó‡§è ‡§•‡•á‡•§ The rich flavors combined together perfectly creating an unforgettable taste experience unlike any other. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡•á‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§¨‡•ã‡§∞‡•ç‡§° ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç, ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¶‡§æ‡§µ‡§§ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§®‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ With this thought at heart, Sophie began preparations - slicing tomatoes into perfect circles, chopping fresh basil leaves carefully so they didn't crumble too much while making pesto sauces, mixing flour until just right before adding water or cream and kneading everything till it became soft enough but not overdone. 

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è, ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§§ ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§ï ‡§ò‡§ü‡§ï ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡§•‡§æ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§™‡§ï‡§µ‡§æ‡§® ‡§¨‡§∞‡•ç‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ She had learned how important it was during her training years when working under renowned chef Chef Francoise where he taught them all the tricks on getting things done efficiently without sacrificing quality. ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ò‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§ß‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä‡§¨ ‡§¨‡§ú‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ Finally after what felt like hours, she finished off setting down the last ingredient onto its proper place, ready to be served.

‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§§‡•Å‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§¨‡•á‡§∏‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§á‡§Ç‡§§‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Everyone gathered round eagerly waiting for dinner time to arrive. ‡§Æ‡•á‡§ú ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ú‡§º‡•Ä ‡§™‡§ï‡§æ‡§à

jaismeen hamesha se ek rasoyiya rahi hain aur unhein bhojan taiyaar karne mein maza aaata tha. She had learned the art of cooking from her grandmother and it was something that came naturally to her. jab vah chhoti thin tab unhone apni daadi ke saath baithkar khud ko yogdaan dene ka abhyaas kiya taaki ve dekh sakein ki har cheej par dabaav padte hi sabse accha svaad nikaala jaaye ya nahin. ek din tak uska junoon use le gaya aur vah peshevar ban gayeeh pakaane vaali ladki! The best part? unhone kis tarah ka muft prachaar arjit kiya-unke utpaad utsuk blogars, YouTubers aur anya lokapriy hastiyon dvaara badhaava diye gaye, jisse laakhon dolron moolya ke vigyaapan huye. People would place orders just so they can get free samples of some delicious treats made at home. 

jaise-jaise samay beetta gaya, naashte se dofar ke bhojan se der subah tak naukraani ki jeevansoochi hoti gayi; fir agle varsh tak teesre star tak failti gayi. Every morning started off early because there were always many deliveries scheduled throughout the city which meant waking up before sunrise sometimes. ye lagaam tej thi lekin zaimini santusht roop se muskuraate huye niymit avsaron par kapde bandel deti thi. ---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§§‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ She had always loved to travel the world but also enjoyed being at home with her family. ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§ï‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Ç‡§ú‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§ú‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•å‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡§§ ‡§π‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡§à ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Ç‡§ú‡§® ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§è ‡§•‡•á‡•§ Sarah was an expert chef and she worked as one of the best chefs for some renowned restaurants across different countries. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•á‡§≤‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ 

Sarah lived on top floor apartments near Central Park where it could be quite lonely sometimes. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ü‡§ø‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•á‡§≤‡§æ ‡§® ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§π‡•ã‡•§ Every morning, after waking up early from sleeping overnight, she would start preparations that involved chopping vegetables or baking breads while listening to music. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡§£‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§° ‡§ï‡§Æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≠‡•ã‡§ú‡§® ‡§§‡•à‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ö‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Her kitchen became like another room - well-decorated, full of smells, sounds, colors, textures, taste buds, etc., which made every meal unique when served hot.

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§®, ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∞‡§ú ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§‡§ø‡§ú ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Å‡§ö‡§æ, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á‡§Ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡§≤ ‡§™‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§ö‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§ü‡§π‡§≤‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ The sun's rays were warming her face, making her feel good inside out. ‡§Ö‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡§ï ‡§π‡§µ‡§æ‡§è‡§Å ‡§§‡•á‡§ú‡§º ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•á‡§°‡§º‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§™‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ó‡§è ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§∞‡§∏‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§æ‡§ú‡§º‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§æ‡§à ‡§¶‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ As she walked further into the park, there came a sudden downpour. ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§§‡•á‡§ú ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§ó‡§∞‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§ö ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§ø‡§ú‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§Æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Suddenly all around seemed darker than before; everything looked greyish except the rainwater drops falling gently onto trees leaves. ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§´ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü! And then again... ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•ã ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§≠‡§µ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§Æ‡•å‡§∏‡§Æ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∞‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä! This magical moment stayed etched forever in her memory bank.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•ã‡§™‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä‡§¨ ‡§Ü‡§à, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§™‡§∏ ‡§Ü ‡§ó‡§à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ It felt so satisfying knowing how much effort goes behind each dish prepared especially during rainy days because food tastes better under these conditions. ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤ 

Generation 5: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is cook by profession.
---
‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§∏‡•ã‡§á‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had been working as the head chef at her family's restaurant since she was sixteen years old and never once let it show that this job wasn't just another part-time gig to fill up some extra hours during college breaks. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§æ‡§ï ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¶‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∂‡•à‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§ø‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Her signature dishes were always met with rave reviews from both locals and tourists alike - people would come back time after time for more of Lena's delicious creations!

‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§Ü‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§∞‡•á‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤‡•á‡§ú ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ However, despite being successful early on in life, there was one aspect missing: love. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ê‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§¨‡§ø‡§®‡§æ ‡§â‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ It seemed like every man out there wanted something else besides what they saw when looking into those big brown eyes or hearing that sweet voice coming through over the phone lines while discussing menu options.

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡§æ ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§≠‡•ã‡§ú‡§® ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡•á‡§Ø ‡§§‡§ï ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§® ‡§∞‡§π‡•á‡•§ That day changed everything for Leona. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∞‡§ú ‡§°‡•Ç‡§¨‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ, ‡§µ‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§è ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§§‡§æ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§™‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§ñ‡§∞‡•Ä‡§¶‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä‡§°‡§º ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä‡•§ As luck might have it though, fate intervened again when he came across an elderly woman selling homemade preserves made entirely using local ingredients. ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ì‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§´‡§≤ ‡§§‡•à‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§ö‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§§‡•Å‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡•Ä‡•§ The two struck conversation instantly which led them down memory lane where stories unravelled about their respective families' recipes passed down generations ago.

‡§Ö‡§ó‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡§à ‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡§® ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡•Å‡§ú‡•Å‡§∞‡•ç‡§ó ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡§≤‡§æ‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§ö ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§‡§ö‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§ Every visit brought forth new discoveries such as how each other knew so much about different fruits and vegetables found only within certain regions around town. ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§µ‡•á ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§≤‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§§ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§°‡•á‡§ü‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•Ä‡•§ Over the next few months, they fell deeply in love not 

Generation 6: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is cook by profession and likes to experiment with new recipes.
---
‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§ï‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ It was her way of expressing herself through flavors and textures that made every meal an experience worth remembering. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡•á‡§µ‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§∏‡•ã‡§á‡§Ø‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§®‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§™‡§®‡§™‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§ö‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§®‡§è ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ As she grew older, Lena found solace in the kitchen - it became not just a job but also a sanctuary where she could escape from life's stresses and find peace within herself. 

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§®‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã‡§∂‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∞‡§∏‡•ã‡§à‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ-‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ã‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§ó ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ She had been inspired after reading some articles on food bloggers who were exploring unconventional ingredients like kimchi or miso paste as main components for their dishes. ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Ç‡§†‡•Ä ‡§∂‡•à‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡§º ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ú‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ So, without much hesitation, she decided to give this idea a try. 

‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•ã‡§ß ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§â‡§® ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Ç‡§ú‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§æ‡§∞‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§Æ‡§§‡•å‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§à ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§™‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§∂‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§à ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Ç‡§ú‡§® ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ After hours spent poring over countless books and online resources, Lena finally landed upon something intriguingly exotic: Korean black pork soup . ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•Ä‡§¢‡§º‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§™‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§® ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§Ö‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§∏ ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§™‡§∂‡•Å‡§ß‡§® ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§™‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ The traditional version involved boiling down whole hog until all its fatty meat melted away leaving behind tender chunks of flesh which would then be served either hot or cold depending on preference. 

‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§∞‡§£ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§§‡•Å‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ Instead, she wanted to modernize the classic concept while still keeping true to tradition. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è, ‡§µ‡§π ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§∞‡§≤ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä‡§É ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï ‡§ò‡§ü‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§è ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§π‡§ü‡§æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§Ç ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§´‡§æ‡§á‡§≤ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ú‡•ã‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§ By using fresh vegetables such as carrots, celery, ginger root, garlic cloves, red bell pepper strips, cilantron leaves, and even some slices of fried eggplant added at the end to provide additional texture

Sophie worked hard during college to perfect her skills - from learning how to make homemade pasta dishes to mastering classic French dessert recipes. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§à ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§à, ‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡§º‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ù‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•å‡§ï‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§≠‡•ã‡§ú‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡•Å‡§ï ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ She landed an internship at one of New York City's most prestigious restaurants where she honed new techniques under some of the best chefs around. 

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§®, ‡§∞‡•á‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§ò‡•ã‡§∑‡§£‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§®‡§è ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§® ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á‡•§ The owners wanted someone like Sofi to head their kitchen team. ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§µ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶, ‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ò‡§¨‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§≠‡§µ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ However, after much thought and deliberation, she decided it would be too good opportunity for herself not take this chance. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è, ‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡•Ç‡§Ø‡•â‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§∂‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ö‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∞‡•á‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ It took months but finally they were ready to open its doors.

‡§Ö‡§ó‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§Æ‡§π‡•Ä‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§∏‡•ã‡§à ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤ ‡§ó‡§à‡•§ Everyone had been hired based solely upon experience or recommendations made by other chefs. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§ó ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç; ‡§µ‡§π ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•Ä‡§õ‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡§ï ‡§∂‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§µ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ Her passionate approach towards food and dedication inspired everyone working there to work harder than ever before. ‡§∞‡•á‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§à ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞ ‡§Ü ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ Some even came back multiple times because everything tasted so delicious!

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§π ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡•á ‡§ó‡§è, ‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡•á‡§à ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à‡•§ But despite all these successes, she still felt unsure if what she did mattered enough to others. ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡•Å‡§∞‡•ç‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§Ø‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§ ‡§Ü‡§à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ A group of friends gathered together to celebrate life mil

ek baar ki baat hai, ek chhote se shahar mein raajakumaari ke naam par kaam karne vaali safaayeeghar tha jise maaya kaha jaata tha. She was an orphan and had been raised from childhood at the palace of Princess Maya herself. vah unke pasandeeda vyaktitva aur sabse acche dost ban gaye jo unhone apni umra badhaane tak paida huye sambandhon ko tod diya. 

Maya's life wasn't easy as she grew up with little to no education but her hard work paid off when one day Prince Siddharth came into town for his annual visit. use turant uski sundrata aur vinamrata donon milegi lekin yah puraani yaadadaasht nahin hogi jab ve milenge tabhi pris sid ne mayeemayeez dimaag mein pravesh kiya. He remembered that he saw this girl working everyday without any complaints while cleaning their place before him on many occasions during previous years.

us din agle hi subah ho gayi jis taraf prises meyi ne dekheeyo padkar faisla liya. Her face lit up seeing Maimai smiling back at them after completing all tasks given yesterday. fir uska dil uda dene laga jab mainmayi ne use muskurte huye sirf 'dhanyavaad' bolein. They both knew it would be impossible now to keep away each other forever since they were destined lovers according to astrologers.

prisipsan ne manmaayi ko bataaya ki ab yeeshu maseeh aa chukey honge taaki ham log poochhein "kyooyes" (khush amez) jeevankaal ke dauraan har cheej ke peechhe antardrishtipoorn arth ko samjhenge. Both agreed to get married once Jesus Christ arrived so that we could enjoy our lives together.

un varshon baad, jab susamaachaar avtaaro ne svargadooton ki madhyasthata mein gaav lautna sunishchit kiya, to puraskrit premiy

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§è‡§ï ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ó‡§æ‡§Å‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Sarah was the only daughter of her parents and had to work hard from an early age due to their financial constraints. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞‡§£-‡§™‡•ã‡§∑‡§£ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡§à ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§´‡§æ‡§à ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•å‡§Ç‡§™‡•á‡•§ 

Sarah took up this task with great enthusiasm as she believed that it would help them earn some extra income for household expenses. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§¨‡§π ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§â‡§†‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§´ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á‡•§ Her mother used to make sure they all eat well before starting on any cleaning chores so that there were no complaints later during daytime when everyone got tired after working long hours.

‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Å ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§π‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§π‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§™‡§°‡§º ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§§‡§ø‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§∏‡§π‡§æ‡§Ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She also felt proud knowing how much effort went into making things look better around home than what people usually see outside - which made her feel good too!

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∞‡§ú ‡§°‡•Ç‡§¨‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡§ï ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§ï‡§Æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§¨‡§ö‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§• ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§†‡•Ä‡§ï ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ This thought gave rise to another feeling within herself: frustration at not being able to do enough or having someone else take care instead. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø, ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§®‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§â‡§® ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§§‡§æ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§

As time passed, Sarah learned more ways through experience and observation of other individuals' methods that helped improve efficiency while still maintaining quality standards without compromising safety precautions like wearing gloves etc., even though these tasks might seem mundane but are essential components towards keeping our homes hygienic & safe places where family members can live comfortably together peacefully despite living under one roof .

‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§•‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ She had grown up with her parents and siblings on the streets of Mumbai where they struggled to make ends meet every day. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§•‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Å ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞‡§£-‡§™‡•ã‡§∑‡§£ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§´‡§æ‡§à ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•à‡§®‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§® ‡§Ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§ú‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ Every morning before dawn when most other workers were still fast sleeping or preparing themselves mentally to face another exhaustive workday ahead, Sweeping queen would be out there making sure all areas are free from dirt and debris. ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§£ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§π‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§†‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∞‡•á‡§≤‡§µ‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•á‡§∂‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç, ‡§¨‡§∏ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•â‡§™‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡§ö‡§∞‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¢‡•á‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ó‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§´‡§æ‡§à‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§°‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ People started recognizing her dedication towards her job which led others to follow suit. ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§´-‡§∏‡§´‡§æ‡§à ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§§‡•á‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§à ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•Å‡§à‡§Ç, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ 
Samantha knew this wasn't easy. ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§ó ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä-‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§ü‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§§‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ But despite it being tough at times, she never gave up because nothing could stop her passion for helping those less fortunate than hers. ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§•, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡•ç‡§• ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§Ü‡§§ ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§•‡•Ä, ‡§â‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ It allowed her to connect deeply with many individuals who needed help. ‡§Ø‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§Ç‡§¨‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§¨‡§®‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§¶‡•á‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•Ä‡•§ In return, these connections helped build trust within their community leading to better healthcare services, education opportun

ek baar ek mahila ke baare mein kaha jaata tha jo apne ghar ki safaayi karke jeevikopaarjan karti thin. Her name was Maya and she lived with her parents on the outskirts of town. unki umra tees-chaalees varshon se adhik nahin honi chaahiye lekin ve pichhle dashak tak hi rahi hongi jab unhone shuru mein naukri sveekaar li aur fir din dar din chali gayeehin. 

Maya's father had been working as an auto mechanic for almost two decades when he suddenly fell ill one day which forced him to take time off from work. us samay vitteey dabaav badhaane vaala ho saka hai taaki parivaar ko ab naye doktaron ya sarjari ka daura na padna pade. So they decided that it would be better if Maya started doing some odd jobs around their neighborhood to help support them financially until his health improved or something else came up. 

maaya ne sochkar javaabi pratibandhon ke taur par yojanaapoorvak har subah uthti thi aur lagbhag paach ghante tak sadkon par chalti rahti thi - cleaning gutters, dusting windows, mopping floors etc., all while wearing gloves & masks at times because there were many germy areas where people threw trash without any regard towards others. use log dekhte huye sabse zyaada duvidha hoti thi, mukhyateeh vishesh roop se ladakhdaati gaadiyo ke peechhe se guzarni, kuchh logon ko nazron mein fasaani aur/anyatha hastakshepit manodsha vyakt karna! But then again, sometimes getting paid handsomely for such tasks could mean more than just earning money but also providing basic necessities like food & clothing too...isliye antim lakshya praapt karne hetu prayatnashaastravidta lena sahmat tha .

---
‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§è‡§ï ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∂‡§π‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Sarah was not like any other girl her age as she had to work hard every day just so that they could make ends meet for their family of five children and parents. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§™‡•à‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§•‡•á ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡§§‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§è‡§ï‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ This meant the burden fell on young Sarah's shoulders to provide for them all alone while also going through school at night. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§® ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§ú‡§≤‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ‡§ó‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡•§ However, despite everything that went wrong with life around her, there were some things which gave hope even though it seemed very far away from reality.

‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•Å‡§¨‡§π ‡§∏‡§æ‡§¢‡§º‡•á ‡§õ‡§π ‡§¨‡§ú‡•á ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∞‡§ú ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∞‡•ã‡§∂‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ She would wake up early each morning before sunrise because this allowed her enough time to clean out an entire building without being disturbed or hindered by anyone else during working hours. ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡•á ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ It wasn't easy but something within herself kept pushing forward towards success no matter what obstacles came along the way. ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á-‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡§ï‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ-‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡•á ‡§ó‡§∞‡•Ä‡§¨ ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Å ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ But then again, he reminded himself how much his sister loved him and wanted nothing more than seeing him succeed one day. ‡§á‡§® ‡§∏‡§¨‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§ö, ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§§‡•ã ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§†‡•Ä‡§ï ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ So after finishing another shift, she returned home exhausted only to find her mother cooking breakfast waiting patiently for her return. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä, ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡•à‡§¶‡§æ ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ And thus began yet another journey into becoming someone great someday - a woman determined never to give up until achieving whatever goal lay ahead regardless of challenges faced. 

Generation 6: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is sweeper by profession and lives with her family.

Generation 7: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is sweeper by profession.

I remember how proud my mother felt when she would tell me that "cleanliness is next to godliness" and it was her responsibility as the head of our household to maintain clean surroundings for us all. 

main abhi tak poori tarah se nahin badla lekin dridhta se nirnay lene vaale logon par vichaar shuru huye jo cheejon ko sahi tareeke se dekhenge. All this helped keep things organized with no signs or smells lingering behind any corner.

Generation 1: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is fashion designer by profession. ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§® ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§´‡•à‡§∂‡§® ‡§°‡§ø‡§ú‡§æ‡§á‡§®‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç‡•§
