‡§è‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She was fascinated with the beauty of colors and how they could be used to create something unique and beautiful that would capture people's attention. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∞‡§Ç‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•å‡§ï‡§ø‡§ï ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§¶‡•Å‡§à ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ü‡•à‡§™ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§∏-‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Alice had always been drawn towards art since she was little - drawing on her walls as an adolescent or painting at every opportunity she got during holidays. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§® ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§• ‡§¨‡§® ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ It wasn't until college when she took up fine arts classes for the first time where she realized what it meant to truly express herself through paintings, sculptures, sketches, etc., all while exploring new techniques and styles along the way. ‡§è‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§∏‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§®‡§è ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§§‡§ï‡§®‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§ó ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä‡•§ Her passion grew stronger each day, fueling her desire to become one of the best artists out there. ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤‡•á‡§ú ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§≠‡•Ä, ‡§è‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡•ç‡§ú‡•á‡§Ç‡§°‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ, ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∞‡•ã‡§ï‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ Through dedication and hard work, Alexandra became known throughout society for being not only talented but also humble enough never to forget those less fortunate than themself. ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§è‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶‡•á‡§π‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ö‡•Å‡§™ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§® ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ With numerous exhibitions under her belt showcasing some of her most famous pieces, including portraits of musicians like Bono from U2, John Lennon from The Beatles, Elvis Presley, and many more. ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§á‡§® ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§è‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡•ç‡§ú‡•á‡§Ç‡§°‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§π‡§æ‡§® ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ 

Prompt: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is architect by profession

Generation 1: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is architect by profession and wants to build her own house.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She loved designing homes from scratch with an eye for detail that would make them look like they had always been there - the perfect blend of practicality and beauty. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§à, ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ 

Sarah's journey towards building her dream home began when she purchased land on the outskirts of town near some rolling hills. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§è‡§ï‡§¶‡§Æ ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ó‡§π ‡§∏‡§æ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§à-‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§∂‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§§‡§ø‡§µ‡§ø‡§ß‡§ø ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§µ‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡§ø ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Sarah spent weeks planning every aspect of what was going into this new space: where windows should be placed, how many rooms needed to fit comfortably inside, which materials were best suited for construction purposes, etcetera.

‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§Ü‡§§ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ With each passing day came more challenges as well as opportunities. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§£ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§•‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§®‡§ú‡§º‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ There were contractors hired to handle everything from foundation work to plumbing installations, while others worked alongside her team members doing things such as framing walls or laying flooring tiles.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à‡•§ Every time someone complimented something unique about their living quarters, it fueled her determination even further. ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ß‡•Ä‡§∞‡•á-‡§ß‡•Ä‡§∞‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§¨‡§® ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ! And then one beautiful summer evening arrived...

‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§§‡•à‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ö‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ It stood tall amidst lush greenery all around it, glowing under twinkling stars above its roofline. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§¶‡§Æ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Å‡§∞‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ This place truly belonged only to herself now - not just another project but rather a sanctuary built specifically for those moments of pure joy and relaxation.

‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§π‡§´‡•ç‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§®‡§è ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§§‡•Å‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§® ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§¨‡•ç‡§ú‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ As much satisfaction derived from creating perfectionist architecture as did seeing people appreciate her handiwork firsthand through admiring looks at both interior spaces (the open floor plan made hosting guests easy) and exterior views alike .

‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç 

Generation 2: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is architect by profession.
---
‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§µ‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§è‡§ï ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ñ‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡•§ Her name was Sarah and she had always been fascinated with the beauty of buildings that surrounded her every day life. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤‡•á‡§ú ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡§ï ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§°‡§ø‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§π‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡•á ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ After graduation, it took some time for her to find employment but eventually landed an opportunity at one of the most prestigious architecture firms where they were looking out for someone like herself. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ö ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ 

Sarah's job as an architect required long hours spent working on blueprint designs or visiting construction sites during different stages of development. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§´‡§æ‡§Ø‡§¶‡•á‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ She learned how to balance work-life while still making sure everything went according to plan when designing new projects. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø, ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§Ö‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ‡§è‡§Å ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§® ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§°‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡•§ One such incident happened early into their career when she made mistakes which led them back from deadlines causing frustration among clients. ‡§á‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§Æ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ö‡§ø‡§Ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§§‡§®‡§æ‡§µ ‡§™‡•à‡§¶‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§™‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§π‡•Å‡§à‡§Ç‡•§

Despite these setbacks, Sarah remained determined to succeed despite being overwhelmed sometimes. ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡•Ä ‡§¢‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§∏‡§π‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•à, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§∏‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è‡•§ Overall, Sarah found success not only through hard work but also learning along the way. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§≠‡§µ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§®‡§è ‡§°‡§ø‡§ú‡§æ‡§á‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§ö‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§à, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§®‡§µ‡•Ä‡§® ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∞‡§ö‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§µ‡§∞‡§£‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§Ü‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ Throughout this journey, Sarah realized what truly fulfilled her - creating beautiful structures using innovative ideas combined with practical solutions. ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™, ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§£ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§á‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§µ ‡§π‡•Å‡§à‡•§ 

Generation 3: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is architect by profession and lives with her family.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡•Å‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡•§ She was an Architect for over 10 years now and had designed some of the most beautiful buildings that stood tall on every corner she looked at. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•Å‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§æ‡§® ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ó‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§°‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∂‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§≤‡§ó‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡•§ Her passion for architecture led to many opportunities coming her way but none more than when one day, Sarah received news from her boss - Mr. Johnson.

‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•â‡§®‡§∏‡§® ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§®‡§µ‡•Ä‡§®‡•Ä‡§ï‡§∞‡§£‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ-‡§è‡§ï ‡§®‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç! The property belonged to his father's side of the family which meant it would be under strict scrutiny as he wanted everything done right without any compromises made. ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•â‡§®‡§∏‡§® ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡•á‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ It wasn't just their house being renovated; this project involved designing another wing onto what already existed so they could expand if need arose later down the line.

‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§ø‡§ö‡§ï‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§à ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§á‡§®‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ø‡§ï‡•Ä‡§® ‡§® ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ó‡§≤‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§§‡•ã ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§†‡•Ä‡§ï ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ So she took up the challenge headfirst knowing full well how much work lay ahead of them.

‡§∏‡§™‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§π ‡§Æ‡§π‡•Ä‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§è, ‡§Æ‡§π‡•Ä‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§è ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§á‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡§§‡•á‡§Ç ‡§§‡•à‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ They were stunningly modern yet still reminiscent of old world charm. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡•á ‡§ó‡§è, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§´‡§≤ ‡§¶‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Every night before bedtime, she couldn't help but feel proud of herself because all those sleepless nights didn't go unnoticed. ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§¨‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§ó‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞, ‡§µ‡§π ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§§‡•Å‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§¨‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞ ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§®‡§à ‡§¶‡•Ä‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç, ‡§ñ‡§ø‡§°‡§º‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§∞‡§µ‡§æ‡§ú‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§£ ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§§‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ All these things combined together created something truly special.

‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§π‡§´‡•ç‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶, ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Ä‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§´‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂, ‡§õ‡§§‡•á‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§¶‡§∞‡§µ‡§æ‡§ú‡•á ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•á‡•§ And then came the final touch 

Generation 4: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is architect by profession.
---
‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡•Ä ‡§è‡§ï ‡§â‡§ú‡•ç‡§ú‡•ç‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ She had always been fascinated with the intricacies of design and construction that went into creating buildings and structures. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•Å‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Ø‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§¶ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§µ‡§ø‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§≤‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Sophie's passion for architecture was evident from her early years as she would often sketch out plans on paper or build miniature models to visualize how different spaces could be designed. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§∏-‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç, ‡§â‡§® ‡§µ‡§ø‡§µ‡§∞‡§£‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§®‡•ã‡§ü ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§®‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ Her dedication towards this field led her down an unconventional path where she started working at various firms across New York City. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§Ç‡§∂ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó "‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞" ‡§ï‡§π‡•á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§£ ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∑‡•ç‡§† ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á‡•§ Despite facing numerous challenges along the way - such as tight budgets or client demands - Sophie never lost sight of what truly mattered: ensuring each building reflected its surroundings while also being functional enough so people can thrive within it. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º‡§§‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§ø‡§§ ‡§´‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Å‡§ö‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∂‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡•á‡§∂ ‡§™‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§á‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡•Å‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ù‡•á‡§¶‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§ï‡•Ä‡•§ It wasn't long before Sofia became one of those few individuals whose name resonates throughout the industry. ‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§°‡§ø‡§ú‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§ö‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§™‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§á‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∞‡§ö‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§£ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞‡§£‡§æ ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤ ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§µ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ Though some may view her work as just another job, she sees herself more than anything else as someone who has made their dream come true through hard work and determination. ‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§ú‡§ó‡§π ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§ï‡§Æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç ‡§™‡§æ‡§à ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•à‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§™‡§• ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ 

Generation 5: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is architect by profession and has to design an eco-friendly building.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•Å‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had always been fascinated with the way buildings were designed and how they could be used as tools for social change. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§°‡§ø‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§™‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ However, she soon realized that not many companies or clients appreciated her vision of sustainable architecture. ‡§ï‡§à ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§µ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§£ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ù‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ê‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§á‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§°‡§ø‡§ú‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§°‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§è ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§•‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Å‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞ ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Sarah's passion grew stronger despite these challenges, and so did her determination to make people realize their impact on nature through innovative designs.

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§®, ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§∂‡§π‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§®‡§è ‡§®‡§ø‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§á‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ The school was looking forward to having its own campus built from scratch, which meant it would need someone like Sarah - someone who understood green technology and environmentally friendly construction methods. ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Æ‡•å‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ç‡§¶ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ After much deliberation, Sarah submitted several proposals to the client, each one showcasing different aspects of environmental consciousness such as solar panels, rainwater harvesting systems, wind turbines, natural ventilation strategies, etc., but none seemed quite right until now.

‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§®‡§µ‡•Ä‡§®‡§§‡§Æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§µ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•Å‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§§‡•ã ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ It included everything imaginable when it came to using renewables and reducing energy consumption: geothermal heat pumps, passive cooling techniques, LED lighting fixtures, low VOC paints, biodegradable materials... ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§≤‡•ç‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•à! With this proposal, Sarah proved herself once again capable enough to create beautiful yet practical structures while also being mindful towards our planet's wellbeing.

‡§á‡§∏ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§¶‡§Æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§µ‡§ß‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§∞‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡§•‡§æ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§µ ‡§ü‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§ä ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§ Every element chosen must meet strict criteria set forth by government regulations regarding carbon footprint reduction and waste management practices. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ, ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡•ã‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§Æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§µ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§Ü‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§ß‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•á ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§æ‡•§ All of these factors made the project more complex than any other before them, but nothing d

‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Ever since she was young and watching her father work on construction sites with his team of workers, Sarah had been captivated by the intricate designs that went into building houses for people to live comfortably within them. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∂‡•á‡§ï‡§¶‡§Æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§®‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡•Å‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∞‡§ö‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§£ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§≤‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§¨‡•Å‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§æ‡§è‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ 

Sarah graduated from college with honors and landed an internship at one of the most prestigious architecture firms in town. ‡§µ‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡§ó‡§ø‡§®‡§§ ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§≤‡§Ç‡§¨‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ö‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§¨‡•à‡§†‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§•‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è‡•§ She learned every aspect of designing buildings - how they should be structurally sound, what materials would best suit their purpose, where windows could provide natural light or ventilation systems installed properly can keep homes cool during hot summer months.

‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§µ‡§∞‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§£ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à-‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§´‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï ‡§™‡§¶ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ! From there, Sarah worked tirelessly to create innovative plans which were not only functional but also beautifully designed. ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§°‡§ø‡§ú‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§µ‡§∞‡§£‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•á‡§∑‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ü‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡•á‡§Ç‡•§

As time passed, Sarah's reputation as an exceptional architect grew stronger and more impressive. ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§£‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§π‡•ã‡§ü‡§≤, ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§≤‡§Ø ‡§≠‡§µ‡§® ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§®‡§ø‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§®‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§Ü‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ Her projects became renowned among fellow architects because of its unique features like incorporating green spaces inside structures or creating public areas around water bodies so it looked scenic while still being environment friendly.

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§§‡•Å‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§à‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§®‡§æ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Every day brought new challenges, fresh ideas, and opportunities to push herself further than before. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§à ‡§§‡§ï‡§®‡•Ä‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§® ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§™‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡•Å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§è‡•§ As years progressed, Sarah continued to make significant contributions towards shaping cities across different parts of the world through

‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§°‡§ø‡§ú‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ó‡§è ‡§Ö‡§¶‡•ç‡§≠‡•Å‡§§ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§Ç‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§è‡§ï ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∂‡§π‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Sarah was born and raised on the outskirts of town with her parents, two older brothers, and an elder sister named Rachel. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§π ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä, ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡§§‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§¢‡•Ç‡§Ç‡§¢‡§®‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ She had always been fascinated by hair styling since she could remember so decided to pursue it as a career path. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡§æ‡§á‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Over time, word spread around that there's someone from our small community who can make people look their best without breaking the bank! ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§Ç‡§°‡§µ‡§æ‡§è ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∑‡•ç‡§† ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§Æ‡§π‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á ‡§π‡•á‡§Ø‡§∞‡§°‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡•à‡§≤‡•Ç‡§® ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ñ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ö ‡§â‡§†‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡•á‡•§ Her business grew steadily until one day when she received news that would change everything for her - her father passed away unexpectedly leaving behind his youngest daughter alone. ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ-‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•à, ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•á‡§≤ ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•á‡§¶‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§∂‡•ã‡§ï ‡§® ‡§ñ‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§ With this new responsibility at hand, Sarah continued working hard every single day knowing how much money they needed to pay off debt left after dad died. ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§Æ‡§π‡•Ä‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§ø‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§≠‡•Å‡§ó‡§§‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞‡•á‡§∂‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§¨‡§ø‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ‡•§

lekin fir achaanak cheejon mein badlaav aa gaya. sushri jonsan ek saumya aur paripakva mahila thin jo apne peshe ke prati bahut samarpit rahin-naayi ban gayin! She had always been fascinated with the art of hair styling and cutting since she was young, so when an opportunity arose to pursue it as her career path, Ms Johnson jumped at it without hesitation. 15 se adhik varshon tak unhone nairobi shahar mein kuchh behatreen baal staayil karte huye duniya ki yaatra jaari rakhi thi.

Mrs Jones' skills were unmatchable - she could transform any hairstyle into something unique that would make anyone feel confident from head to toe. yahaan tak ki sabse chunauteepoorn graahkon ko uski dekhbhaal ka ehsaas hua, har mulaakaat sankraamak ho gaya lekin sundrata paida hoti gayi. People loved visiting Mrs Johnston for their cut or style because they knew every time they left her salon feeling like royalty themselves. vibhinn prakaar ke vyaktigat saundarya vaale log use pasand nahin kar sake; ve prabuddh hongeekritta ko sunishchit roop se chaalu kar dete taaki sarvashreshth utpaad dijaayinar neele rang mein aa jaaye. It wasn't just her skill but also how approachable she made everyone feel comfortable around them which earned respect amongst both men & women alike .

lekin ab, jeevant streetlaind sailoon dinacharya se brek lene ka samay aa gaya tha. After many years working tirelessly day after night, Sara decided on retiring gracefully instead of being forced out due to ageism or other reasons. nateejtan, mistres jons ne apni sevaanivritt ghoshanaapatra post ki aur poore deshon mein teji laane lagin, jisse sahyogiyon aur doston donon ke beech utsuk romaanch badhta gaya. Sure! ‡§Ø‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ö‡§∞‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ò‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§Ö‡§§‡§ø‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§≤‡§ò‡•Å ‡§ï‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡§§‡§® ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§∞‡§£ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡§É

As the sun began to set over the bustling city streets, Sarah stepped out from behind the curtains covering up her barbershop window with an exasperated sigh. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§ø‡§õ‡§≤‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§¨‡•á‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§™‡§∏ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§¨‡§∏ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•â‡§™ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∞‡•ã‡§§‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ-‡§è‡§ï ‡§ê‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ò‡§ü‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§ñ ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Her heart was heavy as she thought back on how much work had piled onto her shoulders since becoming solely responsible for caring after both herself and her daughter following their father's passing months ago. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§ß‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§™‡§°‡§º ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•å‡§ü‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§≤‡§Ç‡§¨‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§°‡§º‡§ï ‡§§‡§Ø ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§

Despite being one of the most respected hairstylists around town, it seemed like no matter what hours or days off Sarah took during this difficult time - nothing ever felt enough. ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•á‡§Ç ‡§†‡•Ä‡§ï ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ö‡§ø‡§Ç‡§§‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§•‡§ï‡§æ‡§® ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ She knew deep down inside that if she didn't take some time away soon, things would only get worse before they got better. ‡§Ø‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ü‡§ú ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§à ‡§π‡§´‡•ç‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§Ü‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§™‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡§ú‡§¨‡•Ç‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü‡•§ It wasn't going to be easy though; not when there were so many people relying upon them day in and day out... ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞, ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à, ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä? At least that's something Sarah could always count on. 

Generation 6: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Barber by profession.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§®‡§æ‡§à ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She loved the feeling of being surrounded with people and their stories while she worked on her craft. ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•å‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ö‡•á‡§π‡§∞‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§æ‡§® ‡§Ü ‡§ó‡§à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§â‡§Ç‡§ó‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§≤‡§Ç‡§¨‡§æ‡§à ‡§ï‡§æ‡§ü ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§≤‡§Ç‡§¨‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ 

Growing up as one of three siblings had taught Sarah to be resilient and independent from an early age. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Å ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§™‡§°‡§º ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç ‡§•‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞‡§£-‡§™‡•ã‡§∑‡§£ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡§§‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ However, this did not stop her passion for hair styling - instead it fueled hers even more so that when she was old enough, she decided to go back into school to become certified as both a cosmetologist and barber.

‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤‡•á‡§ú ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡•Ä, ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Every day after class, she would spend hours practicing different techniques until they became second nature. ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞, ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡§ø‡§ï ‡§π‡•à‡•§ As graduation approached, there were many job offers pouring out but none quite like what happened next: a local celebrity offered to hire her!

‡§∏‡•à‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§∏‡•á‡§≤‡§ø‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§§‡§≤‡§¨ ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§µ‡•á‡§§‡§® ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡§ø‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§ø ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§™‡§π‡§ö‡§æ‡§® ‡§™‡§æ‡§è‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ It wasn't long before word got around town that Sarah could cut anyone's hair without them knowing if someone else had done it or not. ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§á‡§Ç‡§§‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ï‡§§‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ñ‡§°‡§º‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§¨‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•â‡§∏‡•ç‡§Æ‡•á‡§ü‡•ã‡§≤‡•â‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡•Å‡§≤‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ Word spread quickly among those who knew how important good haircuts are especially during special occasions such as weddings where every detail counts down to perfection.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡•á ‡§ó‡§è, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶‡•Ä‡§¶‡§æ ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§à, ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•á‡§∑ ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§® ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§ö ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§ü‡§µ‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§≤‡§Ç‡§¨‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Her work ethic, attention to details, and dedication towards each client made everyone feel welcomed at all times no matter which celebrities walked through doors looking for some much needed pampering services.

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§¶‡•á‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§, ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∞‡§ú ‡§°‡•Ç‡§¨‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ 

Generation 7: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Barber by profession and her journey to become one.
---
jab jenet ne apne pita ki mrityu ke baad parivaar ka ghar chhod diya tha aur ek saal tak yaatra kar rahi thin, tab unhone faisla kiya thaah vah bairistar nahin banegi kyonki uske paas yogyataayein hain lekin use sangeet mein adhik dilachaspi ho gayeeh dholak ko maarna! So she started learning music at the local school of arts where there was an annual competition for young talents held every year which Jennet participated with much enthusiasm but unfortunately lost out on it due to lack of proper training and practice sessions. 15 varsh se kam umra vaali ladkon-ladiyoh pratiyogita jeeta. She didn't lose heart though as this gave them motivation they needed to work harder towards their goal. unhein jaannevaale log bataate the "sangthan" jo har garmiyon/vasant ritu (jo abhaav) mein sthaaneey samudaay mein lautta hua sabse accha naagrik puraskrit vyakti hotlon mein utsuk darje dene ki peshkash karte huye daud lagaaya tha; ve shuruaat hi dete honge taaki agle charan tak nirnay liya ja sake aur fir antim vijeta ghoshit kiya jaaye. This news made everyone happy because these were all people from our community who had done something big or small that day.

- from investment advice to mortgage loans to insurance policies. ‡§è‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ-‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§•‡§ï ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ meeting client expectations left little room for anything but work. ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∂‡§æ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ç‡§ü ‡§ó‡§à, ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡•á personal turmoil, Ellie continued pushing herself harder every day. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§® ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§§‡•ã ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§¶‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∞‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•ã‡§°‡§º ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ One evening while working late at night, Ellie received news that one of her biggest accounts had lost everything they owned due to bad investments made on behalf of another broker. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ñ‡§¨‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§¶‡§π‡§≤‡§æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§® ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ú‡§®‡•ç‡§Æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡§¨‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ As tears streamed down her face, Ellie realized how much she missed having someone close to share these burdens with. ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§™‡§≤ and focus instead on building meaningful relationships through volunteering efforts within her community. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§ó‡§§ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç Generation 2: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Broker by profession and has to deal with the consequences of her actions.
---
elis ek 27 varsheey vyaapaari thi jo apne kaaryaalay mein khud ko vyast rakhta haih uske paas dastaavejon ke saath teji se daur karna aur fon ki ghanti bajti huyi sunni padta hi maaloom hoti thi. She had been working as an investment broker for four years now - it was all she knew how to do well. lekin fir yah sab achaanak badal gaya-ek chhoti si baat jiske liye use pata nahin ho saki ya samjha na ja sake.

Alice's company received a request from one of their clients: they wanted Alice to help them buy some stock shares on behalf of another client whose identity would remain confidential until after the transaction took place. elis ne turant sahmati de di; unhein laga ki ve kis taraf utrane vaale honge? The only problem was that this wasn't something any other employee could have done without being caught red handed. unhone socha ki agar cheejein galat tareeka leti gayeehonki parinaam tabhi niraashaadaayeegharenche aa sakengeh sharmindaagi! And then there were legal implications too which made matters even worse.

lekin ye donon graahkon ke beech gupt len-den poora huyeeh stok acchi tarah se prachaarit prateet hota tha (aur ab tak safal) aur har koyi santusht lag rahe the. So why did things go wrong later when everything seemed perfect at first glance?

yahaan antim charnon mein mudda utpann huaah alag-alag logon ke hiton ke sangharsh ubhre, adhoori riporting upabhokta suraksha niymon ka majaak ban gayi, aur mukdame darjanon laakh dolron ke jurmaane aur nuksaano ke roop mein sarvanaashakaaleenta ke star tak failte dikh rahe the. But what really set off events into motion was when someone discovered that Alice herself might not have acted 

Generation 3: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Broker by profession and lives alone.
---
ek baar ek mahila thi jiska naam saara haathadhaari tha jo apne jeevan mein sabse khoobasoorat cheejon ke baare mein jaanti theeh log aur unke sambandhon ka vyaapak gyaan rakhna! She had always been fascinated with how people interacted on both personal levels as well as professional ones - she loved to observe them closely while they went through their daily routines or made important decisions that would shape not only themselves but also those around them for years afterward. 

saamantha ne hamesha socha ki yah shiksha ya vyavsaay se adhik uski prishthabhoomi nahin ho saki-yah sirf use pata chala tha ki anya manushya kis taraf dekhenge, lekin unhone vaastav mein samjhe huye drishtikon ko praapt karte hi santushti paane lagin. This knowledge gave her an edge when it came time to make tough business calls, which often required getting inside someone's head without even knowing what was going on there at first glance. 

unka pesha brokar banenepoorn roop se safal niveshkon aur udyamiyon tak seemit najariyantranvaali sevaayeeyukt karana chaahaate the; ve doosron par poori tarah niyantrit karbante the taaki ve svacch nakdi la sakeeyein aur fir badle mein beechbaajri karbeete hon. Sarah enjoyed this lifestyle because of its independence from others and ability to control one's own destiny. 

vah ekal thin aur abhi bhi apni nauvin varshikalankar padonnati ke liye ladti thin, lekin tabtak unhein mukhyakaaryapaatra lakshyon ke alag-alag star mile the. Her parents died early, leaving behind no siblings nor anyone else close enough to look out for her welfare besides herself. saara avivaahit, akeli aur amoolya dosti ke bina rahin, ye teen gun jo unmein acche netraheenpan 

Generation 4: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Broker by profession.
---
saaraah ek safal vyavsaayi mahila thin jo unki kadi mehnat aur dridhta ke parinaamasvaroop bani thin. She had started her career as an intern at one of the top brokering firms and worked hard to climb up the ladder. unhone apne gyaan ka vistaar karna jaari rakhte huye prashikshuta se lekar sahaayak tak har star ko paar kiya jab ve antatah 30 saptaah baad farm chhod dengi. However, Sarah was not satisfied with just being assistant - she wanted more than that for herself. vah badlaavo ko dekh sake, adhikaariyon ne use najaraandaaj nahin kiya ya uske prayaason ko kam na samjha-vah vaastav mein staar ban gayeeh da brukalainds most promising braauzar! But how did it all happen? yah sab tab shuru hua jab unhone mukhyakaaryavaasiyo ke liye fon buk haath mod di. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§π‡§æ‡§¶‡•Å‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ She was always ready to fight for what she believed in and protect those around her at all costs. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§∏‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•Å‡§à‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∞‡•à‡§Ç‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§§‡•á‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§ï‡§™‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§® ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç‡•§ Sarah had seen many battles but nothing could have prepared her for the one that would change everything.

‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§µ‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡•ã‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ She grew up watching the soldiers marching through town with their uniforms proudly displayed on their chests, hearing stories from veterans that made them feel like they were part of something greater than themselves. ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§µ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡§§ ‡§π‡•à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∞‡•á‡§ú‡§ø‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç‡§ü ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡§™‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§® ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ‡•§ 

Sarah enlisted at age twenty-one after graduating high school and completing basic training. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§æ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§∞‡•à‡§Ç‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ö‡§¢‡§º ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ Sarah was not only physically strong but also mentally tough - she had learned how to think quickly under pressure, work well as an individual or within teams, and make quick decisions without hesitation. ‡§ê‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§à ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç "‡§Ö‡§∏‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•å‡§¶‡§æ" ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§®‡§æ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Her goal now was simply to keep pushing herself harder until one day when everyone would know exactly what it meant for someone to be called 'Captain'. 

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§∂‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§Å‡§ñ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ö‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§â‡§†‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ It felt surreal because all these years later, finally achieving this dream seemed unimaginable. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§π ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§π ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§≤ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§ï‡§≤‡•Ä, ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§¶‡•å‡§°‡§º ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§õ‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä, ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§®‡§à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•á‡§¶‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ The regimental commander pinned his new rank insignia onto Sarah's shoulders before he handed over command of the unit to her. 

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•à‡§™‡•ç‡§ü‡§® ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§Æ‡§æ‡§® ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä, ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§ö‡•á‡§π‡§∞‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§à ‡§¶‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Every soldier looked up to her with respect and admiration knowing just how much effort went into earning such recognition. ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§¨‡§π ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§â‡§†‡§®‡§æ, ‡§≤‡§Ç‡§¨‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§§‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§∏‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§∂‡§® ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§Ü‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ‡•§ But none of those things mattered anymore; being captain wasn't easy either, especially since many people didn't understand why women could hold leadership positions alongside men. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø, ‡§â‡§® ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§è ‡§ó‡§è ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶‡•á‡§π ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§≤‡•ã‡§ö‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç, ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≠‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Å‡§à‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ As time passed, more

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§è‡§ï ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ó‡§æ‡§Å‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Sarah was not like other girls her age as she had always been fascinated with the military and dreamed of becoming an army officer one day. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ-‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§ù‡§æ‡§µ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§§‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§ó ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ She knew that if there were any obstacles or challenges to overcome on this journey towards fulfilling her destiny, it would be worth every bit of effort put into achieving them.

‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§™‡§ü‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Whenever someone told her something couldn't be done because they didn't think so herself, Sarah believed otherwise. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§ó‡•É‡§π‡§®‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§∏‡•à‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§Ö‡§ï‡§æ‡§¶‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§§‡•ã ‡§µ‡•á ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç‡•§ With determination burning deep within her soul, Sarah enrolled at the Academy for Officer Candidates School , where she studied hard and trained rigorously under strict instructors until finally graduating from college.

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§à ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§∂‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§à ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡•à‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§§‡•à‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡•á‡•§ After months spent honing their skills both physically and mentally, Sarah and several others stood tall before Colonel Smith, Commander General Staff . ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§®‡§≤ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ø‡§• ‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§¶‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¨‡•ã‡§ß‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ, "‡§Ü‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§∞‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à? You have shown incredible dedication and commitment throughout your training." ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§ò‡•ã‡§∑‡§£‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä, "‡§Ø‡§π ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ü‡§™ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§Ü‡§§‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç, ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§†‡§ø‡§® ‡§™‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ü‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§æ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§" 

Sarah felt proud knowing how far she has come since childhood when all people around thought being brave wasn't possible. ‡§Ö‡§¨, ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•à‡§®‡§ø‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§π‡§æ‡§• ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ö ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§∏‡•à‡§®‡§ø‡§ï ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§à ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à!

‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She grew up on the outskirts of town and had an insatiable thirst for adventure that led her to join the army at 18 years old. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∂‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§∏‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ-‡§î‡§∞ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç‡•§ Sarah was known as one tough soldier - she could handle any challenge thrown her way with ease. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§∏‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§™‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§ø‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§â‡§§‡§®‡§æ ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ö‡§ï ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡§æ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ Her family did not approve of this decision but they respected it nonetheless. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§Ç‡§∂ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§∂‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•å‡§ü‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Despite all these challenges, Sarah never lost sight of what made being part of the military so fulfilling: The camaraderie amongst soldiers and serving your country were things worth fighting for.

‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ê‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ She was born and raised to be the best of her kind - an army officer. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ-‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§•‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡§§ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Lena had always been fascinated with military life since she could remember. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡•Å‡§¨‡§π ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§â‡§†‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§¨‡•à‡§ó ‡§™‡•à‡§ï ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§≤‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§∂‡§® ‡§Ü‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Her day started early as well because there were many things that needed attention before leaving for duty. ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§™‡§∏ ‡§® ‡§Ü ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡•§ After work, it felt like another world altogether when she would return home from training or missions where every moment counted towards their survival instincts. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•à‡§®‡§ø‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§® ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§™‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ It wasn't until one fateful night during a mission abroad, however, did everything change. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§¶‡•Å‡§∂‡•ç‡§Æ‡§® ‡§∏‡•à‡§®‡§ø‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§â‡§® ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ò‡§æ‡§§ ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§π‡§Æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ The situation became dire quickly as they outnumbered them significantly. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ó‡•ã‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡•å‡§õ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã‡§∂‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á, ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§ó ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ They had no choice but fight back against all odds and try not to let themselves down even if death came knocking at any doorstep. ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§æ‡§à ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§≤‡§Ç‡§¨‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡§ï ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•à‡§®‡§ø‡§ï ‡§è‡§ï‡§ú‡•Å‡§ü ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§è ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•Å‡§∂‡•ç‡§Æ‡§® ‡§¨‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ä‡§õ‡•á ‡§π‡§ü‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ As soon as they returned safely to base camp, Lena knew this experience will stay etched forever on her mind. ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§ú ‡§§‡§ï, ‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶ than hate and warfare.

‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡•Ä ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡•à‡§®‡§ø‡§ï ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Ever since she was young, she had been fascinated with all things military-related - from watching movies like "The Hurt Locker" or reading books on war tactics to learning how soldiers live their daily lives while serving our country overseas. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ó‡•É‡§π ‡§®‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ 

As Sophie packed up everything that would be needed during boot camp training at Fort Bragg in North Carolina, she felt both excited and nervous. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Å ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ But as soon as she arrived there, it hit her hard: this wasn't just another job; this meant becoming part of something much bigger than herself. 

‡§¨‡•Ç‡§ü ‡§∂‡§ø‡§µ‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§§‡•Ä‡§µ‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡§º‡•Ä ‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•à‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§ö‡§≤‡§®‡§æ, ‡§∂‡•Ç‡§ü‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß ‡§§‡§ï‡§®‡•Ä‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§®‡§æ‡•§ She also met other women who shared similar dreams but were facing different challenges due to gender stereotypes within certain branches of service such as infantry units where men outnumber females significantly . ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§á‡§® ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶, ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ They became close friends despite having little in common outside of being new recruits into an elite group whose primary purpose involved defending America against any external threats that might arise worldwide. 

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§¨‡•Ç‡§ü ‡§ï‡•à‡§Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§à, ‡§®‡§è ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§¶‡•á‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ However, when she returned back home after months away from family members whom she loved dearly, life took its course once again. ‡§ú‡§¨‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§π‡§æ‡§¶‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§Ç‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç, ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§™‡§π‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§™‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§∑ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§æ‡§à ‡§≤‡§°‡§º ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à? Despite these doubts lingering around them throughout those days before deployment , Sophie remained focused on what mattered most which was protecting freedom across sectors regardless if you are male or female alike! 

‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§Æ‡§π‡•Ä‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§¶‡•á‡§∂ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§§‡•à‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§ú‡§π‡§æÔøΩÔøΩ 

Generation 7: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Soldier by profession and has to face the war.
---
lori ek peshevar sainik thi aur apne desh ke liye ladna pasand karti hai jis par uska bharosa kiya jaata hoon. She had been serving her country for years now but this time it was different as she faced an enemy that seemed impossible to defeat. lambe samay tak chal rahi yuddh mein sabse mahatvapoorn sthaan ko surakshit karke unhein naagriko ka vishvaas mila jo gambheer roop se prabhaavit huye the. The place was known only as "The Crossing" where thousands of innocent people were being brutally massacred daily without any proper reason or justification. 

krosing duniya ke do pratidvandvi gutoh da yoonaayited kingdam end amerika (yookeye) naamak shaktishaali sanghon ne pakad liya tha. They both wanted control over every aspect possible: land, resources, water etcetera. lekin ve donon hi nirdosh logon ya jeevnon ka balidaan nahin de sakte the taaki unhone poore manushya-samarthak saajhedaar netritva vaale vyavastha praapt ki. It'd be like fighting against yourself! lori hamesha sahmat hoti thin; agar ham peechhe hatte hain, to narabhakshaari banenge aur fir badle mein adhimaani honge? That would never happen if we stood up together with our strength & unity.

ek din, sayukt hathiyoraganjron ne antim javaabi abhineta ke paas dera daalaah 'da red ribel'. Their leader was called General Liang , he believed his cause was rightful and righteous - all they needed from their enemies was respect not slaughter. janral laayeeng ne socha ki yadi use kamjor lakdi todni chaahiye, to baadal uthengeh briten/ameriki morche ko nasht kar diya. And then when victory comes knock at your door, you will see them bow down before you."

lairi ko turant ehsaas hua

Generation 1: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is professional wrestler by profession.
---
emili ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡•á‡§µ‡§∞ ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡§µ‡§æ‡§® ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Growing up with two brothers and watching them practice their moves had sparked her interest at an early age. ‡§è‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Å‡§∂‡•ç‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•å‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§≠‡§æ‡§à ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§æ‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡§§ ‡§π‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ She loved the feeling of being on top as she pinned down her opponents. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ß‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ Instead, Emily focused all of her energy into training to become one of the best coaches around. 10 ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ó‡§π‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§´‡§≤ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§à ‡§ö‡•à‡§Ç‡§™‡§ø‡§Ø‡§®‡§∂‡§ø‡§™ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§§‡•Ä‡•§ It was then that Emily realized it wasn't just enough for herself; she wanted more out of life than simply coaching others. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ-‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡•á‡§µ‡§∞ ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡§µ‡§æ‡§® ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ‡•§

Emily trained tirelessly day after night until finally, when everything seemed perfect - she made her debut match against another aspiring pro-wrestling champion. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§ú‡•Ä‡§Ç, ‡§è‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§≠‡•Ä‡§°‡§º ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§®‡§ú‡§º‡§∞ ‡§°‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§ï ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ The adrenaline rush coursing through her veins kept her calm even though there were moments where things didn't go according to plan. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ï‡§∞, ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡•Ä, ‡§≠‡§≤‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§ï‡§°‡§º ‡§§‡•ã‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡•Ä‡§ö‡•á ‡§´‡•á‡§Ç‡§ï‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¨ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡•§ Finally, Emma emerged victorious from this first bout, earning respect among those present. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ö‡•à‡§Ç‡§™‡§ø‡§Ø‡§® ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§à ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç, ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§•‡•á‡•§ Her family cheered loudly while friends congratulated her online. ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§≠‡§µ ‡§®‡•á ‡§è‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§, ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§£ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§ü‡•Ç‡§ü ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§¨‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§§‡§æ ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§µ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡•á ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡•§ 

Generation 2: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is professional wrestler by profession.
---
saara ek peshevar pahalvaan thin jo apne kaushal aur dridh sankalp ke liye jaani jaati hain. She had been training since she was 10 years old and it showed with her impressive resume of victories over some the toughest opponents out there. saath hi unhone maansik roop se bhi prashikshit kiya tha taaki unhein vibhaajankaari dar ka anubhav na ho ya jab ve ring mein hoti to manobhrasht hone vaali sthitiyon ko rok sakein. Sarah's dedication paid off as she became one of the most sought-after women in pro wrestling today.

apni uchchatam upalabdhi par garva karte huye, saara ne da alteemet chaimpiyan naamak mukhyadhaara ke prachaar mein shuruaat ki. It wasn't long before she gained attention for being able to take down even their biggest names on any given night without breaking sweat or showing signs that something might be wrong. lekin yahaan tak ki sabse badi jeet chunautiyon nahin rahin. There were times when fans would boo at her entrance because they didn't like how she looked - too muscular or not feminine enough according to them. fir doosron ne uski nirantar utkrishtata par avishvasaneeyta vyakt karna band kar diya aur use sarvakaalik pasandeeda ban gaya!

whether through experimenting or exploring different techniques, mediums, and subjects which all contributed towards making her paintings even more stunning than before. ‡§è‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§≠‡§µ ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§® ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Ç‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∂‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§á‡§∂‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡•à‡§¶ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Her dedication to craftsmanship and perfectionism meant that each piece came together seamlessly as if they were one single entity expressing beauty beyond measure.

‡§ï‡•à‡§•‡§∞‡•Ä‡§® ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ From the time she was little, her fingers were always busy sketching or painting something new every day. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ-‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§π‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She attended college to study fine art where she learned everything from traditional techniques of oil paintings to modern digital design tools that allowed for more creativity than ever before. ‡§ï‡•à‡§•‡§∞‡•Ä‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Ç‡§†‡•Ä ‡§∂‡•à‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ú‡§ó‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∞‡§Ç‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§ï ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§è ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ Her talent had given rise to an exceptional career as one of the most celebrated contemporary artists globally. ‡§ê‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§â‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§á‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡•§ One fateful night changed all this when Catherine received news which would change not only her life but also everyone around her forever - she had been diagnosed with stage four breast cancer.

‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§¨‡§∏ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ‡•§ The joyous moments became somber ones while laughter turned into tears. ‡§ï‡•à‡§Ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ñ‡§¨‡§∞ ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞‡§µ‡§æ‡§π ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§¨‡§ø‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§æ‡§à‡•§ But instead of succumbing to despair, Kathryn decided to fight back against it head on. ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§µ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§â‡§§‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ Every brushstroke felt like a small victory over what could have easily taken away so much. ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä, ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§§ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™ ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ö‡§ï‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§Ü‡§∂‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§´‡•à‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§è‡•§ People started coming up to her after each exhibition saying how they loved seeing her work because now more than anything else, people saw hope through them.

‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§ï‡•à‡§•‡§∞‡§ø‡§® ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Even though chemotherapy treatments left her feeling weak at times, she continued working hard to create beautiful pieces that brought happiness wherever they went. ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§®‡§à ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≠‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∑‡•ç‡§† ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ And even during those challenges, there remained beauty in their imperfections. ‡§á‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§® ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§™‡§ü‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶ ‡§™‡•á‡§Ç‡§ü‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§à, ‡§≠‡§≤‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§§‡§≤‡§¨ ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§¨‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ü‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ‡•§ 

Generation 5: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is painter by profession.
---
‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡•Å‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Sarah was an artist and she loved painting with all her heart. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Å‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ She had grown up surrounded by art from the time when they were born until now - every day spent admiring beautiful paintings at museums or galleries around town. ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ó‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§∏-‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ö‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ However, as much as she enjoyed creating something new each day, it wasn't enough for her to live on just that alone. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§¶‡•á ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á! 

Generation 6: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is painter by profession.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had been painting since she was little and her talent grew with each passing day. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ-‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§π‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Ø‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ò‡§ø‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ö‡§ï‡§ø‡§§ ‡§•‡•á‡•§ 

Sarah's passion for art led to an obsession that consumed every waking moment of hers. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•à‡§®‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡§≤‡§æ‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§ï‡•É‡§§‡§ø ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§ Her dedication paid off as Sarah soon became one of the most sought after artists around town. ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ö‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§∏‡•Å‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§¶‡•É‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§∂‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡•É‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•Å‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§

One fateful evening while walking through Central Park, Sarah came across something truly magical - a group of dancers performing underneath the stars on a clear night. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡•É‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§®‡§Æ‡•ã‡§π‡§ï ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§á‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ó‡•ç‡§ß ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§™‡•á‡§Ç‡§ü‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•Ä‡•§ The dancing figures were graceful yet powerful, capturing everything from their movements to their expressions. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ü‡•Å‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§≠‡•Ç‡§≤‡•á‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§

As time passed, more opportunities arose for Sarah to create masterpieces. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡§ø‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§ø ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à, ‡§µ‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§µ‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§§‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ People began recognizing her everywhere they went, wanting autographs or asking questions just so they could brag at parties later. ‡§á‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§•‡§ï ‡§ó‡§à, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§∏‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü‡•§ It wasn't until she met someone new named Jack that things started changing again. ‡§ú‡•à‡§ï ‡§¶‡§Ø‡§æ‡§≤‡•Å ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ù‡§¶‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ He encouraged her not only to keep going but also helped bring back some balance into her life.

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§®, ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á‡§Ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡§≤ ‡§™‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§≤‡•å‡§ü‡§§‡•Ä ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§π ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Despite this saddening news, it gave Sarah inspiration to paint another piece. ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞, ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ü‡§π‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç, ‡§™‡§ø‡§ï‡§®‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ñ‡•á‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§∞‡•ã‡§ú‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§§‡§ø‡§µ‡§ø‡§ß‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡•à‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡§æ‡•§ This series would become known throughout New York City for its beauty and emotional connection between people.

‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø 

Generation 7: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is painter by profession.
---
ek baar ki baat hai, ek sundar mahila ke naam par jo apne peshe se chitrakaari karti thi aur uski prasiddhi deshon mein fail gayi jahaan vah nahin jaanti ya gyaat hoti agar yah unke liye na hota to use pata hi nahin padta! Her name was Maria and she had been painting since the age of seven when her parents bought an old wooden box with brushes that belonged to their great-grandmother which they found while cleaning out some boxes at home one day after school. 
maariya ko pent karna pasand ho gaya lekin unhone shuru mein abhibhoot paaye jaane vaale rangon ka upyog karte huye sachet roop se kalpanaaon ko taiyaar karna seekhkar duniya mein pravesh kiya, fir ve adhik sahaj ho raha tha aur antim utpaad ne poori tarah se nishchit jeevan diya, har cheej ka vivran vyaktigat utsav ban gaya. She started drawing landscapes on paper but soon realized how much more expressive it could be if done through paintings instead - thus began her journey as an artist. 
unhein sabse accha tab laga jab log dekhenge ki unke saathiyon ki nazron mein maujood sthalamandal keval saral rekhaayen thin; sookshmadarshi ke dauraan unmein badlaavo ko samjhate huye chamakdaar varnakon aur parishuddhta ke star tak vistaarit kiya gaya taaki darshak avashoshankaari drishyon ko spasht roop se pakdate hon. People would come from all over town just for them to admire or even purchase pieces directly off the wall without any needless intermediaries between themselves & artwork's creator. 
lekin ye donon svargadoot gunvaalaapan se mukt theeh mairiyo ko lagbhag teji se doosre charnon mein laagu kiya gaya tha, aur romaanchakaari saf
