‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§•‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She was born into the world of warriors and had been training since she could walk. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§æ‡§¶‡§æ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ó‡•ç‡§ó‡§ú ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡§ó‡§ø‡§®‡§§ ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§æ‡§á‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Samantha's family believed that being strong physically meant having power over others. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ 

Samantha grew up learning how to use weapons like swords, bows and arrows, spears, axes, shields, etc., all while honing her physical abilities through rigorous daily exercises. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§§‡§ø‡§∂‡•Ä‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§¶‡•å‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ Her parents taught her self-defense techniques as well so if someone ever attacked or threatened them they would be able to defend themselves without any hesitation. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§•‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§∏‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§æ‡§® ‡§∂‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ As soon as she turned sixteen years old, she joined an elite group where only those with exceptional skills were accepted. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§π ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§∂‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§è ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§´‡•à‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ They are known for their unwavering loyalty towards each other which makes it easier when facing off against enemies.

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§¨‡•Ä‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ñ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§´ ‡§π‡§Æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§à ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ The enemy wanted nothing more than complete control over this small village. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§Æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ, ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡§∞‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ However, there wasn't enough time before nightfall because then the attackers would have no trouble getting close to the villagers. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡•ç‡§• ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§§‡•á‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•á‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡•á‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ With determination etched on every line of her face, she charged forward ready to fight until victory came at last.

‡§â‡§∏ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§ ‡§ó‡§æ‡§Å‡§µ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§§‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§¶‡•Å‡§∂‡•ç‡§Æ‡§® ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§§‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§à ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ When he finally arrived, his army consisted of many men armed with sharp knives, guns, explosive devices, tanks, and helicopters. ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§§‡•ã ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•á ‡§¨‡§π‡§æ‡§¶‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡•á‡•§ At first, things looked bleak but slowly and steadily the battle began shifting in favor of the defenders. 

Generation 2: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Warriorby profession and has to fight against the evil forces.
---
‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§∂ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§è‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ She was skilled with her sword and had an unwavering determination that could not be shaken by any adversity or obstacle she faced. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ç‡§Æ‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡•Å‡§∞‡§æ‡§à ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§π‡§Æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã‡§∂‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ 

One day while out on patrol alone, Eliya came across some bandits trying to rob innocent villagers of their belongings. ‡§¨‡§ø‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡§ø‡§ö‡§ï‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ü ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§°‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§® ‡§¨‡§¶‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∂‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∞‡•ã‡§ï‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§π‡§æ‡§•‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§£‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§µ‡§æ‡§™‡§∏ ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∑‡•ç‡§† ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ After successfully defeating them all, they fled back into the forest leaving behind nothing but fearful whispers as they went away from sight.

‡§è‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§ò‡§ü‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ç‡§≠‡•Ä‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Å‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§™‡§æ‡§à ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Soon after this encounter, rumors began spreading around town saying there were more dangerous criminals hiding within its borders waiting for another chance at plundering lives. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è, ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§§‡•à‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡§§‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§è‡•§

As time passed, Elia's reputation grew larger than ever before due to how well-equipped and prepared she always seemed when it comes down to fighting off bad guys. ‡§ï‡§à ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§§‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡§ï ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•á ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§è ‡§•‡•á‡•§ They would come up to her requesting help because no one else dared challenge those menacing individuals anymore.

‡§á‡§∏ ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§ö, ‡§¶‡•Å‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ó‡§è ‡§®‡•Å‡§ï‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§®‡•á ‡§∂‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ Many people lost everything important like food, shelter, family members, etc., which led to despair among many others. ‡§è‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§ú‡§∞‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§¶‡§æ‡§ú ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§π‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Therefore, without hesitation, she decided to take action immediately.

‡§Ö‡§ó‡§≤‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§®, ‡§è‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•á‡§≤‡•á ‡§ú‡§Ç‡§ó‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§ß‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡•á‡§§ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ As luck might have it, just then, two robbers appeared right ahead of where she stood. ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§π‡§•‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§•‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï

‡§ú‡•á‡§∏‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ She grew up watching her father and uncles hunt down dangerous criminals with their sharp skills of martial arts. ‡§ú‡•á‡§∏‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∂‡•á‡§ï‡§¶‡§Æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§§ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ 

As she got older, Jessica started training herself every day after school to improve on the techniques that had been passed onto her from generation by generations before hers. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡§ú‡§¨‡•Ç‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§è ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç-‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§∏‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ü‡•ã‡§®‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§ö‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•ã‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ 

Jessica's parents were proud but concerned for what would happen when it was time to join them as warriors. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ, ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡•É‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§ø ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Everyone around noticed how strong and confident she became - they all knew there wasn't anyone else like her out here!

‡§è‡§ï ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§ ‡§¶‡•á‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ñ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á, ‡§ú‡•á‡§∏‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Å‡§ö ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§á‡§Ç‡§§‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ They looked at each other nervously as if something bad might be happening soon... ‡§Ö‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡§ï, ‡§¨‡§æ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§∂‡•ã‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§ö‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•á‡•§ It sounded like someone or some animal trying hard enough to break into the house through its walls. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ñ‡§§‡§∞‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à, ‡§ú‡•á‡§∏‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§π‡§∞‡§ï‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü ‡§ó‡§à‡•§ The next thing we know, three armed men stormed inside looking desperately for whatever valuable items could have possibly stolen. ‡§ú‡•á‡§∏‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§§‡•à‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ñ‡§∞‡§æ‡§¨ ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡•ã ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§¨‡§ö‡§æ‡§µ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§ As one man tried to take over the kitchen where everyone gathered together during this situation, another two followed him towards the living room area while taking aim behind them with guns drawn ready to fire. ‡§ú‡•á‡§∏‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∞‡§£‡§®‡•Ä‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∞‡•ã‡§ï‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã‡§∂‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§æ‡§à ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡§æ‡§Ø‡§¶‡§æ ‡§â‡§†‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ One of these tactics involved using his body weight against Jessica which caused her back pain due to being too weakened already so he couldn't do anything further than just try to punch her once more without any success. ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§ß‡•Ä ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§è, ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§´‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§è, ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§∂ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§µ‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ She was known for her bravery and strength as she fought to protect the land from evil forces that threatened it every day. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§≠‡§≤‡§æ‡§à ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§

Warrior had been trained since childhood by some of the most skilled warriors around. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Å‡§∂‡•ç‡§Æ‡§® ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§§ ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•á ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ Her weapons were sharp and deadly - swords with blades so fine they could cut through anything like butter on bread. ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§µ‡§ö ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ-‡§ß‡§æ‡§§‡•Å ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§ü ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ú‡•á‡§Ø ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ It seemed almost impossible not only because of its weight but also due to how difficult training made him look like he's invincible too!

‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡•Ä‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ç‡§Æ‡§ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§á‡§Ç‡§ö ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ñ‡§§‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ñ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§´ ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§æ‡§à ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡•Ä‡•§ Every time an enemy came close enough to threaten their existence, she would rise up against them fiercely determined never to let down those under his care or herself. 

‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§â‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§°‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§® ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ They knew if anyone else dared challenge them then there wouldn't be any other choice than fighting back without hesitation. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§ñ‡§§‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§°‡§º ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§ñ‡§§‡§∞‡§æ ‡§™‡•à‡§¶‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§§‡•ã ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã‡§ñ‡§ø‡§Æ ‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Ø‡§ï ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ 

Generation 5: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Warriorby profession.
---
saara ke liye yah ek saamaanya din tha jab tak ki usne apni khidki se baahar dekha aur use pata chala ki vahaan koyi nahin hai jo shivir mein rahta ho-sivaay unke naam par savaari karte huye ghudasvaaro dvaara bachchon ka peechha karna jaise hi ve gujar gaye the. As she watched them leave with their horses and belongings on backpacks or strapped to pack animals, her heart began racing as it dawned upon her that they had been taken by bandits. 

uska dil dar maarta hua tha lekin agyaat sthitiyon se niptane vaali ladkon ki teem ka hissa ban gayeeh daaku! They were known for being ruthless killers whose only goal was wealth - whether through robberies or kidnapping young women like Sarah's friends from nearby villages so they could sell them off into slavery. unhone samudaay par hamla tabhi kamjor kiya jab log surakshit roop se ikatthe honge taaki adhik lootpaati jeevit na rahein ya anjaam diye ja sakein. But this time things might be different because there would not have enough men around if all of these girls went missing at once without any trace left behind...and what better way than having someone brave enough within reach?

isliye agli subah, sarvashreshth upalabdh hathiyaaron sahit sabse acche kapdon ke tukde praapt karne ke turant baad, paani lene ke liye sadak ke neeche nikal padta haih har cheej ko poori tarah se vyavasthaapitaakaathor prateeksha ki avdhi hotu odaavra gaadiyo aa ekar graameen ilaaokhoji maujood naakhuncha‚Äô jakhar achhi. She knew exactly where he should go next: towards the mountainside village which lay just beyond those hillsides covered entirely under dense foliage . 

prakriti abhiboot lagti thin; ped uchi aur majboot badh rahe the, pakshiy 

Generation 6: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Warriorby profession.
---
‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ê‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§π‡§ø‡§Ç‡§∏‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§Æ ‡§•‡•Ä, ‡§è‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ She was born into an ancient tribe of warriors and had been trained from birth to be the best fighter she could possibly become. ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡§ó‡§ø‡§®‡§§ ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§æ‡§á‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§æ‡§à ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡•Ä, ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§®‡•Ä‡§ö‡•á ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ‡•§ Alice's bravery earned her respect among both men and women alike - but it also made enemies that would stop at nothing when they wanted something from her or anyone else for their own gain.

‡§è‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ-‡§µ‡§π ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•å‡§® ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§∂‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Å ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§§‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§á‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•á‡§Æ‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ But one day as she went on patrol with some fellow soldiers, they were ambushed by enemy forces led by a powerful sorcerer named Zoran. ‡§ú‡§º‡•ã‡§∞‡§æ‡§® ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§Æ‡§ú‡•ã‡§∞ ‡§π‡•à ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ú‡§Ø‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§ó‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ó‡§è ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§ò‡§æ‡§§‡§ï ‡§•‡•á‡•§ The battle raged all around them until finally, Alice found herself face-to-face with Zoran himself.

‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§Å‡§ñ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä‡§Ç, ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§§ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§®‡§ú‡§º‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ Then without warning, Zoran struck out his hand towards Alice. ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§π‡§æ‡§• ‡§π‡§µ‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§°‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§Ö‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡§ï ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ú‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§® ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§ß‡•Ç‡§≤ ‡§â‡§°‡§º ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ñ‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Everyone looked up in shocked silence except for Alice, whose eyes never left hers even though he continued speaking: "You have proven yourself worthy opponent," said Zoran smiling wickedly underneath his bushy eyebrows."‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ù‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ü‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ù‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§∞ ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Ç! Let us duel!"

‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ö‡•á‡§π‡§∞‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§à ‡§¶‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§è‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§™‡•Ä‡§õ‡•á ‡§π‡§ü ‡§ó‡§à, ‡§ú‡§º‡•ã‡§∞‡§® ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Å‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡•§ He raised his hands high above him before striking downward onto the ground where two identical swords appeared out of thin air beside each other like mirror images. ‡§§‡§≤‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ö‡§Æ‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Å ‡§§‡•á‡§ú ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç, ‡§ú‡§¨‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ú‡§º‡•ã‡§∞‡§æ‡§® ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡§§‡§æ 

Generation 7: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is Warriorby profession.
---
‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ó‡§æ‡§Å‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ There lived an exceptional woman named Sara - the embodiment of strength and courage. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡§®‡•ç‡§Æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡§æ‡§≤‡§®-‡§™‡•ã‡§∑‡§£ ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß ‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ä‡§¢‡§º‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§Ü ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ She was trained from childhood to become one with her body through martial arts techniques that had been passed down for centuries. 

‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§•‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Å‡§ö ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§ Her masters were impressed by how quickly she picked up new moves and incorporated them into her repertoire without hesitation or doubt. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ, ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§∏‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§§ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§∏‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ 

Soon enough, word spread around town regarding this young warrioress' talent as no other could match it. ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§ø‡§§ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§ï ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§æ‡§à ‡§ü‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç‡§ü‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ü‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ However, despite being only eighteen years old at the time, Sarah always declined their invitations because they did not meet her standards. 

‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§à ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§æ‡§á‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Å ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ö‡•Å‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§®‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∑‡•ç‡§† ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä‡•§ They all knew better than to underestimate someone like her. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§¨‡§§‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ß‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§§‡•à‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§® ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡•§ But soon after winning yet another battle tournament against some skilled fighters, people started taking notice of her. ‡§∂‡§π‡§∞ ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡§ø‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§â‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§§‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡•á‡•§ Some even wanted to challenge her just so they can test themselves against such skillful opponent. 

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§§‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ï‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§®‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She never boasted nor showed off any arrogance towards those who came seeking her help. ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§ú‡§æ‡§Ø, ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§â‡§® ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡•á ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§∂‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§π‡•ã ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§∏‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ü ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•Ä‡§°‡§º‡§ø‡§§ ‡§™‡§°‡§º ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡•§ People would come back later on thanking her profusely while also sharing stories wherein she helped others overcome obstacles beyond what anyone else thought possible. 

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡•á ‡§ó‡§è, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ The village needed more champions but now there wasn't much left for him to teach anymore. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ 

Prompt: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is receptionist by profession

Generation 1: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is receptionist by profession and has to face several challenges while working at the office.
---
‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡•Ä ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∞‡§ø‡§∏‡•á‡§™‡•ç‡§∂‡§®‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She loved meeting new people every day, greeting them with her warm smile, and helping them find their way around the building or get connected on any project they were involved in. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§à ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§ó-‡§Ö‡§≤‡§ó ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§™‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∞‡•Ä‡§∏‡•á‡§™‡•ç‡§∂‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§ï ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Ç‡§†‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§™‡§ü‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ Sophie's latest challenge was going through an intense training period for two weeks before she started work as a full-time employee of XYZ Company where everyone knew that it would be tough but exciting too.

‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§ß‡§ø ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§´‡§æ‡§Ø‡§¶‡•á‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§à‡•§ It taught Sofia how to handle different situations like dealing with angry customers, handling difficult colleagues, managing multiple projects simultaneously and more importantly learning professionalism from senior employees which helped her become confident enough when facing these types of scenarios later during her job tenure. ‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡§º‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§∞‡§π‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ï ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡§π‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§Ö‡§∏‡§π‡§Æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§§‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§è ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§µ‡§æ‡§¨ ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§≤‡§§‡§´‡§π‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ü‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§

Sophie had never imagined herself being so busy all throughout those days. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•á‡§¶‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§´‡•ã‡§® ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤ ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡§æ, ‡§à‡§Æ‡•á‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ, ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§≤‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§§‡•á‡§Ç ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§¶‡§ø ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•à‡§®‡§ø‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§®‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§à ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ However, despite this hectic schedule, there are moments where Sophie gets time off after hours to relax and recharge herself. ‡§Ø‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§â‡§® ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§§‡§®‡§æ‡§µ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§§ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§§‡§∞‡•ã‡§§‡§æ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§≠‡§µ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ Moreover, Sophie found solace in taking breaks outside whenever possible - whether it meant walking downstairs for some fresh air or enjoying nature amidst greenery nearby. ‡§á‡§® ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•á ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§ï ‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∞‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ú ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§∏‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø ‡§Æ‡§ú‡§¨‡•Ç‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§à‡•§

‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡•Ä ‡§®‡•á ‡§∞‡§ø‡§∏‡•á‡§™‡•ç‡§∂‡§®‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§∏‡•ã‡§ö‡§æ‡•§ She had always wanted to be part of something bigger than herself and this job gave her the opportunity she needed. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§≤‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§®‡§ø‡§ï‡§≤‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ö‡•á‡§π‡§∞‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§æ‡§® ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§à ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§ó‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ But on that one fateful day‚Ä¶ 

‡§è‡§ï ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ï ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡§º‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ö‡§ï‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§æ‡§ú‡§º ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ Sophie was taken aback but couldn't help smiling back at him as he continued speaking with his soft voice which seemed to melt away all worries from her mind. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§‡§ö‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•á, ‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§Ü‡§¶‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø ‡§Ü‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ-‡§ú‡•â‡§® ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ‡•§ He was tall and lean yet powerful looking man whose blue eyes sparkled like diamonds when they met hers.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§ú‡•â‡§® ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§´‡•ã‡§® ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§à‡§Æ‡•á‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ü‡§§‡•á ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡•§ However, Sophie could feel their connection growing stronger every time John walked past or spoke over the phone line. ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞, ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§ú‡•â‡§® ‡§Ö‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡§ï ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§à ‡§Æ‡•á‡§ú ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§¨‡•à‡§† ‡§ó‡§è ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§á‡§Ç‡§§‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ They talked for hours without realizing how much time passed until it became dark outside.

‡§â‡§∏ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§§ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§∏‡•ã‡§´‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ß‡§°‡§º‡§ï‡§® ‡§§‡•á‡§ú ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ó ‡§¶‡•å‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§¨‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Å‡§à ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ As soon as she closed her eyes, images flashed before them - memories of conversations shared between each other while sitting next to an open window watching fireflies dance around in the night sky above. ‡§â‡§® ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ç‡§∏‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ß‡•Ä‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç‡•§ The warmth spread throughout both bodies making everything seem perfect even though neither knew what would come tomorrow. 

Generation 5: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is receptionist by profession.

As she worked tirelessly day after day, Sarah found herself growing more comfortable than ever before: not only did this job allow her ample time away from home but also gave her a sense of purpose which made all those long hours worthwhile when put into perspective. uski jeevan shaili poori tarah se alag lag gayeeh use lagaataar logon ke mood padhein aur kol traik karte huye dekhkar garva milta hai, har din nirantrata sunishchit hoti hai. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§∏‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§®‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•ã‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ She had worked as the receptionist at her company for over five years now and knew every employee's name like it was second nature to them. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§ó‡§Ç‡§≠‡•Ä‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§®‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∞‡§ø‡§∏‡•á‡§™‡•ç‡§∂‡§® ‡§°‡•á‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§™‡§Ç‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à-‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ï ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§§‡•ã ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§ó‡§Ç‡§§‡•Å‡§ï‡•§ 

One day while she sat behind her desk doing paperwork, Sarah heard footsteps approaching from outside of the office building. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§∞‡§µ‡§æ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§≤‡§æ, ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§®‡§è ‡§ö‡•á‡§π‡§∞‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§ö‡§Ø ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡•ã‡§ö ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ The newcomer seemed nervous but also eager to make an impression on his first day with such enthusiasm that he could barely contain himself. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ú‡•ã‡§∂‡•Ä ‡§≠‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§æ‡§® ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§ø‡§Ç‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•Ä‡•§ "Hello there," said Sarah warmly before extending out one hand towards him. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ì‡§∞ ‡§π‡§æ‡§• ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡•Å‡§∞‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ, "‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•â‡§® ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Å", ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡•á‡•§ John looked around the room admiring its simplicity yet elegance when suddenly something caught his eye - a beautiful bouquet of flowers sitting right next to the doorway entrance. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§ó‡§§‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§´‡•Ç‡§≤‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ó‡•Å‡§≤‡§¶‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à? What kind of place would have someone so thoughtful be working here anyway?"

‡§ú‡•â‡§® ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§∏‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡•á‡§∂‡§æ‡§® ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ù ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ As they chatted more closely together, John learned how much effort went into maintaining this little corner of paradise where everyone felt welcome all year long regardless if it were Christmas or July Fourth holiday season. ‡§á‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Ü‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ú‡§®‡§ï ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§ï ‡§´‡•Ç‡§≤‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§ó‡§§ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶‡•á‡§∂ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§° ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§® ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•å‡§® ‡§∏‡§æ ‡§™‡•å‡§ß‡§æ ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§≠‡•á‡§ú‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡•§ It made their workplace feel special and unique which couldn't help but put smiles upon people faces knowing just why each flower has been chosen specifically for them.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á-‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§™‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§π ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§§‡§§‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§π‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§ö ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß ‡§Æ‡§ú‡§¨‡•Ç‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•á ‡§ó‡§è‡•§ They found themselves sharing stories during lunch breaks discussing everything under the sun including family life experiences, hobbies &

---
As a professional working as a receptionist at XYZ Corporation, I always strive to maintain good relationships within my workplace. ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ù‡•á ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•á‡§¶‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§∞‡§ñ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ One particular incident had left me feeling frustrated and disappointed for quite some time now.

‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§§‡§¨ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§∞‡•á ‡§¨‡•â‡§∏ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§¶‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•â‡§®‡§∏‡§® ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§´‡•ã‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ Mr Johnson was known among our colleagues because of his arrogant nature which often led him into trouble during meetings. ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§® ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§Ö‡§™‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§•‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§π‡§Æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§à‡§Æ‡•á‡§≤ ‡§≠‡•á‡§ú‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§™‡§∞‡•á‡§∂‡§æ‡§® ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ My boss asked if he could speak directly to someone from HR department regarding this issue so we connected them on call. ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡§∞ ‡§ú‡•â‡§®‡•ç‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡§® ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•â‡§≤ ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§á‡§®‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ó‡•Å‡§∏‡•ç‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§≤‡•à‡§™‡§ü‡•â‡§™ ‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§Æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º ‡§¶‡§ø‡§è‡•§ This caused an uproar amongst all employees present there since nobody wanted such behavior being displayed towards us.

As I walked down the winding path towards Mrs. Johnson's house, my heart raced at what awaited me inside her home. ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•â‡§®‡§∏‡§® ‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§ø‡§õ‡§≤‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡•Ä‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§§‡§ø ‡§è‡§°‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§° ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•É‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•Å ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ó ‡§ñ‡•ã ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§∂‡§∞‡§æ‡§¨ ‡§™‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ She had become increasingly agitated over time as she struggled to come terms with his death but now, things were spiraling out of control. ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ù‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡•å‡§Ç‡§™‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ; ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§®‡•ã‡§µ‡•à‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§æ‡§®‡§ø‡§ï ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Å ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§∞‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§¶‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§§‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•ã‡§ó‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§á‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§≠‡§µ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ This was going to be challenging because depression can manifest itself differently from patient to patient depending on their circumstances or history which made diagnosis more difficult for therapists like myself. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§¢‡§º‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ö‡§¢‡§º‡§æ, ‡§Æ‡•á‡§∞‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§¶‡•å‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§¶‡§∞‡§µ‡§æ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§≤‡§æ ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ñ‡§ø‡§°‡§º‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ It felt eerie that no lights could be seen anywhere despite being daytime outside. ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§µ‡§ß‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§ï ‡§¶‡§∞‡§µ‡§æ‡§ú‡•á ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§≤‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§¶‡§Æ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ‡•§ There wasn't any sign of life except some flies buzzing around incessantly until they stopped suddenly when I entered. ‡§π‡§µ‡§æ ‡§†‡§Ç‡§°‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ó‡§Ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§¶‡§¨‡•Ç ‡§Ü ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§®‡§æ‡§ï ‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•Ä‡•§ My first instinct told me not to enter this place alone so I called Mr. Jones, another colleague of mine who specialized in geriatrics, asking him if he wanted to join me since we both needed someone else besides ourselves to keep us company during our sessions with Mrs. Johnson. ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã‡§®‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§∏‡§π‡§Æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§è ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§π‡§Æ ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§™‡§π‡•ÅÔøΩÔøΩ 

Generation 5: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is psychologist by profession and has to deal with the trauma of her own childhood.

ek bachche ke roop mein jooliya ko apne maata-pita ki kathor dekhbhaal aur anushaasan ka saamna karna pada tha jo unke avsaad se badh gaya tha. She had learned early on that expressing emotions was not allowed if it did not align with what they wanted or expected from their children. yah ek chikitsak ban gayi taaki vah anya logon par us tarah dabaav na daale jaise unhone use lagaane vaali sthitiyon ya vyaktitvon ne poore jeevan seekhi hogi. 

As she grew up into adulthood Julia realized how much damage this treatment could have caused both physically as well emotionally for herself growing up. haalaanki ab tak ve doosron ko sahaayta pradaan nahin dete huye svatantra ho rahe the lekin fir bhi ye sabse acchi cheej thin jo unhone socha tha ki agar baatcheet hoti hai to har samjhauta sirf ek shart hongeeh 'main sahmat hoonga' aur antim nirnay mere paas aa jaana chaahiye. Generation 6: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is psychologist by profession and has the ability to read minds. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ê‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§∏‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§™‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã‡§∂‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§
---
Dr. Sarah was an accomplished clinical psychologist with years of experience under her belt. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡•Å‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ò‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ù‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ However, there were times when she felt like something more than just being able to empathize with others' pain was missing from herself. ‡§Ø‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§Æ‡§®‡•ã‡§µ‡§ø‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§æ‡§® ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§∏‡•á‡§ü ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¶‡•ã‡§π‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä-‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§∏‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∂‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Å‡•§

It all started one day while attending a conference on mind control techniques. ‡§µ‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§®‡§è ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§Ü‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§≤‡§π‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§ She had always been fascinated by human behavior but now it seemed as if she could see right into people's thoughts without even trying too hard. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•á‡§≤‡§® ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡§ï ‡§á‡§Ç‡§§‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§®‡§à ‡§∂‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ And so began Dr. Sarah's journey towards unlocking these abilities within herself - which would ultimately lead her down a path that not many are willing or capable enough for.

‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Ç‡§†‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡§æ ‡§ñ‡§§‡§∞‡§®‡§æ‡§ï ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§Ø‡§¶‡§ø ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ So instead of using them immediately, she decided to take things slow at first before divulging any information regarding what she learned during those days spent researching this newfound power set. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø, ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§æ‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§£ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡§à ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§® ‡§∂‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¶‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§™‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§™‡•á‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ This led her to believe they needed someone skilled yet compassionate to guide their way forward. ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§°‡•â. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§â‡§® ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§¶‡•á‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§µ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§

As time passed, word spread around town about how effective Dr. Sarah was at helping individuals overcome obstacles such as addiction, anxiety disorders, depression, etc., simply through understanding each individual's unique perspective. ‡§Ø‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§™‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§®‡•á ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø 

Generation 7: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is psychologist by profession. ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ê‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ñ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§∏‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ The woman should help the mentally ill man to overcome his mental problems and lead him towards normal life again.
---
‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§µ‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§°‡•â. ‡§ú‡•á‡§∏‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡•â‡§®‡§∏‡§® ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç-‡§ú‡•ã ‡§™‡•á‡§∂‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡§®‡•ã‡§µ‡•à‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§æ‡§®‡§ø‡§ï ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ She was highly skilled at diagnosing various forms of disorders such as anxiety attacks or depression symptoms that people suffer from daily lives. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§â‡§® ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§® ‡§¢‡•Ç‡§Ç‡§¢ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ Jessica had always been passionate about helping those with mental health issues get back on their feet so they could live happier lives once more.

‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§®‡§µ‡•Ä‡§®‡§§‡§Æ ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ú‡•á‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§µ‡§ï ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§¶‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§§‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ James came into her office looking very anxious but composed enough for them both to have an open dialogue without any hesitation. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§≤‡§æ‡§ï‡§æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡•å‡§∞‡§æ‡§®, ‡§µ‡§π ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§Å‡§ñ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡•Å‡§Å‡§ö ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ù‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§∏‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡•Å‡§≠‡•Ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã‡§∂‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ö‡§≤ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ He spoke candidly about how he felt like there were no solutions left anymore because everything seemed hopeless, even suicidal thoughts crossed his mind when things got too much to handle.

‡§ú‡•á‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§®‡§à ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡§§‡§æ ‡§§‡•ã ‡§µ‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§∏‡§π‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§™‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§ His bosses would give tasks expecting immediate results which made it difficult to keep up since he couldn't seem to find anything worthwhile while working. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§ï‡•á ‡§§‡§®‡§æ‡§µ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§π‡§® ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§•‡•á, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§§‡§æ‡§è‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ö‡•Ä‡§ú‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤‡•á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ Yet despite all this negativity surrounding himself, James still managed some form of happiness within these moments - something small yet significant that gave him hope each day.

Dr.Sarah's team comprised several other highly skilled surgeons from different specialties including cardiac care, orthopedics, general medicine etc., but it would be Sarah alone who could perform such delicate operations without any assistance or guidance required. The patient came into view through large glass windows which separated them from outside world where family members anxiously waited nearby watching intently. It wasn't long until everyone realized how much pressure rested solely on Saras shoulders; not only because he knew better than most people did just exactly why those few minutes mattered more than anything else in his career. To ensure utmost precision throughout the procedure, she utilized cutting edge technology like MRI scanners & CAT scan machines that allowed her to see deep within patients brains using advanced imaging techniques never seen anywhere previously. ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§Æ‡•á‡§® ‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡§® ‡§§‡•à‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§π‡§ú‡§®‡§ï ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•á‡§¶‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡•Ä‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ó‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ However, things took a turn for worse once she realized some parts were missing or damaged beyond repairable condition. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§® ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è, ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§Æ‡•á‡§® ‡§ò‡§¨‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ó‡§à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ó‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ That's where Mrs Johnson stepped up! ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•â‡§®‡§∏‡§® ‡§≤‡§Ç‡§¨‡•á ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§π‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•â‡§∞‡•ç‡§° ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ With her guidance and expertise, together they worked tirelessly until all vehicles passed inspection and got back into service within hours. ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡•à‡§¶‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ó‡§†‡§® ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡§®‡•ã‡§¨‡§≤ ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§§‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•É‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ‡•§

Generation 2: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is mechanic by profession and faces the gender bias.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡•à‡§ï‡•á‡§®‡§ø‡§ï ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She was always fascinated with cars since she could remember anything else but them as her first love. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Å ‡§∏‡•á ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§ú‡•Å‡§®‡•Ç‡§® ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§µ‡§π ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ As time passed, Sarah became more skilled at fixing cars than anyone around her knew of. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§î‡§™‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§£‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§™‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§∑ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§≠‡•Å‡§§‡•ç‡§µ ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§™‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§ó‡§è ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•å‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶ ‡§•‡•á‡•§ 

One day while working on an old car that had been left to die for months without any owner's attention or care, she noticed something unusual happening beneath its hood - it seemed like someone had tampered with some wiring inside which caused certain parts not functioning properly anymore. ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡•Ä‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§´‡•à‡§∏‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ-‡§µ‡§π ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç! After hours upon hours spent analyzing every detail from top to bottom trying different approaches until finally figuring out what went wrong, she fixed everything back into place successfully leaving no trace behind even after all this hard work put forth towards making sure nothing would go amiss again.

‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡•á ‡§´‡§ø‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ö‡§≤‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§§ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•Ä‡§† ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§õ‡•Å‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ò‡•ã‡§Ç‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§Æ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ But despite being grateful for having found solutions where others might have given up due to frustration or lack of knowledge/expertise, there still remained lingering feelings within herself that were never really addressed nor acknowledged because society believed women weren't meant to be involved in such male dominated fields regardless how much they may know or understand when compared against men doing similar jobs.

‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§≠‡§≤‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§§‡§ï ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ó‡§§‡§ø‡§∂‡•Ä‡§≤ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§§‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§¶‡•É‡§¢‡§º ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ‡•§ Every passing year brought new challenges yet proved itself worthwhile too seeing progress made both personally & socially overcoming many obstacles along way whether big or small ones alike . 

Generation 3: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is mechanic by profession.
---
‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡•à‡§ï‡•á‡§®‡§ø‡§ï ‡§¨‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ She was fascinated with the way cars worked and how they could be repaired when something went wrong. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Å ‡§®‡•á ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡•Å‡§ö‡§ø ‡§™‡•à‡§¶‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§§ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§ø‡§§‡§æ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§§‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ö‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ 

Sarah started her journey as an apprentice at a local garage where she learned everything from changing tires to fixing engines. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§π‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§ï‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§®‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∞‡§µ‡•à‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡§π ‡§â‡§® ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§¨‡§® ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§™‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Her boss noticed this trait early on and gave Sarah more responsibilities than most of his other employees. ‡§á‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§≠‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§â‡§ú‡•ç‡§ú‡•ç‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§

One day while working underneath one of their client's car, Sarah realized that there might have been some damage done during its last service call. ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ö‡§ø‡§Ç‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡§Ø ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§è‡§Å ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§≤‡§ó‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ï ‡§™‡§∞‡•á‡§∂‡§æ‡§® ‡§•‡•á‡•§ This led them back into Sarah's shop for further inspection which resulted in finding out what had caused such significant issues. ‡§á‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§ú‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§ø‡§§ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡•§

As time passed, Sarah became so skilled it seemed like nothing would ever stop her from becoming successful in any field related to automobiles or machineries. ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§ø‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§ó‡§à ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ, ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§π‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§∂‡•Ä‡§®‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§ It took hard work but eventually, all those years spent learning paid off because now Sarah has become not only respected within the community but also recognized nationwide. 

Generation 4: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is mechanic by profession.
---
‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡•à‡§ï‡•á‡§®‡§ø‡§ï ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ She had always loved working with cars and was determined to make it her career from an early age. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ-‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶‡•á‡§π ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§™‡§æ‡§∞‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§∑‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ü‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§π‡•à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§≠‡§∞‡§£-‡§™‡•ã‡§∑‡§£ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ But Lena's passion for the job never wavered. ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§ñ‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§§‡§É ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§†‡§ø‡§§ ‡§§‡§ï‡§®‡•Ä‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¶‡§æ‡§ñ‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Ø‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç‡•§ After graduation, she got hired at one of the most prestigious car dealerships as their head technician. 

‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§´‡§æ‡§Ø‡§¶‡•á‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ Every day brought new challenges - fixing engine problems, diagnosing electrical issues or even repairing bodywork damage caused due to accidents on road. ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§Å‡§ï‡§ø, ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•å‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡•Ä‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§∏‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§ñ‡§æ‡•§ Her colleagues admired how well equipped she was when dealing with complex technical matters that required knowledge beyond what they could offer. ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡§∏ ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§°‡§º‡•á ‡§≤‡§æ‡§≠‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§ï‡§†‡§ø‡§® ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§æ‡§≤‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§¶‡§¨‡§æ‡§µ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§Ü‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§°‡•Ä‡§≤‡§∞‡§∂‡§ø‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≤‡§æ‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ In fact, some clients would come back specifically just because of the trustworthiness and competency shown towards them during these situations.

‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§≤‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§§ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ Despite being extremely busy, she made sure not to neglect spending time with those closest to her. ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¶‡•ã‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ó‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§õ‡•ã‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§â‡§∏‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§∂‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡§π ‡§¨‡§ø‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§Ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§è ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§•‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä‡•§ They knew if anyone needed help more than themselves, then there were few people better suited to assist than her.

‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡§ø‡§®, ‡§è‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡§§ ‡§ï‡•á‡§Ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡•Å‡§≤‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•Å‡§è ‡§∞‡§π‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡§§‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ó‡§°‡§º‡§¨‡§°‡§º ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§¶‡•Å‡§ï‡§æ‡§® ‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ß‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•Å‡§à‡•§ The owner explained he didn't have any other options but close down until further notice since his regular tech couldn't fix things properly. ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ï ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡§æ‡§∂ ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§®‡•Å‡§ï‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§â‡§†‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡§°‡§º‡•á‡§ó‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§® ‡§ú‡§≤‡•ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§® ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•á ‡§§‡•ã ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ç‡§°‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡•á‡§∂‡§æ‡§® ‡§π‡•ã‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§ö‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à‡§Ç‡•§ However, before leaving work, Leana took out all tools available and started tinkering around trying different solutions without giving up hope. ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ 

Generation 5: Write a short story in english about a female person, who is mechanic by profession.
---

ek ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡•Å‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§∂‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ Sarah was an expert at her craft and had been working as a gemologist for over ten years now. ‡§µ‡§π ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§®‡§à ‡§§‡§ï‡§®‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§®‡§è ‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§® ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§•‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú‡•á ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ó‡§è ‡§•‡•á‡•§ Despite being surrounded with precious stones all day long, she never lost sight of what truly mattered - the people around her. ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§Ø‡§æ‡§≤‡•Å‡§§‡§æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡§ó‡§ø‡§®‡§§ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§®‡•á ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§µ‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡§§‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ò‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á ‡§•‡•á‡•§
